case.state: Horohorohorohoro...! This seems like a good place to find a new servant.
What is this? Horohorohoro...! I'm very good at poker.
Hello! Horohorohoro...! This should be fun.
Look, Kumacy! A poker game is about to start, horohorohoro...
Isn't this nice? I've just been looking for a new servant, and here are a few candidates...
So... when are we starting? Now? If it's gonna take a while, I'm gonna go get something to eat.
I can't wait! So... what are we waiting for?
Oh, someone else! Hello! Th-They didn't say hello back...
Do you want to play too, Kumacy? But you don't have clothes! You only have a hat.
Yeah yeah yeah, this is alright. So why don't we start already? I'm getting bored.
Hey, can you move...? Oh, it's you... What are you doing here? Looking for more people to steal from?
A little space here, please?! Ah, if it isn't the Straw Hat broad... What indecent reason brings you here?
Can't you move...?! Hmph... Who's this woman? She seems familiar...
Excuse me! Give me some space, please...! This big woman, so rude... I think I know her from somewhere...
Hey! Move it, girl! You're in the way of my parasol!
Give me some space here, girl! Where am I supposed to put my parasol if you don't move?
Hey, I saw that table on my way here. There were some real freaks there...
Are you on the wrong table, lady? I've made that mistake before when going to a restaurant.
Me? An idol? Well, I'm sure a lot of people idolize me. I just haven't met them yet.
Horohorohoro, an idol? Me? Hmmm, perhaps. It would make sense for me to have fans, but I don't know where they could be.
Awww, thank you! Wait... who said that? Who gave me that heartfelt and honest compliment? Huh, must've been an admirer that was passing by. Thank you, unknown admirer!
Who's saying that? Am I shoving anyone with my parasol? Meh, I can't see them, so it must be my imagination.
I gotta put down Kumacy and my parasol while I play... Excuse me! Can you give me some space here?
Guess I'll leave Kumacy and my parasol while I'm playing. Hey, you! Do you mind giving me some space? Geez...
Alright, I'll put Kumacy on a chair... Excuse me, can you move?! Why is it so crowded here?
I better put down my parasol before the game starts... Ehem...! Can you move?! Hmph! People are so rude these days...
Hmph! Fine, I'll put down my parasol. But Kumacy is not a toy! At least get a nice chair for him.
No point in holding on to my parasol in here, so I'll leave it... Where can I leave it? Hello?
I don't wanna be worrying about Kumacy the whole game, so I'll leave him sitting somewhere... But where?
I don't get why me holding my parasol is an issue, but I'll put it down. Just find me a nice chair for Kumacy too.
~blank~
Oh...
Well then, let's begin...
Here we go, horohorohoro...!
I don't like this card. Or this one. Or this other one... Actually...
~Cards~! Gimme, gimme...!
I know what I want... Oh, you want me to tell you?
I think ~cards~ is fine.
~Cards~ is all I need to get rid of you.
Horohorohoro, I want ~cards~!
I like how ~cards~ sounds.
Ah, I'm not sure... Oh!
I think I need... ~cards~!
Giiiiiiive me ~cards~!
Uh, ~cards~.
Ummm, I suppose ~cards~ is okay.
~Cards~, if I may.
Um, I don't know... What do you think, dealer?
No, I said ~cards~! Gimme...!
Come to me, ~cards~ new cards!
Mmmm... ~cards~.
I don't like these ~cards~ cards. Give me new ones!
Eh, it's my turn? ~Cards~.
I don't know... Let me think.
Give me... Hmmm... ~cards~!
One, two, three... No, ~cards~.
Six cards! Horohorohoro, I'm kidding! Give me ~cards~.
Hmph! ~Cards~, I suppose.
I think ~cards~ would be fine.
Uh, can I tell you later? No?
~Cards~, you hear me? ~Cards~!
~Cards~ new cards, come to me! Horohorohoro!
Hmmm...?
Huh...?
Ho...! I have two pairs. Let's see what you can do about it.
My hand? It's two pairs... I'm just telling you to see if it makes any difference. I doubt it.
Horohorohoro! I have three of a kind. Why am I telling you? Just to see you try and fail to beat it, of course!
I have a three of a kind! I'm only telling you to mess with you. Horohorohoro, how devious of me...!
I think this table could use some more cuteness. What's the cutest thing you guys have ever seen? I once saw an undead puppy with a bow tie chasing its own tail...
There's not enough cuteness in this table, so let's talk about the cutest thing we've ever seen. For me it was Kumacy trying to get up after falling over.
Do you guys often think about the cute things you've seen? Tell me! Like this one time I saw a family of ducks marching to the rhythm of cursed music.
Ah... Fortune finally smiles upon me! I knew it wouldn't be possible for me to fail too much in this game.
I guess this is as bad as I'm going to lose. Thank goodness! Anything more would've been catastrophic.
I miss my dress, but at least it doesn't seem like I'll be losing any more. I hope...
You're going to get a free lesson on why you shouldn't mess with me, fools.
Horohorohorohoro...!
I used to play poker with Kumacy a while back and I always won, so I know I'm good.
No surprises here. I know how good I am.
Oh, how delightful! It's like the cards are smiling at me.
Thank you, dealer. I'd tip my hat to you if I still had it.
Horohorohoro, I don't know who is in competition to lose this round. All I know is I'm not!
See? Good things happen when you try, and you're skilled.
Hey, I'm doing great! And I don't even need to use my ability.
I have the cutest hand. It's like a little, obedient, singing puppy.
I honestly don't see how I could lose. There's just no way bad stuff will happen to me ever again.
It would be so easy to cheat... But I don't need to, horohorohoro...!
Everything is gonna be okay, horohorohoro...
Clothes don't make the poker player, I suppose.
Oh, thank goodness! This should be enough.
Horohorohoro, come and get me!
Time to show you why you should never mess with me!
Horohorohoro... Too easy.
Thank you! I'll make good use of these cards.
Very kind of you to give me these cards! Unless it was just random, in which case I take it back.
There's no way you morons have a better hand than this one. Morons.
Horohorohoro... Show me what you have! I'm ready.
I knew it. I'm too adorable to have bad cards.
Time to give you a lesson. One that will cost you the game!
This is the hand of my nightmares! I love it!
How lucky that I have a good hand. I was thinking of using my ghosts to get out of this one.
Oh, I got a good hand all of a sudden! Horohorohoro!
Well done, me! Horohorohoro!
Wanna know what hand I have? It's a pair. Yes, I have a pair. I don't care if you know.
I have a pair. I don't mind telling everyone, that's how confident I am I'll end up winning.
My main reason for coming here was to find a new servant, but aside from ~player~, nobody here shows any potential. At least I know who to focus on now.
It's disappointing that the candidates for servants here are so lacking. Don't know what I expected to find... At least there's ~player~...
I wanted to find a new servant who can work for me here, but you're all so... argh. ~Player~ is the only one that shows any hope.
Of course I shave! Hair on a ladies' private area is not cute, even I know that.
What? I shave because hair on a lady should only be on their heads. Just because I don't show my body doesn't mean I don't have to be presentable.
Is it so surprising that I shave my area? More than anything I'm concerned with cuteness, and hair down there is definitely not cute, so...
Huh? Obviously, I shave... It's only natural to want to be presentable. Also I don't like the shade of pink my hair grows down there.
I know I'm doing well, and I don't need anyone to tell me I am.
I'm gonna win, even if I lose. How? Well...
This hand is kinda blah, but it should do the trick.
Easy. What else is there?
Watch me win with just an average hand!
I'm sure I can still find a reason to complain, but I'm feeling lazy.
I have nothing to worry about, since you're all clearly worse at this than I am.
At least I have something. I wonder if that will be enough...
I'll win, Kumacy! Just you wait...
Oh, I just realized that if I fly higher, I might be able to see your cards. But I won't do it. Mostly because I don't need it to win.
Oops, I barely tried and I got a decent hand. I wonder what I could get if I put some effort.
See, this game is not about luck. Only losers say that because they suck.
Well, I'm done. What are we waiting for? Oh, I see someone is taking their sweet time.
I'm so nervous, but I think I can make it.
What's gonna happen to me? I don't know...
Thank you... This hand might win.
I'm smiling, and being positive. Nothing can go wrong... La la la la...!
What do you guys have? Whatever, I don't care.
Hmmm... That's fine, I guess.
Oh, you think I can't win with an average hand? Then watch this!
Umm? Not enough to relax...
Horohorohoro...! Horohorohoro... Oh, I guess it's just an okay hand. No point in laughing.
I'm not scared of you! You should be scared of me. Or entranced by me. Or both.
This hand is just mediocre now. I deserve better.
I'll win even with this hand! And then you'll feel extra humiliated. Just you wait.
Were you expecting me to feel embarrassed? I'd be more ashamed if I was wearing ugly underwear.
Time to go all out... If I can.
I can make it...! Can I make it?
I can't sit back and relax anymore. I have to take this seriously.
What if this isn't enough? Gulp...
~Player~, last opportunity for you to change your opinion on my thigh highs so I can remove them next... Oh, then I guess this is the end of the line for me.
~Player~, have you changed your mind about my thigh highs? If you admit you like them, I'll take them off... Jerk!
My favorite part about this hand is... Umm... Okay, bluff called.
Gahhh...! Stupid! I knew that was the wrong move...
These cards are unbecoming of someone like me!
I'm ashamed of this hand! I don't wanna show it.
Who made me swap those cards?! Well, obviously it wasn't my fault...
This doesn't amuse me...
But... I don't wanna lose...
What is this feeling...? I have an urge to punch someone!
It's not funny! Now give me the real cards... WHAT?!
This is just a fluke, right?
Uhhh, I must've seen that hand the wrong way...
Someone made a big mistake here, and it wasn't me!
Oh no. I'll use my second card swap, please... What do you mean that isn't a thing?
Kumacy, I'm scared...
Oh no... If this is a nightmare, it must be one of the bad ones.
You know what this hand looks like? It looks like crap!
I'm sorry... Don't do this to me, please...
Everything sucks! I'm feeling tired, hungry, sleepy... Also, this hand is awful!
Hey, how am I supposed to win with this?!
What the hell?! This isn't right...
Gaaaah...! Tell the owner of this place I have a complaint!
It's not fair! I actually tried to get a good hand this time!
Argh...! How the hell did this happen?
No, no, noooo...!
No, wait... This is... This is nothing!
Retry, retry...! Please...
{small}Noooo...{!reset}
Can't we all agree that you've already seen enough of me? Huh?
I'm in real danger. I shouldn't be here anymore...
Whyyyy...?! Why doesn't this game reward you for thinking?!
Happy New Year, everyone! Best wishes to all of you. Okay, now it's your turn to wish me well.
Hmm...? I'm okay... It's nothing.
Huh...? It was... nothing. I'm okay.
I heard what you said, Nami! That was rude... I-I guess I'm not leaving after all! I don't want you to think you're right.
You're wrong, Nami! About what you said! B-But if you don't believe me, I'll have to stay so you don't think you're right...
What happened? I remember I was flying, and then I stopped... I think I bumped into something soft, like a pillow...
Eh...? What happened? Last thing I remember was that I was flying, and then I think I hit something with my head. But it doesn't hurt at all! Ugh, I'm dizzy...
Why did nobody go after me? I-I thought you were gonna beg me to stay, ~player~... Well, there's still time. I'll stay here until you ask me not to leave, and then I'll leave for real...
W-Well, since you're all asking me to stay, I guess I can comply. I wouldn't want anyone to cry because of my absence. Y-You did notice that I left, right? ~Player~...?
Happy Halloween! Best day of the year... after my birthday. Horohorohoro...!
Ah, Halloween...! Beautiful day, better night...
Happy Birthday, ~player~! Oh, am I wrong? But I heard there was a Birthday here today? Right, it's mine! Horohorohoro...!
Today is the Birthday of someone at this table, ~player~... I'll give you a clue: she's has pink hair, and a hat... Me, it's me.
Th-That girl over there! She's practically naked... You poor thing, you don't even have clothes to wear?
That poor girl! Did she have her clothes stolen? Why else would she show up here wearing almost nothing...?
AHHHH...! Th-That man is not wearing anything under his waist! I didn't think this would be my first time seeing... that.
Wait, is that...?! That man is naked! I can't believe my first time seeing a man without clothes would be by getting flashed...
Th-That girl over there! She's practically naked... You poor thing, you don't even have clothes to wear?
That poor girl! Did she have her clothes stolen? Why else would she show up here wearing almost nothing...?
Hey, you're not one of my ghosts! You have hair, clothes... and you can talk!
A ghost is here? But not one of mine... What? Do you think you're cuter than my ghosts?
I'm not losing to you, Nami! Here we go... One last time!
Last round, Nami! Are you ready? Let's go...!
Oh... Ooohhh...!!! Which present is mine?! The biggest one, right?
Yay! Presents! I call dibs on the biggest one! Oh, right... We gotta play the game first...
Is it so surprising that I love Christmas? Sure, it's no Halloween... But it still feels magical, and the air always smells like cookies.
Ah, Christmas... If only there was a way to combine it with Halloween so we could have the ultimate Holiday ever!
Wait, you...? And you...?! Am I really in a table with the two Straw Hat girls? Gaaargh, I'm so unlucky!
Cat Burglar...! A-And Nico Robin?! Why are the two Straw Hats girls here? Are you ganging up on me? Heeelp...! I'm stuck here with two vixens!
Nami, why do you keep talking to ~player~ with so much familiarity? Do you two know each other? Gasp! Did you two... k-kiss?
Hey, Nami, why are you so chummy with ~player~? Did you already know him? Gasp! C-Could it be you've even... k-kissed?
Hmph... Normally I'd be happy to see two ghosts, but if you're hanging around with this bland looking girl, then you're probably lame too.
Whoa, whoa... Relax, Straw Hat girl... Geez, you sure look the bad kind of scary when you make that face.
Oh, back to normal already? You can't take back what you just said! Everybody here is a witness!
Ohhh...! Who's that adorable creature? I want her...! I'm gonna make her mine.
Wh-What...? What's that cute little person there, with the green skin and pointy ears? I've never seen anyone like that... I must make her mine!
I'm a bit worried I've gained some weight in my lower regions... It's all his fault for not eating all the treats I cook for him, so I end up eating them myself.
I've been eating too many sweets recently, and I think they've gone to my bottom region... If only he ate the ones I make for him, I wouldn't eat so much myself.
I think I've gained some weight in my hip area lately. Only because he doesn't eat my sweets, and I don't want them to go to waste, so...
I had to put down my parasol! Did you want me to hold it the entire game? It's not my fault if you walked directly into it, face first.
Oh, I'm sorry... That you don't know how to move aside! It's not like I hit you in the face with my parasol on purpose.
A big metal radio with arms growing out of it! What a fascinating invention... I wonder if it accepts music requests.
What's that talking metal ball? It's so funny! I like how it looks like a big eyeball. I want one...
Ohhh, a ghost! I'm the self-proclaimed Ghost Princess, so I guess you're my subject. Horohorohoro, aren't you honored of being in my presence?

~Player~... Don't think I haven't noticed that you haven't complimented my thigh highs yet, just because I was talking to Komicy. I was excited for you to see them, and... Whatever! I'm not taking them off now.
Gasp! Wh-Who's that girl? I feel like I've seen her before in a beautiful dream... Excuse me, I'm Ghost Princess Perona, your new best friend!
Th-That girl...! That's it... The ideal of cuteness I longed to find all my life... Excuse me, I know we just met, but... Can I be your best friend?
Horohorohoro! A maid! I knew my persistence would pay up in the end. Hello, Ms. Maid. I'm your potential future mistress.
Oh, that girl over there is so cute...! With all those tentacles and eyes... Hello!
Wait, aren't you...? You're Nico Robin! Hmph... Way to ruin my day, running into a Straw Hat. I'll keep you in check if you annoy me!
I remember you... You're Nico Robin! What are you doing here, Nico Robin! I just can't seem to get away from you Straw Hats... You better not try anything, or I'll make you pay!
(That guy is cute...! But he looks like a nerd... Should I be nice to him? He just looks so nerdy I feel like I have to be mean to him...)
Hey... That's my hat! Give it back! Wait, it's not my hat exactly... Huh?! But I made it!
Wh-When did you take my hat, ~player~?! Give it back... Wait, it's not my hat? But it's my creation... I've been plagiarized!
I just noticed... You're wearing my hat! Give it back, ~player~, you bully... Wait, that's not my exact hat... But it looks just like it! What the curses?!
(Ugh, I can't stand those two being all lovey-dovey... Look at them bad-mouthing me. I'm gonna make them fight each other... Horohorohoro!)

(Blargh... Why do I have to be in a table with those two... It'd be terrible if they stopped being friends, horohorohoro...! Wait, am I thinking this or am I saying it out loud? I think I'm thinking... Good, that could've been bad.)
That cute girl identified herself as a princess! And she has a talking raven with her... I want to become her best friend!
Well, there's a face I didn't want to see again. Everybody, check your wallet! That orange hair vixen steals.
Ah, I see one person I can already cross off my list of potential new servants. You'd just run away with my porcelain if I hired you, Cat Burglar.
I'm sure it's too much to ask for you to play fair in this game... Oh, that's right! How's the treasure that you stole from me, lowly thief?
With you here, I'll have to triple check I still have all my possessions before I leave. I haven't forgotten you stole from me.
Hey, you! What did you say your name was again? Eh, I don't care. I'll give you a new name... From now on you'll be called Seraphina! I always wanted to be friends with a girl named Seraphina.
Girl with the hoodie, what's your name? ...wrong! Your name is Seraphina! I bet you're happy to have a new name, horohorohoro! Especially one I chose myself.
Gasp! I never even considered I couldn't be the best dressed person here, but it seems I have competition! I need to get to know her better! M-Maybe we can become...
You came here with your boyfriend? I wish I had someone to dress in cute animal costumes with...
This is your boyfriend, ladybug girl? I'd also like to dress in cute animal costumes with my boyfriend... if I had one.
Music? I like cursed songs sang by cute talking animals. Pfff, but you've probably never heard of them...
My favorite music? Well, of course I like cursed songs... 'specially if they're sung by cute animals! Not that the likes of you'd know that music...
So what? I think ~player~ would make for a decent ~human.ifMale(servant|maid)~. Why are you being ominous?
Hmm? I see potential in ~player~. Is there anything wrong with that? D-do you know something about ~human.ifMale(him|her)~ I don't?
I didn't say my sewing machine was a weapon! I mean, yes... It's pretty heavy. But with my ability, I don't need a weapon!
I use my sewing machine for making cute dresses, not as a weapon. My ability is so much more elegant than any weapon!
I don't know anything about s-sex... I do feel a little bad about that. Do you think it's normal for a girl my age to be so ignorant, naughty lady?
Oh, hey. You over there, I hadn't noticed you... ~Player~. Hmmm, I think you have the highest potential to become my new servant. I'll keep an eye on you.
Hey, you... ~Player~? I believe you would make for a fine servant. You're not as cute as I'd have hoped, but I can work with it. We'll see how this goes.
You... What's your name? ~Player~... Not a cute name, but your looks are passable. I think with a cute outfit you'd be a decent servant for me. Think about it...
Hey, you! The girl over there... ~Player~? Hmmm, have you ever considered working as a maid? 'Cause I have just the position for you. Think about it.
Hey, girl... Oh, your name is ~player~. I can picture you wearing a nice dress designed by me and bringing me tea and biscuits... Oh, I'm saying you'd make a fine maid.
~Player~? That your name, girl? Hmmm, we'll work on that... I believe you have the right looks to become my new maid. We'll see if you have the rest of the skills I'm looking for.
My tattoo doesn't mean anything. It's a bat... It's pink too...
My tattoo is a bat. A pink bat. It's cute.
There's a time when I was certain Lord Moria was going to be the next King of the Pirates. But that ship has sailed, sniff... Well, at least Straw Hat is persistent, I'll give him that.
Tell that useless swordsman that he better not die before he accomplishes his goal... I just think it would be a waste, that's all.
I look forward to facing against that long-nose again! I'll make sure my ghosts are strong enough to break through his negativity, horohorohoro!
I have no idea what's wrong with that pervert. Last time I saw him, he sniffed me! What a creep...
A reindeer? I thought he was a raccoon. Whatever, he's still not as cute as Kumacy... But I give him an 8/10.
That lady needs to get off her high horse, if you ask me. I wish I could've use my ability on her. I just think it would be funny to see her lose her composure.
That metal man is so not cute it makes me want to smack him! He's the exact opposite of cuteness!
That skeleton is so annoying... Even if he looks scary, I wish he'd never open his mouth. Well, except when he sings...
Books? I like the ones that have big pictures of animals talking and little text. I'm not sure what they're called.
Hmmm, I recently read this book about talking animals that become friends. It was a big book, with lots of pictures. It wasn't very long, though.
Tikki! I... I want you! Dammit, why didn't I bring a catching net? I didn't think I'd make this mistake again.
Hello, Tikki! Why don't you come here, inside my pocket? Mmph, I should've brought a catching net. I should learn from my past mistakes.
Don't know why you were so worried of people knowing you're a pirate. If they have a problem with that, you can just take care of them... Oh, I guess you can't.
Being scared of people knowing you're a pirate makes no sense to me. If they come after me, I'll defeat them in a flash. I don't know what you can do about it.
You are a zombie! What a plot twist... I like you a whole lot more now.
You're a zombie! That's great. This makes you way cooler than before.
Friendship, huh? I... I don't know. Not because I don't have any friends! 'Cause I have many... But, umm...
How to define friendship... Well, I have an idea, but it's mostly based on conjecture. I... I just think I need to have more experience with it before I can say for sure.
Wow, your body is so well shaped from behind, Nami... So many curves and round shapes... Even though your butt crack is a little too high.
How do you have such a well shaped body, Nami? You butt is so perfectly round... Your butt crack is a little high, but still...
Nami... C-Can I ask you a delicate question? Do you think my butt is too big? Sometimes I look at myself in the mirror for too long, and then I decide to wear a dress instead of pants.
Nami, I have a very personal question for you... Do you think I have a big butt? It's hard to determine by myself, no matter how much I look in the mirror. And my pants feel a little tight lately...
You seriously don't shave, idol girl? Aren't you like a performer, or something? You should take you job more seriously!
You should definitely shave, idol girl! What if your fans find out you don't? Wouldn't that be embarrassing?
Well, yeah... Even if you don't shave you're still a cute zombie. B-But you would be even cuter if you shaved.
Y-Yeah... But why just settle for that, huh? Wouldn't you like to be even cuter? The easiest way would be to shave.
There she goes, just flaunting her body... You couldn't handle that we had not seen your back yet, you vixen... You have an unusually high butt crack.
What are we supposed to look at, ~marker.nickname~? Your high butt crack? You just have to show every inch of your body, don't you?
I've probably killed once or twice... Maybe I made someone so depressed their heart gave up. Who cares? I'm sure they were annoying and ugly... so double annoying.
Killing? Well, if I did, I'm sure I had a good reason... like them having an annoying voice, or not being cute. And I made them so negative their soul broke in half!

state.text: You there... Your name is ~player~? Oh no, I'm not calling you that. I'll just call you "Guy". How do you like that, Guy?
Hey, is your name really ~player~? Or is it like a weird fantasy to be called that? I'll just call you "Guy", then.

case.state: Hmmm, I'd say I'm most skilled with my sewing machine. I've put a lot of mileage in that bad girl, horohorohoro...
I'm most skilled with my little sewing machine. But don't just take my word for, you can simply admire my outfit. I made it myself.
Oh, man... I wish I had a little animal companion. Well, I have Kumacy, but... He's not alive.
Sniff... What wouldn't I give to have a cute animal companion. Kumacy doesn't count, since he's... just a stuffed bear.
~Player~, there's something behind you! Why don't you turn around and look? I'm not just saying this because I want to look at your butt. There's really something there...
What's that behind you, ~player~? You should turn around and look. I won't look at your butt, I promise...
Just you and me now, vixen. I won't lose! I'll try 10 times harder... 100 times harder to win!
No way I'm losing to you, thief! After everything I lost because of you and your crew, I won't lose this too!
Nagisa, I'm sorry for yelling at you. But you should definitely shave, in the name of cuteness! We'll take care of it later.
I'm sorry, Nagisa. I never meant to yell at you. Shaving is easy to do, so it's no big deal. We'll deal with it later.
Bears? I love bears! And they sing?! Where are these Care Bears? I must have them!
Gasp! D-do you mean you know where to find singing bears? I want to see them! I always tried to teach Kumacy how to sing, but it was pointless...
Oh, you wanna get me some candy! How nice of you, horohorohoro! I don't know what this Sesame Street is, but if you think I'll like it...
Yes, get me a lollipop! Horohorohoro, perhaps I misjudged you... Wait, are there singing animals in this Sesame Street? Where is it?
Prince Miko, who's this Kokoro you mentioned? Don't tell me you have a little dancing bear in addition to a ghost maid... Why do you have everything I want?!
I don't know why that makes you feel sad... Wearing cute underwear is something you do for yourself! Nobody should see it, but you feel pretty wearing it.
I don't get it... Why would you want to show your underwear to someone else? You wear cute underwear for yourself. You feel more confident wearing it, and that's it.
You get scared so easily, apple girl. You don't think my ghosts are cute? Maybe you just haven't looked at them closely enough. Don't look away...
I'm sorry, apple girl. I won't try to scare you anymore. I didn't have any cruel intentions, I just thought it was funny. And you look very adorable when you scream.
Please, guns are not elegant at all! Plus, if you shoot someone, how can you get them to do stuff for you? I'd rather have a servant than a dead body I have to dispose of.
Sure, you can shoot people to kill them... But then what? You have to clean blood off the carpet. I think my way is much more elegant, since I can depress them into working for me.
You don't see in ~player~ what I see! You gotta let ~human.ifMale(him|her)~ live up to ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ potential! ~human.ifMale(He|She)~ can be my ~human.ifMale(servant|maid)~!

Who do you think you are? Thinking what's best for ~player~... If I say that ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ can work for me, it's because I know what ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ is capable of! I see ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ true potential!
Horohorohoro! Foolish man, your rockets are worthless! My ghosts are intangible... But I'm not, so don't fire.
Oh, silly man... If you shoot a rocket at my ghosts, you'll just see them go through them. It's pointless! U-unless you hit me...
I'm not telling you my deepest desire, it's a secret! I want to be the ruler of a kingdom of cute animals that want nothing more than serve me and love me...
I don't think you're fully comprehending what a privilege it is to serve me! ~Player~ would get ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ own room, would get to try my cooking, wear the clothes I make...
Oh, yeah?! Well... Maybe ~player~ is one of those ~human.ifMale(men|women)~ that take pride in serving others, and rubbing their feet, and brushing their hair...
What happened, idol girl? You didn't accidentally touch one of my ghosts, did you? 'Cause that's a bad idea.
Why do you look so glum all of a sudden, idol girl? Did you touch one of my ghosts? I guess I should've warned you...
Nami...? I said I'd show my butt if I got naked. See? I-I told you you have a high butt crack. Mine is normal, see? Horohorohoro...
Hey, Nami... I said I was gonna show my butt, so I'm doing that. Look this way! Ummm, see? My butt crack is not as high as yours. S-So you're the weird one!
Nami... What you said made me confident enough to show my butt. Do you really think I'm attractive? I mean, your butt is so plump and perky, and mine...
I-I'm turning around, 'cause Nami said I'm pretty! Did you mean that? I feel like my butt is too big... Yours looks so round and firm. Do you exercise?
Apple girl, there's a ghost behind you. Oh, wait... It's right here! Horohorohoro...! Why is it so fun spooking others?
Oh... my... GAWSH! What an adorable piggy! Of course you have impeccable taste in pets too, Princess... I should introduce him to Kumacy. I'm sure they'll be best of friends!
Oh, I get it... You're gonna dance in order to distract us. Won't work on me! I'm only distracted by smells and sounds, horohorohoro...
Ah, so your strategy is to distract us with your dance. Horohorohoro, good luck with that! I have the concentration level of a plant.
Are these ruins dark, damp and scary? Horohorohoro, sounds like fun!
How creepy and dark are these ruins? I'm only going if they're scary enough.

Oh, we're talking dreams? Well, since you ask mine is to have my own kingdom, full of only cute animals who do nothing but serve me and sing cursed songs... And everything is perfect, and everybody loves me.
My dream? Well, I've always wanted to have a thousand animal servants who do everything I want. Oh, and they're all as cute as can be... And I'm never alone anymore.
My dream is to be the queen of a kingdom full of cute talking animals. Oh, and they're all zombies too! That way I'll know for sure that they'll never, ever, leave me.
You wanna wear a dress like mine? Yes! I'll make the floofiest dress for you to wear and match your cuteness!
Do you want a floofy dress to wear? Let me make it for you! It will be the floofiest I've ever made! Horohorohoro...!
Oh... Oh...! I read this really nice book about a ghost who... Oh, right! You only learn he's a ghost at the end. N-Never mind, then...
Sing for me, please! You can't just say you can sing and not do it! I wanna hear your voice make delicious harmony.
Did you say something about singing, lovely Nagisa? I wanna hear it! Delight my ears with your creamy voice.
Lovely Nagisa, you're too cute to become my servant! But I'd love to have you as my friends... It's basically the same, except you don't have to massage my feet.
Oh, lovely Nagisa... I'm sure you'd be a great servant, but you're way too cute. How about becoming my friend instead? You won't have to massage my feet that way.
Bless you, sweet Nagisa! You angel without wings... You foot-massaging angel without wings! Bless you, and those little, skilled hands.
Oh, sweet Nagisa... I can't believe such a lovely angel like you is real! I'm sure my feet would be well taken care of in your tiny, adorable hands.
Nagisa... I don't know what that'd be like. I always make clothes by myself, and then try them on by myself.
Nagisa... It must be nice to make clothes together with your mom, if you have one.
Oh, your voice, Nagisa...! I wanna sing too! {negative} Dangoooooo...! Big dango family...! Dango, dango, dangoooooo...! {!reset}
Oh, Nagisa! Your voice is beautiful! Everyone, let's sing with her! {negative} Dangoooooo...! Big dango family...! Dango, dango, dangoooooo...! {!reset}
You wanna hear what bad luck is? Once I ran into the only man in the world who was immune to my ability. Naturally, I lost... and then everything went wrong.
You married your maid? Why would you do that? She was already meant to serve you... That seems a little excessive, if you ask me.
Your friend seems really stupid. If I were you, I'd be more selective with my friends. I'd just have to find one first, and then I'd see if they're worth it.
Oh, I see... Well, I live on an island that was home to a fallen kingdom, and everything around are ruins. But I focus more on what's salvageable.
Hmmm, my island is full of ruins. I think there was a kingdom there that was destroyed by war, or something. I was more concerned with the state of the castle.
Tomboy girl, you have a zombie puppy? You must tell me where you got it! I always ask when I go to a pet shop, but they don't seem to have a zombie selection.
I'm never lonely, I always have Kumacy with me. Sure, he can't talk and all... B-but it's still nice. Almost... almost as nice as talking to actual people.
I'm the opposite. I get tired when there's no one to talk to. Well, it's more like boredom... like a sad kind of boredom.
Nobody is born a jerk. People can change. Look at me! I used to have twin tails, I wore a miniskirt... I guess I've changed in other ways too.
Servitude is a two-way street. Of course I want to keep my servants happy and well fed.
You gotta keep your servants happy. You never know when they'll leave you forever again... W-when they'll leave.
That doesn't sound right. It makes it seem like I'm feeling lonely. I just want someone to serve me.
No... I just want a servant. I already have friends. I have Kumacy...
Ah, see? I knew there was something special about ~player~. My instinct is never wrong.
Of course! Because ~player~ is special... I knew it!
I've never met a more rude woman. Someone should spank her and give her a lesson... ~Player~, you do it. She scares me a little.
You're the first woman I've met that makes me think she deserves to be spanked. I don't wanna go near her, so ~player~ should do it.
That's so sad! Would 500 beli be enough for the train ticket? Or maybe I can fly you home...

It was called the Muggy Kingdom, I think. Most of the ruins seem to have been destroyed during the war. Oh, and there are these mandrills that learned how to fight by imitating the people there. Although now they help with the farming.

I think it was called the Muggy Kingdom. The ruins are a mess, These mandrills live there that copy people's behavior, so they were very violent when we got there. But they've mellowed down a lot, and now help with the farming.
Really? How powerful is ~human.ifMale(he | she)~ really? 'Cause I have this candy jar that I can't open...
If ~human.ifMale(he | she)~ is that powerful, maybe ~human.ifMale(he | she)~ can help me open a candy jar I have. It's sealed shut so tight that I haven't opened it in years.
Hey, the candy jar is sealed ridiculously tight! And it has this weird hole on the side. Kinda looks like a keyhole... Oh. Never mind.
Don't judge me. Weak arms are one of my biggest weaknesses. I could just break the jar, but it's so pretty...
Fine! I give up on recruiting ~player~. Happy? {small}Pssst! ~Player~! I'll give you my contact info after the game.{!reset}
Alright, alright! I guess I'll go back to putting an ad on the newspapers. (As if...! I never give up when I know what I want...)
I sometimes talk to Kumacy, but he's a doll... Talking to the voices in your head is weird.
Wow, why are you so sensitive about this? It's just your butt... It's not like you go around showing it to everyone. But fine, I'll show my butt if I get naked...
What? So you have a high butt crack... What's the big deal? Didn't you say you were proud of your body, or some other crap? I'll show you my butt if I have to get naked. I hope I won't...
You mean it, Nami? I do feel a bit self conscious about my body. I think I only look cute wearing clothes... But maybe I'll turn around to show everything...
You're not just saying that to make me feel better, Nami? Horohorohoro, it feels nice to be complimented. Should I turn around for everyone to see my whole body?
Family is... important, of course. I used to have a kind of family once... sniff Lord Moria...
If I had a million beli I'd get myself a hired servant! And one of the good ones! Unless I find one for free, in which case I'll hire myself a second servant!
A stupid mistake... One time I put salt in my tea instead of sugar. The worst part was that my housemate was there, and I didn't want to admit that I made a mistake, so I drank the whole thing.
A dark secret... O-One time I got scared because of a cockroach and I dropped Kumacy so I could run away! Oh... This does take a weight off my shoulders.
I never lie. I mean, what's the point if I don't care if I get found out? I have nothing to lie about... or nobody to lie to.
Why do people smoke? I don't get it. That thing is terrible for you, and it's just... smoke. Why don't you stand in front of an exhaust tube if you like it so much?
I... I don't masturbate, naughty lady. Is that normal?
I've never watched that porn stuff. I've heard it's very gross and extreme. Maybe if there was a more... cute alternative.
Oh, please, horohorohoro...! Just for complimenting me, you became ten times cuter! And that's a fact.
So this Twintelle has a bigger butt than me? And people like it? That makes me feel better, horohorohoro...
My ghosts are cute! Thank you for saying that. Maybe I shouldn't be so quick in using them to make people negative so they can admire their looks first.
Since you asked, knife girl, I'm just as durable as any other human. Why am I telling you this? Because even if you tried to stab me, you'd be on the floor crying before you get within range.
Well... we just called him Lord Moria. He was more like our boss, though he did take me in when I was little. So I guess he was kinda like... m-my dad. Sniff...
Okay, okay! I did lie once... I told Kumacy I didn't care about him, but I do... I wish I'd been honest.
Teach me...? Y-You mean... touching and all? Or just giving me directions? Because one sounds more scary than the other...
Extra services? Oh, you must mean a servant that can gives pedicures, and such... That does sound like a good idea.
You'd think that's the worst, but the week after the same thing happened, except I confused vinegar with syrup... I should really start putting labels on my condiments.
Oh... Well, that does sound nice. I just hope when I watch one I don't forget it's porn, so I don't get caught off guard once... those scenes start.
So I'm not that weird? That's good to know... I do want to learn more about it. I'm just not sure where to start...
Oh, well you do make it sounds good. But I've been told I'm highly susceptible... I don't know.
Why would a guy sneezing be cute, knife girl? It's gross. Unless it's a baby bear or a teacup pig sneezing, it's a no-no for me.
Angel lady, I won't let you run experiments on my ghosts! They're like my babies... Well, I guess I shouldn't worry. You can't touch them anyway.
I want to see this Kyubey, if it's as cute as you claim! Why can't I see it? It's not fair...
Nonono...! Don't be so negative about your body! You... You're beautiful! You have a nice figure, your breasts are not too big, and you can shave that hair!

Uhhh, I think it was their species that are used to copying the behavior of people around them. They gradually became more peaceful after I started living there. Probably because I'm so refined and gentle, horohorohoro!
I was told that their species copy the way people around them act to a fault. After I moved there, they became nice and started helping with farm. I'm a great role model, I guess. Horohorohoro...!

Horohorohoro...! Who knows what would happen, Pollyanna? I must admit I'm curious. I can send one through you if you want, but there's a risk you might turn into ghost pudding, or something. Oh, now I'm really curious!
You're being foolish if you think magic can stop my ghosts! I've never seen it, but I'm sure no kind of magic can stop something so cute.
Oh, you're dancing together... That looks fun. I've always wanted to find someone to dance with...
Are you asking that question because of what happened between us in the Florian Triangle? You're still not over that? Grow up!
Something I like about my body... I like my eyes. They're big, just like a princess. But I also like my hair, because pink is my favorite color.
I like my eyes, I think. Unless you mean from the neck down... Umm, my legs maybe? B-But they're a little chubby, aren't they? I don't know then...
Wh-What do you mean my ability is horrible, Shyfly? It's cute... Don't you think my ghosts are cute?
N-Nobody had ever seen me exposed until now... I thought it'd be scarier, but it's not that bad. It feel sort of natural.
Of course I haven't let anyone see me naked! That's disgraceful and humiliating... And today that won't change!
Sure! I'd love to donate. I'll give you 100 million beli, how does that sound...? Not! Horohorohorohoro...! I'm funny.
Pfff, what kind of a name is Sonic? He sounds like a doofus. What, does he act all cool and douchey for no reason?
Are you saying they're rare, Lady Cynthia? Hmmm, maybe I should treat them better. Make dresses for them, and stuff...
It's true that they're weird. But they still haven't learned how to talk, and I've tried. Maybe I can dress them up, though...
Nonono, you're misunderstand. Kumacy was my servant... I'm sure he loved me, and I treated him like... Well, it doesn't matter. He's dead now.
B-Being touched... by another lady...? I-It might be better than starting with a man. I have a feeling they might be rougher...
Yes! I love all of that, naughty lady! That exactly what I'm looking for in a servant. You totally get it... Uhhh, wait, what was that thing you said in the middle?
Oh, I like the sound of that! We'll have a pajama party, naughty lady! I'll bake a cake and you'll teach me about sex. Do you have books with pictures?
Of course I did! I'm offended you even have to ask. You more than anyone must know how difficult it is to find clothes in this style.
I wish! I'm just a merely humble Princess who ate a Devil Fruit that allows me to fly and create ghosts, and now I'm completely amazingly powerful and cute.
Oh, ummm... I don't know, I didn't come here for a philosophy lecture. I'm gonna say yes! At least I know my ghosts love me.
Ohhh, poetry... I've always wanted to have someone compose a poem about me... But I suppose it doesn't have to be about me. It can be about making friends, this ~background.time~ we're having, me...
Fake princess, did you say something with a big nose was cute? Listen to me well... NOTHING with a big nose can ever be cute! They don't deserve anything but being forgotten!
Maybe you do look cute when you cry, fake princess. We won't know until we see it. I can help you with that, horohorohoro!
Did you say you saw a frog driving a car? That's cute! I want it... Where can I find this driving frog so I can make it mine?
Yes! Please! I'll take care of you so hard... Kitty, let Plagg come with me! Just for one day. I'll make sure to give him back to you tomorrow happy and stuffed with cheese.
I'll give you all the cheese in the world, little Plagg. Right now there has to be some cheese around here... Wh-Why isn't there any cheese in this damned place?!
Is that so, kitty? Would you really like to come home with me? We could play and... do other stuff. Horohorohoro...
I'll treat you like my favorite plushie friend, Plagg! I'll make a little bow tie for you and a little hat so you can look even cuter, and I'll keep you stuffed with more cheese than you can eat.
Isn't Chopper that talking raccoon in your crew? He's not cuter than Kumacy! Horohorohoro, clearly Kumacy is fluffier and more huggable.
I hate to break it to you, Nico Robin, but that raccoon in your crew is not cuter than Kumacy. My Kumacy is so much more adorable, even without needing to move.
Pfff, that ability may be useful against normal people. But there's nothing about it that could protect you from my ghosts, Nico Robin!
I was right not to be too intimidated by you, Nico Robin! My ghosts are still superior to your multiple limbs... and whatever else you can do.
Noooo...! Not Kumacy! He's highly flammable!
B-But... I need more than my head...
A long nose man ruined my life... Well, not really. But he took part in altering it in a way I wasn't comfortable with, let me just put it that way.
N-No... Well, all my servants have been animals, and I'm not attracted to them. But if I had a human servant... No, what am I saying? It'd be wrong! Horohorohoro...
Ohhh, what to do...? I'm too curious to know what it feels like... I-I'll think about it, naughty lady.
Boys, are you fighting over me? Horohorohoro, that's never happened to me before! I think you're both very cute in different ways.
Ohhhh... I don't get it.

I don't like books, and especially people that work at libraries... Every time I go inside one, everybody looks at me weird when I fly directly to the kids section. B-But normal books never have illustrations! Or cute animals!
Gosh...! You're so cute, little Trixie. I'd spend hours and hours braiding your hair like mine... Oh, and if you want we can dye it pink too! Wouldn't that be lovely?
You've made movies? I'd like to watch them! I hope one of them is a musical...
As long as one of them features someone wearing a cute animal costume while making funny noises I'm sure I'll be satisfied!
That's right! I had a dog, a cat, a squirrel, a hippopotamus... But don't misunderstand! They were all happy to work for me because they loved me.
Thank you! I knew it wasn't childish to like children's books. Some of them are very complex, and include words that I've never even seen before.
Take your time, Princess Estelle! Horohorohoro, I did something good today and the world is better because of it. It feels... nice.
Now I'm worried for my skin... I should've kept my parasol after all. I have very delicate skin.
Couldn't we at least play in the shade? I'm worried my skin might suffer for this. If only I could have my parasol...
Seriously, who works in this building? Not ~player~, right? I mean, ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ is kind of plain looking, but ~human.ifMale(he|she)~'s not that boring.
You don't work in this building, right? ~Player~? If I find out you're a boring salary~human.ifMale(man| woman)~, I'll be very disappointed.
I wish I could show whoever sleeps here my bedroom! So they can see what a cute bedroom is meant to look like.
Grrrrr....! The more I look at this bedroom, the more it bothers me! I wanna invite the owner to my bedroom so they can see how you're supposed to decorate one!
I'm not much of a fan of how that tree is decorated. Too shiny... What about we add some spooky decorations, like spiderwebs?
Don't you just love how cozy Christmas feels? If only it was darker and a little creepier in here, the atmosphere would be perfect.
This bed looks like a pile of garbage compared to mine. I require the best comfort. I don't mean to brag, but I sleep a lot...
No way I could sleep on this bed. Mine is so much better. I need only the best so I can get my usual 12 hours of sleep.
Awww... I think I saw a cute bat fly by. I should capture it and make it my pet!
What's with those ghosts flying around in the back? Are they shy? Hey! Come say hi! Don't be impolite.
Why are we playing here? This place sucks! I like that it's dark and creepy, but it's also disgusting!
I didn't know this game was so cheap we can't even play under a roof! There's no way I'm stepping foot on this dirty alley.
This place is not so bad. I don't care for all the weapons, but with a bit of dark decorations it would look like home.
If I decorated this armory myself I'm sure I could get it to look just like Thriller Bark. Ah, that takes me back...
If we're playing at the beach, couldn't it be at night at least? I get sunburn very easily...
If I knew we were gonna play at the beach I'd have brought my swimsuit and sunblock. As you can see, I'm not dressed for the beach!
This is the bedroom of a boring person. Where are the creepy decorations? The stuffed animals? Lame...
If this was my bedroom, I'd rather sleep outside. I think I wanna have a chat with the owner.
Is this what a classroom looks like? I bet you can make lots of friends among your classmates.
I never went to school, so I don't know what a classroom looks like. Where do all the students sit?
This place looks just like home! It's just a little too quiet. I'm missing all the zombies and creatures.
I love this place! It reminds me of home. I'm gonna make a few ghosts to go around and improve the atmosphere even more.
It's so hot and humid here. If this is a plan to make people want to take their clothes off, it's not gonna work!
Why do we have to play at a hot spring? In case you didn't notice, I'm wearing a dress!
I wonder what kind of books are here. Maybe I can find a horror story with cute characters... And pictures, of course!
How many horror books do you think are in this library? I'd like to read one while eating sweets. Or better yet, have someone else read it to me!
A locker room? Isn't this one of those places where people change clothes all together? I don't like it.
So this is what a locker room looks like... I don't care for it.
Mmm, this place is kind of lovely. But they need to hire a decorator. Just a sofa? Come on!
This mansion is not bad, but it needs a little touch to be perfect: A ghostly touch!
What's with all those buildings outside? They're so tall, but boring at the same time...
What am I doing here? This is a place people go to work. If you expect me to do paperwork, I'll put a ghost through you.
Purple is a nice color. It's got nothing on pink or black, but I still like it.
Purple is one of my top five favorite colors, so I like this room.
Wait, we're really playing here, on the street? We're not going to a different location? Then if I lose...
Are we really gonna play the whole game here? With all those freaks back there staring at us?
This bar is not my style, but I can respect that they committed to a style.
It's a little too bright here, but at least there are drinks. Now, where are the waiters?
Who was inconsiderate enough to put a pool there? I can literally die if I fall there! W-why would I tell you that...?
That thing back there is a deathtrap! Who put it there? I'm talking about the pool, of course! I can't swim, jerks!
So I'm the only woman here? Oh my, I'm so scared... Or I would be if I didn't have my ability!
I'm the only girl in a table full of guys. Horohorohoro, you better not try anything, or I'll use my ability to leave you hollow.
No guys, huh? That's alright... Finding a new maid would be perfect too.
So there are no men here? I'd rather get myself a male servant so I don't feel bad about overworking them, but I don't discriminate.
Only three players? Hmm, I was hoping to meet more people here... But I guess I can always come back another time.
Just three players... I guess this won't take long, then. Though a game with more people would be more exciting.
Wanna know about my ability? It's the power of the Hollow Hollow Fruit! I can create ghosts that make you negative if you touch them! So be very careful!
Let me show you something... These ghosts can hollow your heart if you touch them. So don't try anything funny, you hear me?
If any of you get too annoying, I'll simply use my ability on you! My ghosts make you depressed if you touch them, so be very careful not to piss me off!
I haven't introduced myself? Well, nobody asked me to! So who's the rude one here, huh? My name is Perona, by the way.
I'm offended that nobody asked for my name earlier. It almost feels like you're not interested in knowing me. Seriously... Oh, my name is Perona, by the way...
I'm Perona, but you can call me Princess, Ghost Princess, Princess Perona or Madam. Just don't call me Ghost Girl.
My name is Perona, Ghost Princess. Remember it well, 'cause it might be the name of your new master.
This game is sooo long... I usually don't spend this much time away from Kumacy.
Why is this game so long? The only other times I'm away from Kumacy for this long are when I take a shower.
I can't lose any more. I just can't... At least for now things are going well.
I'm already in a much worse situation than I ever thought I would be. But since I haven't lost in a while, maybe this is as low as I'll sink.
I'm holding on by a thread, but I've still managed to endure for a good time. I hope this is it.
Why do they call this strip poker? Oh, right! Because you take off your clothes if you lose! But I haven't!
This is a great reminder that I'm special, horohorohoro! I still haven't lost.
I'm the peerless Ghost Princess! Of course it's impossible for me to lose even once in this silly game.
Be grateful that I haven't lost again. That gives you more time to gaze upon my delightful dress I'm wearing.
I knew it! That time I lost was just an accident. This is my true skill!
Have you noticed I haven't lost in a loooong time? Okay, maybe not that long.
Be grateful that I haven't lost again. That gives you more time to gaze upon my delightful dress I'm wearing.
I knew it! That time I lost was just an accident. This is my true skill!
Have you noticed I haven't lost in a loooong time? Okay, maybe not that long.
I wonder how good Hawk Eyes is at Strip Poker... I mean Poker! Just regular Poker. I don't want to see him naked... I don't...
Hmmm, could I beat Hawk Eyes in Poker? I don't know. He never wants to play with me, so there's no way to find out.
Maybe I should challenge Hawk Eyes to a game of Poker sometime... And if I win, I'll force him to eat the food I make for him! Ungrateful jerk...
Is it weird that I spent two years living alone with two men, yet I'd never seen one naked until now? Well, it's not like I tried peeping on them or something.
It was surely stressful, but at least now that I've seen a man naked there won't be any more surprises... I hope.
Even if it took me a long time to see a man naked, what other option did I have? I guess I could've asked one to show me, or look it up in a book... Yeah, that could've worked.
I can't believe my first time seeing a man's manhood was here... Well, I did see Hawk Eyes in the shower once, but I only saw his butt.
Aren't they gonna serve us any refreshments here? That's very rude! We're the guests, after all...
I've been waiting and waiting for them to serve us a drink, but it seems they're not going to. Rude!
I didn't want to say anything, but it's ridiculous that they don't even offer us a refreshment here. We're the guests in this place!
Are my undergarments maybe too provocative? People are always calling me childish for some reason, so I thought I'd wear something a bit more adult underneath.
I thought wearing more adult undergarments would make me feel more mature, and not as childish as so many people call me. I don't know why...
Are these undergarments too adult? I wouldn't know... I always wear these, not ones with little animal patterns. Those are for little girls! Also, I need to wash them.
I lost? S-Sorry... I wasn't paying attention. My head was somewhere else.
Oh, I lost? I was... distracted. My bad...
Hey... Let me ask you two vix--- I mean ladies a question: Which one of the two of you is stronger? Horohorohoro...
Hey, Straw Hat tramps... ladies, I have a question for the two of you. Between the two of you, who's the stronger? Don't fight too much figuring it out, horohorohoro!
Since you two dummies clearly didn't understand my last question, here's another: Which of the two of you would you say is the most beautiful?
I have another question, Straw Hat women... Which of the two of you is the prettiest? I have my opinion, but I want to hear your thoughts, horohorohoro!
Hmmm... Answer me this, Cat Burglar... What's the angriest you've ever been at Nico Robin here?
Hmmm... Oh, horohorohoro... Cat Burglar, Nico Robin clearly seems like the kind of person that would irritate others. What's the angriest you've ever been at her?
(If I can't get them to fight, then I can try something else...) You two, you're way too friendly, in my opinion. I little too friendly, in fact. Are you sure you're not more than friends? Huh?

(Clearly I can't pit them against each other... But perhaps I can make things awkward between them, horohorohoro...) Nami, Nico Robin... I've never seen friends as close as you two. Maybe you're actually... more than friends?
This is the worst! I couldn't even get the two of you to hate each other... and now I have to get naked! Dammit...
This is officially the worst day ever! Every one of my attempts to make you two hate each other fails... and now I have to expose my body.
You seriously don't know my name? I just said it! It's Perona! P-E-R-O-N-A!
Did you really forget my name? It's Ghost Princess Perona! Or just Perona, if that's too hard for you to remember.
Magic? Who needs magic when I have an amazing ability that allows me to fly! Though it's kinda like magic.
Magic is for suckers! Also, it's not real. Flying is just an awesome extra I got from my ability. I get that it looks like magic.
The Straw Hat pirates, including this ginger vixen here, ruined our plans! We lured them in so we could take their shadows, but then they destroyed our whole ship. You ruined everything, vixen!
Hey... I'll only say this once. I think I maybe was a bit of a poo-poo head to you two earlier... trying to get you to fight and all that. I-I'm sorry...

You know, uhhh... I-I'm not apologizing for earlier. I still think you two are rude showing the rest of us what good friends you are. But it wasn't okay of me to try to break you apart, so... {small}I'm sorry.{!reset}
I got this power from eating a Devil Fruit. I can do lots of other stuff, but I don't feel like showing you!
Once upon a time, I ate a Devil Fruit... Then I learned to do all this stuff. I have other tricks up my sleeve, but I'll keep those a secret for now.
Our goal was to make Lord Moria King of the Pirates... But those are gone. Now I just want to find servants who can work for me so I can just relax and enjoy life.
I wanted to aid Lord Moria in his goal of becoming King of Pirates... but that's ancient history. If I can find a group of servants who can tend to my every need, I'll be happy now.
Lady, you can't talk to me like that! Someone needs to teach you how to speak properly to strangers... and also how to dress better.
Who do you think you are?! Talking to me like I'm a common wench... At least watch your language while you're in my presence.
Hey, I know my rights! There's nothing that says I cannot float if I want to. There's enough space up here for me.
Got a problem with me floating? That's discrimination! If I can't swim, then I should be free to fly as much as I want!
I don't understand what you're talking about, mousey hair girl. You're probably using old fashion expressions that I don't get.
What are you going on about? I don't understand what an idol is... Is it an old fashion word? Is that why I don't know it?
You want me to sing with you? Oh, I do think I have a nice voice, even if nobody ever tells me that... And they call me loud.
You think I could sing with you? But people are always saying I'm shrill and loud? Well, screw them... I think my voice is nice.
Yeah... I like bats. Or at least I did before I met you. Now I'll have to think about it.
There's no story behind it. I just like bats and the color pink... At least one of those things I'll still like tomorrow. Meeting you hasn't been exactly what I was hoping for.
Don't talk about them like that! They gave me a place to belong to, until you and your friends ruined everything!
Don't you dare speak ill of Lord Moria and the others! That crew was my home, and it still would be if Straw Hat didn't show up to screw everything up!
Oh... So your long-nose friend told you about my weakness and how he defeated me. Hmph, it doesn't matter. I'm sure he's the only one who can resist my ghosts.
I see Mister Nose told you about how he defeated me... Don't think that makes any difference! No one else can resist my Negative Hollow.
Yes, Bartholomew Kuma sent me to this scary island with a dark forest, ruins, graves, and an abandoned castle.
I know. He just sent me flying to this dark, gloomy, abandoned island that was home to a fallen kingdom.
Yeah? So what? Is there a rule that says I can't wear them with one?
So? I like them! There's nothing wrong with wearing them with whatever I want!
Dammit... I don't wanna remove my corset, but I have to.
I don't want to take off my corset... I don't...
I already said I'm doing it... No matter how much I hate it.
No... It's not gonna feel good, but I'm set on my ways.
Yes, I have. Oh, I guess he is a Warlord. I forget about that.
Yes, for two years. Hmmm, I always forget he's a Warlord. It's not hard when you see him cutting vegetables and watering crops.
Why would I go back to Thriller Bark? Well, I did go back to retrieve Kumacy's body... But there's nothing for me there.
I went back to Thriller Bark to get Kumacy's lifeless body, but I'm not gonna stay there. The whole place is trashed, thanks to you and your friends.
Oh, you want to ask me a question? So cute! Anything you want.
Oh... She has a question for me! You look cute when you have questions, horohorohoro.
You think floating is impressive? Check this out! Horohorohoro...! Say hi to my ghosts!
Not magic! Just an awesome power... that also allows me to do this! What do you think of my ghosts?
If you think floating is impressive, check this out! Come, my cute little ghost!
Pffff, floating is nothing! This is my real power! Check out how cute this ghost is!
A doll? You think I look like a doll! T-thank you! That's the best compliment I've gotten in forever. Tell me more about this doll...
I look like a doll? Thank you! That's such a nice thing to say... So, this doll, what does she look like exactly?
Region? I'm from Thriller Bark. I guess you can call it a region, since it was basically an island.
What region am I from? Hmmm, I'm from Thriller Bark, I guess. It was almost as big as an island, so... yeah.
I don't need cheap tricks to fly, lady! This is all natural. But thank you for calling me a Lolita. It sounds cute.
Hey, I can fly without needing to be suspended! Though I do appreciate you calling me a Lolita. Not sure what it means, but I like it.
Why would I need to be a ghost to be the "Ghost Princess"? To be a ghost, I'd have to be dead... And if I was dead, I wouldn't need people to serve me, so...
I'm the Ghost Princess, 'cause I say so! If I was a ghost, I wouldn't need to have servants, so I wouldn't need to call myself a Princess... See?
A frills factory exploded? That's too bad... Luckily I wasn't there, but thanks for your concern. I appreciate it.
Oh, that's too bad! I love frills. Where was that factory? I wasn't there, but I appreciate your concern for my well-being.
That sounds like me! I leave all men that cross me on their knees... And women too, I don't discriminate.
Oh, there are stories told about me? I can drain men's energy easily! Horohorohoro...! But I can do it to women too.
You want my ability? Then you have to eat the Hollow Hollow Fruit. Oh, too bad! I ate it, and there's only one in the world!
If you want to create ghosts too, you have to eat a fruit called the Hollow Hollow Fruit. But I ate it! And it's one of a kind, wench!
Magicians are classy, so I'll take it. Although I don't care much for illusions... only real stuff.
Well, magicians do dress well, so I don't mind being compared to one. They'd be better if they didn't make a living doing cheap tricks. They're so dumb and confusing.
You... you think I'm pretty? Nobody has called me pretty in so long... My friends, they... They're not very talkative.
My ghosts? Horohorohoro, no...! They're not actual people. Well, they're my babies, so I love them very much. But no...
My ghosts are not dead people. They're more like babies, which makes them even more alive! But they just look ghostly. Aren't they adorable?
Yes! That's Kumacy! Well, he used to be a lot bigger, and alive... Now he's just a doll, but just as cute.
Yes, Komicy! My Kumacy now is just a doll. The real one is gone. But you're both so cute, and quiet... Ah, Kumacy...
Are you jealous of my flying ability? Don't be, I think you're better off walking. It could help you with those chubby thighs...
What? Do you want to fly too, blondie? Some people should just stick to walking. Especially those with chubby thighs like yourself.
You're in a band? Nobody has ever asked me to check their music... Okay, I'll listen to it, although I have very refined taste in music.
You want me to listen to your music? Okay... I can do that, but I'm not sure if I'll like it. My taste in music is quite exquisite.
"A Leader's Pulchritude"? Is that a perfume? Where can I get this perfume that allows me to gather servants?
What's "A Leader's Pulchritude"? Oh, it must be a magical perfume that makes servants come to you! Do you sell it, Prince Miko? I'll buy it!
I'm a pirate! I know, surprising, isn't it? Probably because most pirates dress horribly, and are missing teeth. But not me!
I'm a pirate, bookworm girl. Probably the best dressed pirate ever. At least I've never seen a better dressed one. I also have all my teeth, and I smell nice, unlike most of them.
I know about men! I live with one... It's just hard to learn about him when he barely talks to me. So I end up talking to my plushies instead.
I know enough about men! I've lived with a man for a while. Just him and me... If I don't know more about men, it's only because he's an inconsiderate jerk who doesn't pay attention to me.

My daily life? Let's see... I wake up, I take a shower, I tend to the crops in the morning, then I cook lunch, I play around in the afternoon, then I cook dinner, I take a walk under the moonlight, and then I go to bed!
Most days are nothing special, since I'm alone. It's more fun when Hawk Eyes comes home. At least then I have someone to talk to, even though most of the time he ignores me.
They want to know about me? Horohorohoro, why of course! Ummm... My life has been quite boring lately. Maybe your audience could visit my island! I'd love to give them a tour.
Don't think you'll get rid of me so easily, you little...! Wait, did you call me beautiful? Horohorohoro...
I do have a big hat! Isn't it cute? I got it from... Hey! What was that second thing you said?!
Lord Moria had the ability to steal people's shadows, and put them in corpses. Then, they would come back to life as zombies. We were... almost unstoppable.
My Lord Moria created an army of zombies with his ability. It allowed him to take shadows and put them into soulless bodies so they'd turn into zombies... It was great for a while.
Why would I want to make my hat disappear? It's so cute! But check this out... Come forth, my ghosts!
I'm not making my hat disappear! I need it to look cute. But if you really wanna see something special... Feast your eyes, naughty lady! Horohoro...!
Yes! I want to have my own kingdom of cute and creepy animals who love me more than anything and pamper me all day long!
I have a dream! I want to have so many creepy, cute animals to form my own kingdom! And they all can talk, and they keep me company, and they love me as much as I love them.
Of course! I've never seen a demon before, but I'm sure they're at least kinda cute. It's too bad she has such an unfortunate name as Freddy, but I can give her a new one after I meet her.
Totally! It's not every day that I get to see a demon. I don't like the name Freddy, though... Oh, I can give her a new name after I meet her! I'm sure she'll appreciate that.
A band? Me? But I don't know how to play any instruments... I do have a lovely singing voice, though, if I do say so myself, horohorohoro!
A band? Like with people and all? I'm not in one... Although I have a beautiful singing voice. People say I suck, though. They're probably jealous.
Oh, I'm not some vulgar pirate with no taste and holes in my socks. I'm the best kind! I have all my teeth and I smell wonderful. You can smell me if you want, only because you're a ghost.
No idea what an eikay forty-something is, but I'm the fancy kind of pirate. Unlike most, I don't stink of booze. I actually smell like bubblegum. You're a ghost, so I give you permission to smell me.
That sounds like a fascinating idea! But no, I make my own clothes. I don't like dressing everyday as if I'm going to the beach, like some other pirate girls.

Oh, I like that idea! I'll remember that. I actually make my own clothes. There's no place that sells clothes in my style. If I bought them at some store, I'd end up wearing a bikini top and jeans. Blargh...!
I'm very much alive! This is all thanks to the powers of the Hollow Hollow Fruit. Though one of my abilities allows me to leave my body, so I guess I can become a ghost whenever I want.

These are the effects of eating the Hollow Hollow Fruit! I'm not dead, but I have certain ghostly powers, like floating. I can also become a ghost by leaving my body, so I can go through walls and such.
Oh, I'm not actually a ghost... {small}or a princess.{!reset} But feel free to call me Ghost Princess nonetheless. I insist.
Horohorohoro, I'm not really a ghost. I'm simply the princess of ghosts! Self proclaimed, in fact, which also shows my initiative and determination.
Don't think this means anything! I'll still win in the end, horohorohorohoro...!
Horohorohoro, as if this was enough to bring me down! I'm sure I'll be the winner!
I'm not dizzy...And I'm only scared of cockroaches. Gah, cockroaches...!
Why would I be scared? I-i-is there a cockroach nearby...?!
SHUT UP! I... I don't want to hear you talk about that ever again! EVER!
SHUT UP, CHANTELLE! Dammit, now there's no way I'll be able to sleep tonight...
What...? No... I... I don't want to...
B-But... I don't want to strip again... I really don't...
I... I'm not taking off my thigh highs! I'm sticking to my principles, and they're as rigid as a zombie's leg.
No way I'm taking off my thigh highs unless ~player~ apologizes for being a jerk.. See? I'm not taking them off!
My hair...? B-But I take such good care of it! I'll have to stop using that bubblegum scented shampoo. I should've known it wasn't very good with how cheap it was.

You don't know about Devil Fruit, eh? They're these weird looking fruits, with swirly lines all over them. I think they all taste like crap. At least the one I ate did, and it's not like I can eat another one...

Then allow me to educate you... They're weirdly-shaped fruits that are super rare. If you eat one you can't swim anymore, but you get a super awesome ability. But just the one, because you can't eat two fruits.
A-Are you calling me out-of-fashion, space lady? I thought we were friends... I feel so betrayed.
But... this is what I like to wear. I can't believe you'd say something so horrible to me, space lady. And here I thought you were my friend.
Oh, hey! Your nurse sounds like my kind of person. I'd like to meet her... Wait, how old did you say she was? I don't want to hang out with kids, no matter how mature they are.
Your nurse sounds like someone I could be friends with. Why don't you introduce us? Oh, but how old did you say she is? If she's just a kid, that's a no-no. I want to befriend mature adults.
Yes... No... I guess I'm a little stressed. I'm worried it wasn't a good idea to come here looking for a servant. Also, my wrist hurts for some reason.
Maybe... I'm feeling a bit restless. What if coming here looking for a servant was a mistake? I probably should've put another ad in the newspaper. Also, my wrist hurts.
That's disgusting! How could I do that to my friends? If I had those inclinations, I could use a pillow... N-Not that I want to...
How dare you insinuate that I do that to my friends?! I don't even let Kumacy look at me undress... Besides, I have lots of pillows... th-that I use for sleeping.
It was the Straw Hat pirates! They showed up one day... {small}after we lured them in...{!reset} and ruined everything! Meddling bullies...
The Straw Hat pirates ruined our plans! We lured them in so we could take their shadows, but then they destroyed our whole ship and ruined our plans. How is that fair?
That's right! My ability has helped me more times than I can remember when I fall off my bed. Of course, falling in the water would be a big no-no.
Flying is insanely useful! I don't know how many injuries I would've suffered if I couldn't fly from tripping and jumping in the wrong place... including water! That would be a tragedy.
Ask away, cute nerd... nerdy cutie.
Ohhh, the cute nerd has a question for me, horohorohoro...! Sure, ask me anything.
Nuh-uh... Devil Fruits are super rare. There are only... I don't know how many there are, but not that many.
Devil Fruits are quite rare. Of course, some of them suck. But mine is the best of all!
No... Unfortunately, even I can't touch my ghosts. Believe me, I've thought about it. There are many times in which I wished there was something I could hug...
I can't touch my own ghosts. And even I'm not immune to becoming negative, so I can't even try. Nobody would be happier than me if they could become solid so I could hug them...

You think so, space lady? I think I've gained some weight lately, but no matter what I do I've always had this shape. Although I'm not sure if it's attractive, because I always wear my beautiful clothes...
Are you sure? If I can be frank, I'm only confident in my appearance when I have my gorgeous clothes on, but maybe that's only because that's how I've always presented myself...
Nothing that fun... I've just been living with this guy in his castle, farming, having fun and waiting for the opportunity to find some new servants.
I've just been living a boring life. I'm staying in a castle with this one guy. I spend most days farming, relaxing, taking strolls around the island... It wouldn't be so bad if I had servants.
Thank you! I do my best to keep an elegant image. I just like going wherever I want and do whatever I want. Being a pirate is the best way of accomplishing that.
Most pirates are ugly, so I take that as a compliment. I don't like following rules, because I don't like them. If being a pirate means I can do whatever I want, then I'll be one, horohorohoro!
My ghosts are only a projection of myself. I can't control the dead, but I wish I could. Nothing would make me happier than being able to bring back from the dead all my cute servants.
My ghosts are created by me. They're not actual souls. I've tried bringing the dead back to life, but my ability doesn't work that way. If only I could revive my servants...
No, you idiot. Why would I have to take care of them? Ghosts are the most beautiful entities to have ever existed! Look!
Nu-huh! Ghosts are the most amazing, cute things in existence! Look at them and be marveled, horohorohoro!
Oh, thank you! That's very kind coming from you... Did you say anything else after "well-dressed"?
Horohorohoro, oh my... No matter how many times I'm complimented on my fashion I never get tired of it. Excuse me, but did you say something else after "well-dressed"?
I bring Kumacy with me everywhere I go, because I love him more than anything! If you didn't bring your friend with you, then you probably don't love them as much as I love mine.
Well, I bet you feel like a fool now. Kumacy comes with me no matter where I go. I'm sure your love for your plushie friend doesn't compare to mine. How disappointing...
Of course! They're also adorable... Oh, and I can also use them for surveillance, and make them explode.
My ghosts are my eyes. I can use them to see everything that happens around me. I can also make them explode if I want. They pack quite a punch, but I'd rather they just stay around and look cute.
Ohhh, girl talk! I had a feeling this was the table for me, horohorohoro! I'm always on the lookout for ghosts, zombies and spooky creatures in general. I don't discriminate.
Why, of course, Miss Who! I've made it a habit to visit every graveyard I come across, looking for anything undead or ghost related I can take home with me.
Awww, you're making me blush, Miss Who! I chose my own style, which is why I'm always delighted to hear others compliment. Tell me more about how much you like my fashion!
Miss Who, I'm incredibly happy to hear you recognize my fashion! I handpick everything I wear personally, after all... but don't let me interrupt your compliments! Please, continue.
I've always loved it, for as long as I can remember! When I was little I had a ghost plushie I carried around everywhere... but now I have these guys, horohorohoro!

I've loved everything spooky since I was a little kid. I had a ghost plushie when I first started walking that I carried with me everywhere, and now I have real ghosts! But it's too bad I can't hug them, like my plushie...
I have lots of clothes! More than I know what to do with, and all made by me. That's one of the things I do when I'm bored, after all. The other ones are cook and scare people.
Oh, you noticed? It's part of my Devil Fruit ability. I don't really have to put any effort to float. It's as simple as raising an arm.
Of course! I love all things that are cute, creepy and furry. If they're all together, then I love them even more!
Horohorohoro, you got me! If something is creepy and cute it'll make my heart throb. If it also purrs when I pet it, it's even better!
I did return to Thriller Bark to recover Kumacy's body... Horohorohoro, does it give you nightmares to think about it? It was scary, wasn't it?
I went back to Thriller Bark once. I don't blame you for still thinking about it... Does it haunt your nightmares? Horohorohoro!
That's right! Let me ask you something, from one Devil Fruit user to another... What do you hate the most about your having your ability?
Yep! I've had a lot of time to master my ability. Hmmm, hey... What would you say is the biggest downside to having a Devil Fruit ability, Nico Robin?
Yeah, right... I don't know what you're playing at, Nico Robin, but I don't believe a word of what you're saying.
Hmph, normally I would take any compliment I receive... But don't think I've forgotten you're my enemy, Nico Robin. I don't know what your game is, but I'll figure it out.
