Ugh, that jerk...! I don't wanna talk about him... He's the worst. He treats me awfully, Nico Robin.
Hmph, if you knew how awful he is, you wouldn't ask me about him, Nico Robin. He treats me like garbage...! I don't wanna talk about him.

I like that I can do whatever I want! If I want to go to a place that's off limit, I can just fly in. If someone rubs me the wrong way, I can throw ghosts their way until they apologize... Horohorohoro, it's great!
I love the freedom of being a pirate! Not having to work for anyone, or do what other people tell me... I can live the life I want, without worrying about laws, or other boring stuff.
You like Kumacy? Horohorohoro! I'll make sure to tell him later. I have lots of stuffed animals. I used to have zombie animals, but they're... gone.
Horohorohoro, that's true! Kumacy is cute! I have many more animals at home... all stuffed, of course. I modeled them after the zombie animals that I lost.
Wh-What kind of woman would use her cleavage as a pocket? That's not what it's for... Besides, my chest is not that big.
How rude! To even suggest I'd use my cleavage as a pocket, like some vulgar woman. And even if I wanted to, I couldn't do it, because my chest is not very big.
I do have a castle, and I live in a spooky island... but neither is mine. B-But for now my goal is only to gather followers! They have to be cute, and they have to love me. That's all I want.

Being a princess is more than just about having a castle and a kingdom, which I do have by the way... even if they don't belong to me. Being a princess is also about having loyal followers and servants, which is what I want now! And they have to be cute!
A cat who makes clothes? I want her! I have to make her mine! Would anyone be upset if I take her with me?
Ohhh, a cat designer! And her name is Honey? That's so cute! I must make her mine... Who do I have to convince to give her to me?
Yeah, I think even the lamest Devil Fruits are still sold at a high price in the underworld. Of course, mine is better than all of them.
They're very expensive, even if they suck. Horohorohoro, I wonder how valuable my Devil Fruit would be, considering how it's the best. Well, too bad, because I have it!
Are you saying you want to work for me, kitty? You definitely fulfill the cuteness requirement at the very least... I'd have to assess how obedient you are.
Ohhh, kitty, are you asking me for a job? I might have one available... But first I need to make sure that you're not just a cute face.

Let's see, where should I start... They're cute, but obviously you can see that. But while they look like ghosts, they're not technically souls of the dead, but more like a part of me. I was bummed when I learned that.

I'll tell you everything, Miss Who. As you can see, they're the cutest ghosts ever... Although they're not ghosts in the strict sense of the word, but more like extensions of me. It's a shame, but I can't summon the souls of the dead.
That's right! I'm the Ghost Princess! That's what I call myself, and what others should call me. I commend you for recognizing my elegance right away. That's more than I can say for ~player~.
Horohorohoro, of course you'd recognize my great taste in fashion right away! Your eyes don't betray you. I'm the one and only, self-proclaimed, Ghost Princess! Feel free to address me as such.
Horohorohoro... maybe. Don't you think it'd be a shame to get a servant who can die at any time? Death is annoying... But if they're undead, then they'll be with me forever and ever!

I'm not gonna lie, Lady Cynthia, I'd much prefer having an undead servant. A servant who can never die because they're already dead is perfect! I wouldn't want a servant who can die at any time. It's annoying.

I-Is this really happening? Am I going to become an official princess? Yes, please! Prinzessin Fischl, I kindly accept this honor. Does this mean I get a tiara? I need a way to show people that I am a princess, in case they don't believe me again.

F-For real...? Prinzessin Fischl, I... I'm gonna cry... I'll finally be a true princess! Now everybody will have to believe me when I present myself as such. Oh, but I'll need a tiara, or something... Do you have it on you, my Prinzessin?
Oh, thank you! Nobody ever compliments my boots. Maybe because they're too entranced by my eyes, probably. However, I can fly on my own perfectly well.
I don't need boots to fly, but thank you for noticing how red they are. That's why I picked them. I think most people can't stop looking at my eyes, that's why they go by unnoticed.
I-It's not easy, okay? I'm sure everybody is gonna make fun of my breasts... Especially you, Nico Robin! I have a suspicion you're a secret bully.
This is perfectly normal, Nico Robin! You're the weird one! I'm sure everybody has been waiting for this moment to mock me for my body... especially you!
Finally somebody notices! They're super cute, right? I made them myself. You can touch them if you want.
Good eye, Nico Robin! They're cute, right? Do you wish yours were as cute? I made these myself.
That's right! I'm not braggy, but I did put all my effort into it and it shows. That's why this is the cutest dress in the world, and that's a fact.
Sure did! The only reason this outfit is the cutest in the whole word is because I made it. No big deal.
How rude! I can fly because of my ability, and you don't believe me... Maybe I should fly over there and sit on your head. How would you like that?
You have wings and you can't fly? Horohorohoro, that's funny! You're like a chicken. Flying is just part of my Hollow Hollow ability.
Rocket boots? That's ridiculous... In what kind of world would that be a thing? No, I just ate a fruit that gives me abilities, and one of them is flying.
Thank you! I am stylish, aren't I? But what's your excuse for wearing a school uniform if you have an eye for fashion?
That's so rude! And a little bit hurtful... I'm fine with you saying I'm creepy, or cute, or amazing. But "weird"? Nuh-huh...
You got another question for me? Your interest is duly noted.
Yes? Ask me anything!
Natsuki gets it... I finally found someone who gets it.
Thank you, Natsuki... Sniff... It took me so long to find someone who understands.
Sh-shave...? Of course! I could never strive for cuteness if I was all hairy down there.
O-of course I shave! I guess you'll all see in a second, so I'm not ruining the surprise... Not that this is meant to be a surprise!
You wanna know what I do? I'll give you a clue! I go around delighting people with my presence and exquisite style.
My profession? I'm not bound by such an antiquated concept. I just go wherever I want, telling people what to do whether they like it or not.
That sounds like loser talk...
Oh, yeah? Is that what they taught you at loser school?!
I'm not into divinations. Although I did buy a crystal ball once at a flea market. It didn't work, but it makes for a decent mirror.
You think so just because I'm well dressed? Thank you! I do own a crystal ball that I bought cheap, but it only functions as a mirror.
Worthy? Me? I-I mean, of course I am! Horohorohorohoro...!
What?! I lost again?! Why...?!
How could I lose again? I'm great at this game!
Who made me lose again?! I need someone to blame for this!
This is your fault! You're playing too well...
This makes three losses in a row! Is this a prank?! Where are they hiding?!
Three... Three consecutive losses... Why...?
No, no, no...! This can't be happening! This isn't the way it was supposed to go!
Why do I keep losing? Why are you all doing this to me?
I lost already?! Stupid game, I hate it!
I lost first?! Stupid! Who made these rules?
Darn it, I wanted to win this game and gloat about not losing a single round. Now that's ruined...
Oh, shucks... Well, I had a good run.
So you couldn't continue losing, so I could keep on winning... Disappointing.
Noooo...! Why did you let me win for so long? Just to give me hope? Now I... Now I have to...
Oh, no...! B-but... It's been so long since I've lost that I forgot what to do. I'm serious...
I don't mind losing, but it's a pity that I have to remove this adorable outfit of mine. Isn't it adorable? HUH?!
Ah... What a pain... This just feel like a waste of time to me, but I'll comply.
Gah, I can't believe I lost. Even losing once is a disgrace in this dumb game.
It's just one loss. I know it's no big deal, but it still pisses me off!
I don't hate losing. It's just that I prefer to win.
Meh, this still hasn't gotten serious. If I thought I was in any real danger, I'd skedaddle in a flash.
I lost again? Crazy things can happen.
Hmmm, how weird... This time I definitely was trying to win.
This isn't going like it was supposed to... Now I have to undress for real.
Oh no... Seems like I can't go on only removing small items.
Now I gotta undress for real! Just... be respectful.
Oh, crap... It seems I can't get away without actually stripping this time.
I shouldn't have to do anything I don't want to do... Including this!
Am I losing too much? I think I am...
I won't lose my cool. If I do, then I'd really lose...
W-whatever... I won't let you see me sweat.
Now I'm really starting to worry... I can't keep losing like this.
Dammit... I really thought I had it.
Aaaahhhh...! {small}Dammit.{!reset}
You will pay for this... You will all pay.
This sucks...! Why are you doing this to me..?
Can't you make an exception? Just for me? Pretty please?
Ohhh... I'm feeling lightheaded... Someone hold me...
Ohhh... I think I'm gonna pass out...! I'm falling down... But the floor is disgusting!
I'm not feeling well...! I need to sit down for a second... Never mind.
Of course I know your name! It's umm... Thie... Str... Cat... Catherine!
Don't sass me! I obviously know your name, since I actually pay attention. But why don't you say it again, 'cause I'm sure ~player~ wasn't listening.
B-But, umm... Doesn't that bother you, Cat Burglar? That your friend is so much stronger than you? I'm sure you resent her, right?
Huh...? But... but I'm sure that bothers you, right? You curse your own weakness, Cat Burglar, and you secretly wish you were stronger than Nico Robin!
Helloooo...! I'm the one on the spotlight here! How rude of you two, talking to each other while I'm stripping...
Uhhh, hey...! I'm the one everybody should be focusing on now! How dare you two steal my thunder by complimenting each other... Hmph!
Horohorohoro...! No need to feel so offended, ladies. It was just question, because you two seem more like a couple than friends to me... I'm sure ~player~ agrees.
Woah, why are you getting so heated? I was merely commenting on how close you two seem... I'm sure I'm not the only one that finds it suspicious, horohorohoro!
You don't get it... I came here thinking I could maybe become friends with someone, and I run into two former enemies, and they keep rubbing in my face what good friends they are. This is agony.

I knew you wouldn't understand. I come here hoping maybe I could find a servant... or at least a friend, and I find two of my former enemies, who also happen to be each other's best friends, and have to keep reminding me of that.
What are you two doing? I was obviously apologizing for... Wh-What's happening?
Huh? How can the two of you have such bad memory? Obviously I was referring to... I-I don't get what you're doing.
Oh, thank you! Perhaps you do have some taste after all, Rocket Man... Even if you don't show it in your fashion style.
How kind of you to compliment my dress. I made it myself, so it's an original Perona. A one of a kind.
It's a common question, isn't it? Maybe I want to understand your friendship better, maybe I'm just curious... Who cares? Just answer it.
Woah, that's a very serious accusation! You think I, the Ghost Princess, would do something so low? I'm just curious... So answer it already!
Devil Fruits? They're not that common. The one I ate tasted like crap, but I got this cool ability after. I just can't swim anymore... But I can fly, so who cares?
There are a bunch of different Devil Fruits, but they're pretty rare. You lose the ability to swim if you eat one, but you get an awesome power in exchange. Though mine is the the best one.
I'll have you know I'm a terrific master! I don't ask my servants to do anything worse than giving me a foot massage every now and then, and paying me respect.
Hey, I said I want a servant, not a slave! I treat everyone who works for me well. I give them cute outfits to wear, and only demand a moderate amount of worshiping.
Maybe you came here to get naked. I came here to win, and potentially find a new servant while I relish in the humiliation of people like you.
Joke's on you! I have no intention of showing more of my body. I just came to kill some time, and maybe find a new servant. Seeing strangers get humiliated is just a bonus.
Horohorohoro, no! There's only one Devil Fruit of each kind, so there's no more people like me! If there were... Then I... I would like to know where they are.
Nope! I'm one of a kind! Unique! Peerless! Just me! Just me...
Don't tell me what I can't be! I can be an idol if I want to! I just need to know what it is first...
Oh, you think so, huh? That's it! I decided I'll become an idol! First I need to figure out what an idol is...
Oh, thank you! You're so nice! I think you're a lot better as a zombie. You should go around like that all the time.
Thank you, horohorohoro! You look so much lovelier as a zombie! I don't know why you would wear that makeup.
Senpai? Me? It finally happened... If only I could enjoy this moment.
You can call me anything you want! B-But I like senpai.
Oh, Absalom... Well, you do have a point. I wonder where he is right now...
Ah, you're talking about Absalom. Yeah, he was kind of a creep. I still miss him, though.
He did, huh? Is he still as negative as before? Or has he become a more cheerful person, maybe? I hope so...
Hmph! Well, I'm a bigger person, so I hope he's doing well and has become an overall more positive person than he was back then.
Oh no, the island was quite lovely! Just the kind of place I'd love to make my home... But there was no one around, so it got old pretty quickly.
Actually, I love the island itself! Such beautiful scenery is only fitting for a self-proclaimed princess like myself... Too bad there was nobody to serve me.
Yes, we're together. Only because I get bored, so I tag along with him when... Oh, y-you mean together together? N-no, we're not.
T-together...?! No, we're not! He's more like my roommate... My emotionally distant roommate, whom I accompany on adventures because I get bored.
I know! I miss it so much... The darkness, the silence, how the mist blocked the sun. Although, when the mist wasn't as thick, I swear I would sometimes see these giant things with eyes...
Ah, the Florian Triangle... Such a beautiful sea. I loved how scary it was. Some days, within the mist, I'd see giant things, like mountains, with glowing red eyes, and...
I also used to think like that, Prince Miko... back when I had lots of servants! You really can't appreciate what you have until you lose it. They were so cute and loyal...
Once I had as many servants as I wanted, but I lost them all in one night... And now I'm alone. I took them for granted. If I had another chance, I'd treat them better.
Oh, well... They don't really learn things... Or do things... Or talk, even... B-but I'm very proud of them.
My ghosts don't really do much aside from looking cute, and making people negative... Ummm... Still, I love them very much.
I know, right?! That's why now all my friends are plushies... Ah, well... Not all of them. I also have... Ummm...
I'm not a witch either, but thank you for thinking I am. You're very kind with your compliments.
Oh, thank you! I always wanted to be confused with a witch, but I'm not one. Though I do appreciate the compliment.
Woah, I actually understood that. I like how you said the words slowly. But I think I'm plenty charismatic already, and people still avoid me... What do I do, Prince Miko?
Oh... Thank you for explaining slowly, even if you used big words. But how do I become more charismatic, Prince Miko? I thought I already had a sufficient amount of charm...
Thriller Bark was a humongous ship floating in the Florian Triangle. That's a beautiful area, with thick fog that covers the sunlight, so it always looks like night.

Thriller Bark is actually a ship, not an island, but it was just as big. We used to sail on the Florian Triangle. Ah, it was gorgeous there. The fog covered the sun most days, so everything was surrounded by darkness.

I did not! I treat him nicely, and I even cook for him... He's the one who doesn't give me any compliments. Like these thigh highs, he never said they were cute. But you think they're cute, right ~player~?

I don't order him around that much! And it would be pointless, because he likes to ignore me. He didn't even say that these thigh highs are cute when I showed them to him. ~Player~, do you think they're cute?
I ate a funny fruit. Not only can I fly, but also... Wait, why am I telling you this? I should keep my abilities a secret.
One day, I hate this funny looking fruit, and then I could do all this stuff. Not just the flying, but also... Hmmm, on second thought, I'm not telling you! Horohorohoro...!
That's a most wonderful idea! But I'm afraid it wouldn't be possible... When I tell people to dress better, they just get mad and I'm forced to defend myself. sigh
Oh, if only it were so simple! I always tell those dirty pirates to dress properly, but they get mad! And then I have to take them down before they lay their hands one me.
Don't get me wrong, I like messing with people for my own amusement too. But I have actual powers, so I don't need to make stuff seem like it's real.
I like tricking people too, even when I have no reason for it. It's funny. But I make it clear that it's all thanks to my ability, and not just some fancy trick.
Oh... Well, I do admit that sometimes I feel like it would be nice to have someone to talk to... Oh wait, did you mean "lovely"? Y-Yeah, it is...
Horohorohoro! No, he's human. I don't know if I'd consider him my friend, or viceversa... He's the man that lets me live in his castle, so I guess he's more like my roommate.
Y-You mean he might be shy? I never thought about that, but it makes sense... Living with a girl of such cute taste as myself must be intimidating. Maybe I should try reaching out to him more.
Well... I think these thigh highs are cute! That's why I wear them. If you don't like them, Nami, it's your problem! What do you think, ~player~?
If you don't like my thigh highs, Nami, then there's something wrong with you! Let's ask someone else if they're cute... ~Player~?
I'm sticking to my principles... Even if it means showing my naked body for the first time to someone else.
No... T-this is the first time someone else will see me naked. Just don't say anything hurtful, like that I'm not cute. Even if you think it, don't say it.
Ok-Okay... I'm relaxed... Breathe in... Breathe out... Breathe in...
Got it! I'm not nervous... I'm not nervous! No, I'm not!
I already had my dream... kinda. The animals were zombies, so I thought they would be with me forever, but they died anyway. Sniff Sorry, it's only been two years. It still hurts.
I had my own group of cute zombie animals once before. But two years ago they were killed... Well, they were already dead, so I guess they weren't exactly "killed". But they're gone, and I miss them.
Lord Moria? Evil? If those pirates were dumb enough to fall into our trap, and not strong enough to escape, then they deserved what we did to them. That's how it works.
I wouldn't put it like that. If you want to be a pirate, you gotta accept that there can be people out there that are stronger than you and can screw you over.
Horohorohoro, okay! If you insist, here I go... {negative} Laaaa... laaa... lalalaaaaa... lalaaaaaaaaa...! {!reset}
But it's so embarrassing... Okay! If you insist, here I go... {negative} Laaaa... laaa... lalalaaaaa... lalaaaaaaaaa...! {!reset}
What is...? What do you mean, Chantelle? I was just laughing...
Huh? I don't understand your question. That's just me laughing...
I already told you! I'm not a ghost!
Didn't you hear me earlier? I'm not a ghost! I'm alive! Hmph, I'm just not in the mood...
Horohorohoro, you're so ignorant, Chantelle. Thigh highs are the cutest piece of clothing. Let's ask ~player~... What do you think about these? Aren't they cute?
You don't know anything about fashion, Chantelle. These are thigh highs, and they're the cutest piece of clothing a girl can wear. What do you think, ~player~? You agree, right?
Just don't make fun of my breasts, okay? I know they're too big for anyone to like them already. You don't need to point that out.
Don't say anything insensitive about my breasts, please. If only they were smaller, they'd be cute... and then men would find them attractive.
I've never let anyone else see me naked. I'm sure everyone else here has shown their body to other people multiple times... especially Chantelle.
And to think that nobody has ever seen me naked... I'm probably the only one here in that situation. At least I'm sure that's not the case for Chantelle.
So you like my undergarments? Thank goodness! I was about to question my fashion sense... My fashion sense, space lady!
Oh, that's a relief! For a moment I was worried that I made the wrong decision picking these undergarments... That would be terrible!
I can fly thanks to my Devil Fruit ability... Duh! Shouldn't you know this? And you call yourself a nerd, horohorohoro!
Obviously I can fly because of my Devil Fruit ability. I'm surprised you don't know this. Life must be hard for you if you're a nerd, but you're not very smart.
I dunno... They're ghosts, doesn't that answer your question? It's not like you can touch them and do experiments on them... nor would I allow that!
No idea. I've never asked myself that question. All I care about is that they're cute. If you want to start poking them, or something, save it! And it's not like you'd discover anything.
Oh no, I can't swim, classy pirate lady! Because of my Devil Fruit, you know? I've been cursed by the sea, or whatever... Anyway, I'm sure I wouldn't like swimming... {small}probably.{!reset}
But I can't swim, because I ate a Devil Fruit. So the sea has cursed me, blah blah blah... Whatever, it's not like I've ever wanted to go swimming.
No... My Lord's dream was crushed, and that means no more zombie army. Isn't that tragic, Lady Cynthia?
Lord Moria's dream is dead... just like the thousands of zombies we were hoping to gather. Heartbreaking, isn't it Lady Cynthia?
They're real...! This is so frustrating... I bet you've never had anyone else accuse you of having fake assets...
My ghosts are not fake...! Hmph! How would you feel if someone told you something you have is fake, huh? Huh...?!
W-We're not married! He's a jerk, and I hate him... {small}sometimes.{!reset} He never pays attention to me, he doesn't eat my food, and he never compliments my appearance. Jerk!
No, we're not a couple! Aside from letting me live in his castle, he's a major jerk. The nicest thing he has said to me all week is that I'm loud. I hate him, kinda...
I wish I had a more delicate frame. I'm sure no other princesses have such... voluptuous proportions as myself.
I think I'd feel better about my body if it was less plump. Princesses usually have small breasts and derrire, right? So I should too...
You're too kind, classy lady. I thought having zombie servants meant that they would never die and leave me, and then they were exorcised. I don't know anymore.
Thank you for your sympathy. The saddest part is that I already had a perfectly cute group of servants, but they were killed... Or rather exorcised. Goes to show that even zombies are not forever.
Peace...? Why would the undead want peace? All they want to do is party and scare people! They'd get bored if they move on to this afterlife.
Huh? Zombies and ghosts don't want peace! They want to scare people and have fun. I doubt there's any of that in the afterlife.
Oh... I've never thought about that. I guess I wouldn't mind having a little version of me who likes everything I like, and dresses exactly like me, horohorohoro...

Me? Having descendants? Th-That's not something that has ever crossed my mind. If I had one I could make them like the same things I like, and dress them any way I want... That doesn't sound bad at all.
Oh, I already have a dress I want to be buried in. It's much more elegant than this one. I have to go out in style, after all.
I have a different dress saved for being buried with. I put much more effort into that one. It's the only way I can look cute for all of eternity, after all.
Wait... you liked it? What was you favorite part of it?
You liked Thriller Bark... ? I find that hard to believe. What did you like the most, huh? Huh...?

I know, right?! I was gonna say that too... It's unbecoming of a princess not to be able to take baths. But do ever try to take one anyway, and then you have to get out of the tub with what little strength you have left, and it takes like two hours...?
Oh my gosh! That's what I think! And showers are the worst. Do you ever step on the soap when you're taking a shower, and then you bonk your head on the wall?
I love compliments almost as much as I love Kumacy. But I don't buy them coming from someone who dresses like she's going to the beach.
Ohhh... Forgive me if I have a hard time believing that a woman who dresses like she's going to the beach thinks my stylish dress is cute.

He's such a jerk that he never tells me I look nice, even when I ask him... He never thanks me for cooking for him, and he doesn't say "You're welcome" when I thank him for cooking. He doesn't even like my thigh highs...

He completely ignores my innuendos, he doesn't make eye contact when I talk to him, and he doesn't even ask me how I'm doing most days! Can you believe he also doesn't like my thigh highs? I can tell from his look...

I prefer to call them "fun". There's nothing like seeing the color leave someone's face after they see my body going through a wall, or through them... Horohorohoro! It's one of life's great delights.
They don't all make you fly! Some make you shoot things, or transform into things, or summon things... but then you can't swim anymore.
Nuh-uh, they're not inside me. Well, maybe they are... But it's more like I create them. I can make as many of them as I want, and in different sizes and shapes.

They're not inside me! I can create my ghosts at will. I could make a hundred of them if I want to... although I'd probably tired. I can also make them small enough to fit in my hand, or big and fat like... someone who's fat.
I wasn't planning on playing this game today! I was out for a stroll and I walked in here. Also, I know Kumacy would feel sad and lonely if I didn't take him with me, so... who's the weirdo?
I only came to this game on an impulse. It's not like I needed reservations. And I know Kumacy gets lonely when I don't take him with me. I bet your friend is crying at home right now, you... weirdo.
Oh, aren't you a direct kitty, horohorohoro...! I like that.
I can't deny it... You're my favorite type of kitty.
At first I was disappointed that you took off your cat suit... But even without it, I still think you're... {small}kinda cute.{!reset}
Well... I do like little Plagg. He makes my heart feel full, while... I-I think you're cute too, just not in the same way.
I do have my own code. For instance, I try to avoid causing trouble unnecessarily, which involves attacking innocent people for no reason. Now if they're jerks, that's a different story.
If I have a code, it'd be that I only harm jerks. That means I don't harm animals, because they're simply misunderstood. And I don't hurt kids... unless the kid's a jerk. Then it's debatable.
That's not gonna happen, lady! I have nothing under my dress... I mean, not nothing. I have my undergarments... I do wear undergarments, you'll see...
Nope! Nothing will come out of my dress, because I have nothing underneath... except my undergarments! That's a very important clarification.
Sadly, as a pirate it would be unlikely that I could be officially recognized as a princess. But I don't care! I can make people respect me quite easily, after all.
Most people just care about me being a pirate, and then ignore that I'm also a princess. But I don't complain, because it gives me an excuse to punish them into being nice to me.
Ohhh, there are so many qualities that I find cute. But for starters I'd say it's a combination of huggable and adorable, with the right amount of creepy. Ah, that's what makes me heart flutter.

Cuteness is hard to define... but I can do it! For example, cub bears are adorable right? But if that bear also has sharp teeth and red eyes then it becomes cute! It's all in that mix of cuddly and spooky.

Y-You're right... How could I be so narrow-minded? Meeting one pervy bat doesn't mean that all of them are the same. Thank you, pervy bat lady! Now cockroaches are another story. They're all awful, no question!

That's true... Gosh, I can't believe I was such a bigot. I promise I'll never doubt my love for bats again, pervy bat lady! I think I learned an important lesson... but all cockroaches are still horrible creatures that deserve to be crushed!
Hmmm, I'm not sure I understand... I think I'll bring her a bottle of milk and a ball of yarn! Maybe a fish too... No cat can resist that, horohorohoro!
What do you mean? A cat is a cat... Oh, I should get some milk, fish and the final touch: a ball of yarn! With that I'm sure to convince her to follow me home, horohorohoro!

They grow all over the place. You might be buying apples at the market one day and randomly stumble upon a funky looking one that happens to be a Devil Fruit. There's a book that shows all the fruits that are known... Hmm, I wonder if mine is in there too.

There was this guy in my crew that ate a fruit that allowed him to turn invisible. I would hate having a power like that! What's the point in an ability that makes it so others cannot see you? Besides, he was a major pervert. I wonder what happened to him...

Hmmm, when was it? I can't remember... I think Lord Moria gave it to me as a gift. But I do remember loving ghosts since I was little. It's almost as if this fruit chose me, horohorohoro! Or maybe I'm just lucky.
That's kinda weird... But you don't think big breasts are unsightly? Well, yours are even bigger than mine, so I'm sure you're bias.
Okay... that's weird. I doubt anyone will find my big breasts attractive... I don't know how you handle it when yours are huge.
Why are you complimenting me all of a sudden? Not that I don't like it... I make my own clothes because even the expensive stuff they sell is terrible!
Did you figure out that I like to receive compliments? Either way, I have to make my own clothes. Have you seen the quality of the clothes they sell in those stores? I'm sure you have.
What do I do? Well... I'm a pirate, so I guess I do whatever I want. Right now, I want admire how adorable you are.
Professions are so lame... I do whatever I want to do! Mostly I just look around for cute and adorable things, like you.
W-Why would my dress be ruined? Are you planning something, Rocket Man? Attendant! Please, keep my dress away from that man...! Dammit, why aren't there attendants here?!
I knew it! You're planning on ruining my dress, aren't you? Attendant, put my dress as far as possible from this Rocket Man! Eh? There are no attendants here? Then who takes care of our clothes?!
You think my ghosts are illusions? Why don't you touch them, then? Horohorohoro...! But don't. For your own sake.
Oh... If you have doubts about how real my ghosts are, you're welcome to touch them. Horohorohoro, I'm kidding! You shouldn't.
What is "Dea de Mooertas"? I only speak one language... The one I'm speaking now.
What does that mean? "Dea de Mooertas"... Sounds fancy, but I've never heard of it.
Horohorohoro! Finally, someone who appreciates how cute my ghosts are. I'm happy...
Horohorohoro! Nothing makes me happier than people recognizing that my ghosts are adorable. Most people are just scared, which is still fine.
Of course, no doll could be as well dressed as me. It'd be a monumental challenge to make this outfit in miniature, after all.
Ah, good to know that I'm better dressed than a doll. It's not like it'd be easy to make these clothes in doll size.
Komicy, you really get it! When I first lost Kumacy, I used to cry myself to sleep. But hugging his doll I sleep much better, and comfortable.
Men are so dumb. The other day one yelled at me "Girl, nice wagon!". But I wasn't carrying anything! They just spout out nonsense for no reason.
Men are stupid. I've heard them use words like "badonkadonk" when talking about me. What does that even mean?!
Devil Fruits can be sold for up to 5 billion beli! I'm sure you don't have that kind of money, or you'd be dressed better.
Fool! A Devil Fruit can be sold in the black market for up to 5 billion beli. Even if you had that kind of money, you'd be better off spending it on clothes.
I don't know... Your thighs look soft to me. But it's a good idea to say you have muscle when they call you chubby.
Oh, good idea. I'll say I have muscle next time someone calls me chubby too. Can't be disproven, after all.
My outfit is beautiful! Thank you! But I won't take it off. This is just a bump in the road. I'm taking off my wristwatch.
Oh, okay... I did think it was inappropriate. But you apologized, and called me beautiful, so I forgive you.
Listen, blue hair lady, I'm gonna have to ask you to keep your eyes on my head. You just seem a little too eager to see what's under my dress.
Of course, I've been floating this whole time. Didn't you notice? Check out these cute thigh highs. What do you think, ~player~?
No, you're not allowed to enjoy this! I am not, so why should you? Just don't say anything rude. Or better yet, don't say anything.
Blue hair lady, I appreciate your infatuation with... my body. I'm sorry I can't reciprocate your feelings, but I guess it's fine if you just look at me and continue saying nice things.
Yeah! They pack quite a punch. I'm sure I could kill someone with enough... Oh, you meant the ghosts. Nah, they just disappear when they explode.
The ghosts disappear when they explode. Even if they didn't, they wouldn't get hurt because they're intangible. The people affected by the explosions are a different story, horohorohoro!
I love Halloween! But I live everyday like it's Halloween, scaring people, taking their candy, and eating it all by myself...
I live every day like it's Halloween, kitty... minus the costume, of course. So the only difference when it's actually Halloween is that nobody complains when I take their candy.
You like my clothes, lovely Natsuki...? She likes my clothes! I made these myself... D-Do you want me to dress you in my style?
I made these clothes! And they are adorable! Thank you for noticing, sweet Natsuki! Would... would you want me to make clothes for you?
Horohorohoro, thank you! I wish I could return the compliment, but... Well, you dress okay, I guess.
Horohorohoro, thank you! I love it when people recognize my peerless dressing style. You dress nice too... kinda.
Oh, that's... That's a good point! Now I get to show you my undergarments. I put a lot of care into them too, and nobody ever sees them...
Actually, that's a good point... Nobody ever sees my underwear, so they never comment on it. Now I'm getting a little excited!
Ho! Knee socks are just lesser thigh highs... You agree, right? ~Player~?
Oh, please... Knee socks are thigh highs uglier cousin. What do you think, ~player~? Aren't thigh highs the best?
Hair? What are you saying? Are you trying to tick me off?
Hair? You really think I have hair down there? I'm offended... Indignant!
I'm only comfortable being the first the expose her chest because there are only women here. If there was a man, it would be a different story.
I didn't want to be first, but at least there are no men here. I don't want my breasts to be judged by a male gaze.
I can't believe I'm exposing my bosom in the presence of a man. Just... don't say anything. Please.
I never thought I'd be the first girl to show her breasts. And in front of a man, no less! At least with mine being the first, you can't compare them to someone else's.
I hate being the first one to... uncover her special place. I tried so hard to not get to this.
Why couldn't someone else get to this spot before me? You girls are the worst.
I don't like going first, I think I mentioned it before. At least I'm not showing anything you've never seen before in front of a mirror.
A man is going to see me without my panties for the first time... This is definitely not how I thought this would go.
I can't believe I'm showing my body to a man for the first time because of this stupid game. It's so ridiculous...
I always thought it would be in a very different context where I'd let a man see me naked...
Anyway, I don't think I need this wristwatch. Horohorohoro...! What a genius idea!
Horohorohoro, I just had a most dastardly idea... I'll take off my wristwatch. I bet nobody has ever thought of that.
I'm taking off my dress. It would suck if it got dirty while playing this stupid game.
Yeah, yeah, give me a second! I just have to find this dress's zipper.
I made this dress myself! It's one of a kind, so don't just leave it with the rest of the clothes. I don't want it to get dirty.
Don't rush me! I just have to find this dress' zipper in the back... No, I don't need help! Just be patient...
Guess I'll take off my hat. Where is the hat rack in this place? Don't tell me there isn't one here.
My hat is coming off. Don't think this means I respect you. I'm just making myself comfortable.
I'm taking off my hat. Where's the hat rack...? Well, isn't there at least a chair I can leave it on? A clean one?
I'll take off my hat. By the way, I'm very offended that nobody offered to take it when I came here. Does nobody work here?
I'll just take off my boots, no biggie... What do you think of my thigh highs? Aren't they cute, ~player~?
My boots come off, then. Now you can see more of my thigh highs. Do you like them, ~player~? Do you?
I'll remove my boots. Do you see these thigh highs? They're cute, aren't they? I like them... What do you think, ~player~?
I suppose my boots are the obvious choice. I'm happy to show more of these cute thigh highs! What do you think of them, ~player~?
I'm not taking off my thigh highs until ~player~ says they're cute. So I guess there's only one option...
I decided I'm not removing my thigh highs! You can thank ~player~ for being so inconsiderate. So I guess I can only remove...
I'm not taking off my thigh highs... EVER! So my corset it is. You can thank ~player~ for this.
Until ~player~ says that my thigh highs are cute, I'm not taking them off! Then... I have only one other option.
A respectable lady would never do this in front of strangers. What a disgrace...
I don't know why I still haven't escaped. Well, it's too late for that now anyway...
I-I've never let anyone see me naked... And now I'm doing it for you bunch of ruthless jerks.
Just don't stare at me too much. I'm sure I don't look as good without clothes.
I'll take them off, okay! But you'll be begging me to put my panties back on in a minute. They're too cute.
Since small items count, I'll take off my wristwatch. Thanks for giving me the idea, morons!
Let's see, what's the smallest thing I have... Ah, my watch! Perfect.
I have nothing smaller than my wristwatch, so I know what I'm going with.
Considering everybody is choosing their smallest items first, it's only logical that I'll remove my wristwatch.
Y-Yeah, I already knew your name... I was just testing you! Horohorohoro!
Maybe because it's so BORING! Sounds like an old maid's name... Nami.
Horohorohoro...! It's been so long since my hard work has been acknowledged. Thank you!
I thought being praised meant nothing to me... Horohorohoro...! But I can't stop laughing. I suddenly feel so happy.
I could explain to you why your taste in clothing is so terrible, but we'd be here all day. So I'll just sum it up in one word: uncute!
What's so bad about your fashion? First of all, you're not wearing a hat. Every man who doesn't wear a hat is asking for others to scoff at him!
Grrrr... {small}I'll try again later.{!reset}
{small}Hmph, it didn't work this time... But I won't give up.{!reset}
Awww... You really think so? I do take a lot of care of my image, since... Wait, what were we talking about before? I think I forgot.
F-For real...? I wasn't thinking you too would say something nice about me... W-Wait a second! That wasn't what I was trying to achieve here...
Ice cream...? Nobody has ever invited me for ice cream...
How can you not appreciate someone else telling you a scary story to go to sleep? Do you know how lucky you are?!
Are you kidding me?! Why doesn't anything go according to plan?
What...? That was it?! You just went back to being all friendly?! Grrrr...
What? Now you stay quiet? That's better, at least. Just keep silently judging me with your eyes...
You're... not gonna say anything? That's fine. I got tired of what I was doing anyway.
I don't get it... Why are you two being so nice to me all of a sudden? B-But, I don't mind... I like it, horohorohoro...
Wh-Why...? I didn't do anything to deserve those compliments... But, please, don't stop! I like it... Horohorohoro!
Don't try to dissuade me now...! Wait, are you an idol? I don't wanna be like you. Okay, then I decided not to become one.
I just said I'll become an idol...! Unless... you are one. Hmmm, I decided I won't do it, then. That was my third shortest career path ever.
A wig?! How dare you?! I'll have you know my hair is 110% real! You can pull on it if you want! All of you, come pull on my hair!
A wig?! You thought I wear a wig?! I've never felt this insulted... Come pull on my hair so you can see it's real! I'm serious, come pull on it!
I understand your pain... I'd love to help you! It's been so long since I've picked clothes for a zombie. It'll be just like old times!
I know, right? If only there was someone who... Wait, me! I can help you! I'll pick a nice outfit for you that will make you look like a star. Horohorohoro, this is exciting!
You thought I wear I wig? Horohorohoro, that's funny! But seriously, just ditch that makeup and embrace your zombieness.
Horohorohoro, I don't wear a wig! You know, you should stop using makeup. You have a really nice skin tone for a zombie, there's no point in hiding that.
Yes, it is! Horohorohoro, you didn't know that before coming here? Adorable!
Of course it's strip poker! How cute, to come here without knowing that... Cute and brave.
Relax... If you ask me, I think you looked better in that wedding dress. At least compared to your new trashy outfit, horohorohoro.
Did you at least keep the wedding dress? I think it suited you better than this new sleazy look you have going now. No offense.
Ho, you got me... Though to be honest, he should cheer up a bit. No person should be that negative on life. It's not healthy.
Horohorohoro, you got me... But seriously, no person should be as depressed as him. It hurts my soul. Throw him a surprise party, or something.
Yesss... Let me tell you more about the kind of things I like... Wait, why am I chit chatting with you? Hmph, no more talking! I'm here to humiliate you.
Oh, it was perfect! At least until... Huh?! Why am I talking to you again? I'm not here to talk about my taste with you, vixen! I'm here to beat you.
You think he's nice? Horohorohoro! He's the worst, always telling me to shut up, ignoring me, and... {small}Okay, he's pretty nice.{!reset}
Horohorohoro! Letting me live in his castle is not enough for me to respect him. If only he wasn't such a jerk... {small}I-I guess he's nice, though...{!reset}
Gosh, you're such a scaredy cat. Those things were real, though. I wasn't lying.
Horohorohoro, good to know you get scared so easily. I did see those humongous things, though. I'm curious to know what they were.
Hoh! Joke's on you! My ghosts are transparent, so I could never use them to cover my body. Pfff, I'm not sorry for making you look like a fool.
Horohorohoro...! You fool! You don't realize it, but you've just given me a wonderful idea! Spooking the dealer...
They do make me happy! I always feel less lonely with my ghosts flying around... even though they're basically me.
I am proud of my ghosts! I mean, sure... It would be nice if they could talk, and play games with me. But it's a mother's duty to love her children no matter what.
I hate begging, but couldn't you spare a few retainers for me? I'm not greedy, just around... five would be perfect.
Are you sure you couldn't share a few of your retainers with me? Just four would be great... Well, maybe five.
So I need to be more authoritative... I get it! I'll use my ability to make everyone fall to their knees until they obey me! Thank you, Prince Miko!
I see... I have to let my authority shine through! I'll make the entire world negative until it fits in the palm of my hand! Horohorohoro...! Thank you, Prince Miko!
Destination? No, we would just stay in the Florian Triangle, waiting for ships to lure in so Lord Moria could steal their shadows and build an army of zombies. Very normal stuff.
We weren't sailing anywhere with the ship. We just stayed in the Florian Triangle waiting for unaware victims, so Lord Moria could take their shadows, and make a zombie army.
Horohorohoro! Magicians have impeccable taste in fashion, so I like being mistaken for one. Sure, I guess I'm a magician.
Horohorohoro, please...! I like magicians, so... Sure, I'm a magician. I do magic and... stuff.

You mean having my own brand of clothing...? That doesn't sound like a bad idea! I could make clothes for all ages and sizes! And then after everybody wears them, I'll never feel that people have bad taste anymore!
If anything happens to my dress, I'm blaming you, Rocket Man! And then I'll use your body as a shield to cover my undergarments while I go home.
I knew it! This is all a conspiracy to ruin my clothes and force me to fly home naked! ~Player~, you must protect me from Rocket Man and the evil people who work here!
Well, don't let how scary they are distract you from how cute they are! Look, they sometimes pull out their tongues.
They're not only scary, but also cute! I feel bad when people don't recognize their cuteness too.
I do live a pretty healthy lifestyle. I cook for myself, I sleep 10 hours on average, and I mostly drink cocoa. I intend to live to 120.
Of course! My lifestyle is exemplary. I eat well, I sleep well, I don't expose my skin to the sun more than I need to... I suppose I could exercise, but I don't want to.
Oh, you don't like them, do you?! So you're siding with Nami... Fine! Then I'm not taking them off! EVER!
You don't like them?! You don't have to say anything, I can see it in your face! Then side with this tasteless vixen. I'm not taking off my thigh highs!
What are you doing, Nami? I don't need your help... {small}But thanks...{!reset}
I don't want you defending me, Nami. We're not friends... {small}Thank you, though...{!reset}
You think I'm... cute? Even when I'm not wearing clothes? Well, I think you're nicer than I thought, Nami.
Are you just being nice to me because you feel pity, Nami? Either way... I appreciate it.
Thank you, bookworm girl! You're so nice to me for believing in my dream. Maybe I'll name one of my animals after you! A cute and spooky one... like a bat!
Thanks! I know I'll get there eventually. And maybe this time I'll get new animals in my kingdom! Like... a platypus! I'm sure they can be cute too.
Are you making fun of me, Chantelle? I think you're making fun of me! You do not mock another person's laugh!
Hey, don't make fun of my laugh! ~Player~, Chantelle is bullying me!
Oh, I'd so enjoy dressing you up, Chantelle! You have a nice build. There are so many dresses I could put you in... and new haircuts.
Really? I could spend hours picking new outfits for you, Chantelle... And even more working on that hair of yours. I'll make you look like an exotic doll, horohorohoro!
Oh, fine! Say nothing! I can tell you're on her side... Then I'll have to force you to like thigh highs by not taking them off! You'll regret this...
You don't like them, don't you? I can tell from your silence! I'll convince both you and Chantelle how cute thigh highs really are... by not taking them off!
You mean it? Big breasts can still be cute? I'm not sure...
Really? Even if they're this big someone can still find them cute?
You mean it? There's nothing weird about it? That's a relief...
Hmmm, at least it's good to know there's nothing strange about my naked body.
I know! I still need to learn how to record my own album. I've still yet to find someone who's brave enough to help me. The pressure is probably too high for them.
You're right! I have to learn how to put ads in the newspaper so I can find members for my band. I should request that they send a photo first, since they must be cute!
Maybe... No, but I love that island! It's so gorgeous and creepy... It's perfect for me! I just wish there were more people around... or at least one who could pay attention to me.
Even though it's his castle, I like to think I've given it my own personal touch. Before I moved in it looked abandoned creepy instead of cute creepy... And it was so dirty too!

What should I do for Hawk Eyes so he's less shy around me... Maybe a surprise party? Horohorohoro, I'm excited now. I wonder if he thinks I'm cute... Thank you, Komicy! You gave me a lot to think about.
I'm not bothering anyone, I'm just asking for honesty... But I can tell that's too much to ask! Now I don't feel like taking off my thigh highs.
Well, too bad! I put extra thought into my clothes because I want to be complimented... But if you're too much of a jerk to appreciate that, I won't take off my thigh highs, ~player~.
I-It wasn't me! It was Lord Moria... Please, don't yell at me, Lady Cynthia...
B-But... It wasn't that bad, I swear. Don't be mad, Lady Cynthia.
Of course! Horohorohoro...! I guess you don't need a scientific mind to tell that, only a mildly decent eye for taste.
That it is! Cute nerd, remember that cuteness is a concept that is beyond all your sciencing and formulaic equations, and stuff.
Hey, it's for your own good. Trust me. You haven't done anything to upset me, so I don't want you to touch one of my ghosts and get all depressed.
It's better for you if you don't touch my ghosts, you know? You don't look very cute when you're sad, so I'd rather you kept on smiling... Just because I like cuteness!
I-I'm not alone all the time... And that's not out of my own volition. I'm sure things will change for the better soon.
B-But I won't be alone all the time, won't I? And when I meet more people and I make new friends, I'm sure they'll appreciate my exquisite taste in clothing!
The reason why I ate it is not important. What's important is that now I have the cutest and most powerful ability in the world! Not being able to swim is a small price in return.
If I could eat that fruit again, I would do it in a heartbeat! My ability is {small}almost{!reset} unstoppable! And look just how cute these ghosts are, horohorohoro!
It's tragic for me! My life took a turn for the worse after that... Anyway, aren't these undergarments cute? I picked them myself.
Nothing was the same for me after that. A true tragedy of a life... but aren't my undergarments cute? I put a lot of thought into what I would wear today.
That's true, that's true... but now I'm feeling sad. I don't wanna feel sad, so let's talk about something else.
Mmmh, this conversation is bumming me out. Can't we instead talk about something positive, like dancing bears?
Do you like my undergarments too, Miss Who? I didn't put as much attention into them, but I'm glad you appreciate them!
My undergarments are cute too, right Miss Who? Horohorohoro, it feels good being appreciated! Even the parts I put less attention into.
Nico Robin! Could it be you like scary things too...? We should talk more!
Y-You really liked it! Unbelievable... Do you also find scary things cute, Nico Robin? I want to hear more from you!
That's... good. It didn't happen to me, by the way! It was... a friend of mine, horohorohoro...
Oh, good... Me neither.
So you were being honest...? I apologize for doubting you, Nico Robin... Feel free to feast your eyes on my gorgeous clothing, horohorohoro!
You were telling the truth...? How awful of me! Doubting a woman's fashion sense... You may look at my adorable undergarments all you'd like, Nico Robin.

My thigh highs! They're one of my favorite clothing items, but he never tells me they look cute, and gives me this look... Ah, see?! It's that same look ~player~ has! Well, I'm not taking them off until you say you like them!

He doesn't like my thigh highs! Can you believe that? With how cute they are? I can tell from his look... which is the same look ~player~ has now! Well, joke's on you, 'cause I'm not taking them off! Ever!
N-No, I'm not moving out... I have nowhere else to go. I just want him to be nice, and compliment my thigh highs for once... but he never does! Just like ~player~... Hmph, jerk!

I don't wanna move out just because he's a jerk! I'm sure I can force him to be nice to me, and compliment my appearance, like these thigh highs that I love... Maybe I can try the same with ~player~... You don't like them, do you?
Horohorohoro...! I knew you'd eventually believe they're real. That didn't take long.
Horohorohoro, well that was easy! Be scared, horohorohoro!
I know! And I love having ghosts and zombies around. I'd be bored to death if it wasn't for them.
Anyone with taste will tell you that having undead around only live things up. And if they don't like it, they can go to this afterlife, horohorohoro!
Nope! I'm sure my kids would be just like me... And I know that because their father, whoever he ends up being, will also be just like me!
Oh, that's a good point, Miss Who... Maybe my kid would like pineapple ice cream more than strawberry ice cream... Nah, that's crazy!
But I don't like to use explosions except as a last resort. Explosions are messy. They can destroy things that are not worth destroying. Ahhh, I'm so nice.
Explosions are still not my preferred method of combat. In fact I've learned not to use them when my real body is nearby. My body is too precious to put it in harm's way.
Ohhh, I love scaredy kids! You should tell me where they live and I'll give them a good scare. If you do I'll let you watch as thanks, eh?
Big deal! I can fly over everything. I could even fly over a tidal wave, and then I can safely watch all those suckers who can't get washed away, horohorohoro!
I-I do sometimes play with them a little, horohorohoro... But then I feel ashamed later. Maybe I should do it more.
Does it really feel that great? I guess I'll find out someday... Hopefully with someone with soft, warm hands.
Y-You tricked me! You distracted me with your nice conversation and I didn't even notice that I was taking off my panties... Did you do that on purpose?
What...? I-I'm naked! I got so caught up in that conversation that I didn't even notice I was undressing... At least I don't feel embarrassed now.
I don't know what you're talking about. It's a fruit... You eat one, you get a power. That's all there's to it.
Are you trying to confuse me with all your science talk? I think you're missing the bottom line: I have a cool power.
My former servants got purified... You see, they were zombies, and... Why did you have to remind me of that, you monster?!
I don't wanna talk about it... They're gone! All my former zombie servants got purified! Sniff...
Pfff, that's easy! I'm unique because I'm... I... W-why do I have to answer that? Stupid!
What makes me special? What makes me special... Horohorohoro! I can answer that... but I don't feel like it! Nope!
Horohorohoro! You flatter me. "Spooky cute" is exactly the style I was going for! It's just what I like.
Oh, thank you! I'm pleased my style is effective. I've always loved "spooky with a touch of cute". Or is it "cute with a touch of spooky"?
Oh, cute demons! I'd like to meet this Freddy. We could all hang out together! Horohorohoro...
Oh, I'm dying to see a cute demon! I wanna meet Freddy. You must introduce me.
Having said that, I'd love making dolls in my image. Just so I can hand them out to little girls, teach them about fashion...
Although... It might not be a bad idea to produce dolls based on me. Maybe if I give them to people, they'll feel like playing with me later. With the real me...
Where do you live? Beli is beli... It's the currency all around the world, as far as I know.
I don't know what you're talking about. Beli is the only money I know. Are you sure you don't get paid in candy, or something?
Are you serious?! Last time I go outside wearing those hotpants...
For real?! Unbelievable... I think I'll pay that construction site another visit, and give them a piece of my mind... and I'll wear a long dress this time.
Are you okay, Komicy? Did you get something in your eyes? I'm sorry, I don't have a handkerchief...
What's wrong, Komicy? Did you remember something sad? There, there... Don't cry...
Your friends, Komicy? You mean... people, or plushie friends? Either way, I'd like to meet them.
You want me to meet your friends, Komicy? Are they human, or of the plushie variety? I still would like to meet them.
Y-you think I am beautiful? I mean, of course I am! Because of my clothes, so I'm not taking them off!
You said it again! I'm scared... And maybe a little bit flattered. I'm just gonna try not to lose again.
Hey, you looked right at my underwear! Wait, you think it's elegant? And not too lewd, right? That's what I was going for...
I'm... sexy? Do you mean it? Are you sure you don't just have really low standards?
Ah... T-thank you. I don't know if you're completely sincere, but hearing you say stuff like that still makes me... happy.
That is cheap, lady! Say whatever you want about my body, but don't you dare speak like that about my clothes.
Hey... Going after my clothes is uncalled for... Wh-What did I do to make you treat me like that?
Oh, you wanted to know what time it is? Why didn't you ask me before I remove my watch? Nothing I can do about it now.
Oh, did you want me to tell you what time it is? But I just took off my watch. I guess I could go look at it, but... Sigh...
Space lady, is talking about harvesting bodies your way of making me feel better about myself? Because I like it... Thank you.
Space lady, you're so nice. You saw that I was feeling down, and you try to cheer me up with a spooky story about harvesting bodies. I like you.
A costume for me? Oh, so many possibilities... I think a bat costume would suit me fine. They're so adorable with the way they flap, horohorohoro!
What costume would I wear? There's so much to consider... I think I'd go with a cute bat costume. Aren't bats cute? And I can fly, just like them!
Is that what you think? Don't understimate me. I can be very dangerous when I want to!
I never cause problems myself, but sometimes other people cause them and I have to take care of them the only way I know how!
What a lovely smile...
Oh, that smile...
~Player~, you're a jerk! You can't even give a totally deserved compliment! Why can't you be more like Natsuki?
What a jerk! Would it kill you to say my thigh highs are cute, ~player~? You should hang out with Natsuki more so you can learn some taste.
People like big breasts? Why...? They're too large to be cute, and my clothes feel tight...
People really like big breasts? Adult people? I thought it was just babies...
Sweet, adorable, lovely Natsuki thinks I look good without clothes, a-and that's the only opinion that matters to me... I don't care what ~player~ thinks.
I-If Natsuki thinks I look good, then I believe her...! She has already proven that she's the most tasteful person here, after me.
You like it? Horohorohoro! I thought you would, but it's nice to hear it.
It's cute, isn't it? Horohorohoro, thank you! Maybe coming here was worth it after all.
I see it in your eyes! You like knee socks more! Don't you, ~player~? Well, you're dumb! You're all dumb! I'll prove it by not taking off my thigh highs.
Oh, so you prefer knee socks? You're stupid! I'll convince you thigh highs are cuter by not taking them off! You'll look so dumb, ~player~...
There's nothing bold about shaving. It's the only acceptable style for a girl's private area.
Nothing bold about it, it's just what you have to do! Even a little hair below makes it look uncute.
I hope you get your jollies seeing my naked wrist, 'cause that's the most I'm showing you people.
Ahhh, I'm so smart that there's no way I can lose this game. By the way, what time is it?
And without my watch, I'm can still win easily. Crap, I forgot to check the time before taking it off.
Ironic how I took off my watch so I can have more time in the game, horohorohoro!
You think my hair is pretty? Why, thank you. You don't have to say it, your look says everything.
Oh, you like my hair? Thank you! I wash it every day.
Please, save your compliments about my hair for later... Well, one would be nice to hear now. Anyone?
Do you think my hair is pretty? It's pink...
I know I said I'm not embarrassed, but that doesn't mean you have to inspect my body.
Y-Yeah, I shave. I want to feel good about myself, and it helps a little.
Can we just move on, please? I don't know why you have to react to my body...
Okay, now you've seen everything. I don't know what else you want from me.
I don't know, I just thought this moment would be more special for me. No big deal, I guess.
I'm not embarrassed. Only suckers get embarrassed. Or those who wear ugly undergarments.
Maybe this is for the best. Now I get to show you my cute undergarments that I've never shown anyone before. Consider yourselves lucky.
Horohorohoro, I don't get embarrassed! That's mostly because I'm wearing my good undergarments today. Total coincidence.
I don't mind taking off my dress. I also choose my undergarments carefully so I'm always wearing something cute.
Fine! Don't say anything then! They're cute, 'cause I picked them. I don't really care what you think!
Oh, you have nothing to say, huh? Whatever! If you don't like them, you don't like them...
What? You can't even say they're cute? What a jerk! I guess I misjudged you...
Oh, fine! Don't say anything! I can tell you don't like them. If you have such shitty taste, then I'll force you to like them by keeping them on!
Wh-What are you all looking at? You're thinking I don't look as good without clothes, aren't you?
W-Well...? Let's just keep playing.
Y-Yeah, I know they're bigger than is considered pretty. So what? Let's just continue.
I... I know they're too big to be considered cute... So what? I don't care as much about that. I don't...
~Player~, you're the first man that has seen me naked. I hope you feel happy. Or not, I don't really care what you feel. Not even a little...
So ~player~ is the first man to see me naked... W-Well, do you have anything to say? I don't care if you do. Seriously.
Your hair is too long for a man, ~player~. We'll have to do something about that. You need to look presentable as my servant, remember?
You like other men, ~player~? That's nice. It means I won't have to to worry about you spying on me, or something. I might even let you wash my back, horohorohoro...
For real, ~player~? You don't like women? Hmmm, if that's true, then I can feel more comfortable around you. I was a little reluctant about letting another man help me get dressed before.
You really like men and women, ~player~? Are you sure you just haven't made up your mind yet? I'm the same way when it comes to ice cream, but still...
You can't like men and women the same amount, ~player~. You gotta prefer one over the other, right? For example I like both cats and squirrels, but I prefer... Gaah! It's hard to choose!
You're so tall, ~player~! I know, I'm on the shorter side myself... But remember I can float and match your eye level no problem!
How tall are you again, ~player~? I'd feel so tall if you give me a piggyback ride... I know I can fly, but it's not as much fun. I want you to be my piggy!
Are you shorter than me, ~player~? That's too bad, I want my servant to be able to reach the top of the cabinets. A lot of dust gathers there. I could clean them myself, but...
You're short, ~player~. Shorty, horohorohoro! I'm sorry... Would you like to feel what it's like to feel tall for once? I could help you fly if you want.

state.text: You there... Your name is ~player~? Oh no, I'm not calling you that. I'll just call you "Guy". How do you like that, Guy?
Hey, is your name really ~player~? Or is it like a weird fantasy to be called that? I'll just call you "Guy", then.

case.state: Oh, hello there... Hmmm, out of anyone here, I'd say you have the most potential to become my new servant. I'll keep an eye on you.
Hello. What's your name...? Oh, ~player~. Hmmm, with a better looking outfit I think you'd make a fine servant. We'll see...
Hi... Oh, your name is ~player~. Have you ever worked as a servant to a tasteful, refined young lady? Well, I still have a feeling you might have potential.
Ah, it's ~player~'s turn! Is this a good moment for our servant interview? I think so too! So... who have you worked for before?
~Player~! Now is as good a time as ever to conduct our interview for the servant position. So... do you have any allergies or dietary restrictions?
Oh, you lost again, ~player~. Well, don't worry. It's not a requirement for the servant position to be good at playing games. In fact, it might be the contrary...
~Player~ again, huh? I don't mind if you're bad at playing games. I like to win, anyway.
You shouldn't be embarrassed to undress in front of me, ~player~. After you become my servant, I'll see you naked all the time when I make clothes for you to wear.
If you're worried about me seeing you naked, you shouldn't. If you become my servant, I'll surely see you naked when I dress you up personally, ~player~.
Now, ~player~... This is a complicated question, but I gotta ask. You're not a pervert or a creep, right? My servant needs to be the picture of decency.
~Player~, I gotta ask you a tough question. Do you have any deviant inclinations? Like chasing women around, spying on them, etc.? 'Cause that's a deal breaker.
You don't talk much, huh? That's fine. When Kumacy still had a soul, I hated his voice. So I don't mind a silent servant, as long as he's cute.
I like that you don't talk much, ~player~. Kumacy had a horrible, uncute voice, so I ordered him not to talk. I like my servants obedient and quiet.
You're... losing a lot. I know I said I didn't mind seeing you naked, but if you keep losing I'm gonna see a lot more than that.
At this rate... Even if I don't mind seeing you naked, if you lose more then I'll see you... Umm, I don't think I want to see my servant do that.
Wings? Oh, you must be one of those sky people... I've never been there.
A sky man, huh? I've never gone up there. I mean, I could... easily. But I haven't.
So if you have wings, why aren't you flying like me? It gets kinda lonely up here...
Are those wings just for show? Why don't you fly a bit? I'm thinking people here might resent me if I'm the only one who can fly.
What an adorable outfit you're wearing? Did you come from a parade?
That's such a lovely costume? Are you meant to be dressed as a little soldier?
Oh, sure... I have to put down my parasol, but he can hold on to a rocket launcher? How's that fair?
Wait, why did I have to put down my parasol, yet he can keep his rocket launcher? It's even bigger than my... Okay, it's not bigger. But it's more dangerous!
That thing is very comically looking... I bet it's just for show and it can't even fire rockets.
That rocket launcher is so goofy. It looks like it was built by a child. I'm sure it can only fire bubbles, or something.
That rocket you shot earlier... It was just a dud, right? I didn't see it hit anything, so...
Wait, what happened to that rocket you shot earlier? It didn't hit anything, right? Ho! I knew it was just a trick...
A tail... dog ears... Oh, I love these... half-animal people. Sorry, I don't know what you call yourselves.
A half-dog... person! He even has a tail, and ears... W-what do you call yourselves again?
Okay, I have a question for you... And it's very serious, so answer honestly: Does your tail wiggle when you're happy?
Ummm, I have a very, very important question for you. Tell me: Do you wiggle your tail when you're happy?
An artist? What a coincidence! I've been looking for someone who can make a giant painting of myself to put in my room. It has to be extra giant.
Oh, excellent! An artist! Young man, I want someone who can paint a portrait of me so I can hang it in my room. It has to be as big as possible. Giant size!
You didn't get hurt by that rocket, right? I know a bit about treating wounds, but I'm not helping you, 'cause you're dumb... But you're not hurt, right?
What kind of idiot shoots a rocket and then takes the hit like it's nothing...? I could treat you if you were seriously hurt, but it looks like you're fine... Right?
A man dressed in a cat costume, with ears and a tail... This better not awaken anything in me.
A man dressed as a cute cat... Wow... Is there a name for this trend? Maybe I should look it up.
Little Plagg... Why don't you say something cute? Horohorohoro!
Plagg, say something cute! Horohorohoro, I can't wait to hear it!
Finally! At least somebody here knows how to dress properly. Nice to meet you, Mr. Fate.
See? This is how every man should dress all the time, hat and all. It's a pleasure, Mr. Fate.
At last! I found a servant! I knew my perseverance would pay off. Are you looking for a master, young man? Please, say yes!
Finally! A servant! Now I just need to make sure he's out of a job. Excuse me... Do you have a master?
Excellent! A strong, burly man... Excuse me, mister. Are you looking for a job? There's this armoire I have at home that I need to move... It's very heavy.
Just what I needed! A strong man. Mister, if you're looking for a job, look no further! I need help moving an armoire from one room to another. Are you free today?
Hey, don't act all high and mighty! It's not a dignified way to meet people. I swear, I should just make you kneel before me and ask for forgiveness.
Don't you think you're a little too arrogant? That's gonna get you nowhere in life. You need someone with my level of charisma to pull off that attitude. If you beg, maybe I can forgive you.
Hey, nerd! You look lame, horohorohoro! Your glasses are dumb (...and cute). I bet you spend all day reading, like a loser. (I wonder what he likes to read...)
Has anyone ever told you that you look like a loser? Horohorohoro... (...a cute loser) You're so skinny and short. I bet you forgot to drink your milk! (I wonder what he likes to eat...)
Excuse me, mister. Are you looking for a job? I have a great opportunity for you, horohorohoro! And I won't have to pay you a lot, since I get the feeling you're homeless.
Good sir, excuse me... Are you homeless, by any chance? Then surely you must be looking for a job opportunity! I have just the chance for you to earn a miniscule amount of money for helping me.
Oh, a big burly guy... Perfect for carrying heavy stuff. Are you looking for a job, tough guy?
Oh, this is perfect! Are you looking for a job, strong guy? I need someone to move a closet for me. It's very heavy.
Hey! If you have some free time after the game and would like to earn a few beli, I have some heavy things I need to move.
Horohorohoro...! Serves you right. If you'd been nicer to me, I could've helped you.
Hey, if you don't want to lose, then try harder! Or just give up... Yeah, the second one.
Of course ~name~ lost! You silly man... Is this your first time?
Don't feel bad, ~name~! You're not doing too terrible for a man.
This is your perfect opportunity to become my knight in shining armor and save me from further embarrassment. You're welcome.
Thank you for losing, ~name~! I could hug you! No... It's just an expression.
Oh, how sweet! Losing so I don't have to. Unless you're just bad... Yeah, I take it back.
Oh, this is perfect! Good timing for losing, ~name~. I forgive you for peeking at my chest.
Sure, now you have the decency of losing... Whatever.
Taking your sweet time losing, huh? Sorry...
Typical guy. Doing whatever he wants, whenever he wants... even losing.
~Name~ lost? If I get more aroused, I'm blaming you.
You lost, huh? Nothing I can do but watch. I need the stimulation, you can't blame me.
Are you sad you lost? Horohorohoro! Too bad!
Look, Kumacy! ~Name~ lost this round.
Oh, that's a pity. I sure didn't want to see you lose, horohorohoro!
Oh, a man lost... I'm swooning a little. I'm just curious to learn more about the male body.
~Name~ lost! You can't watch, Kumacy... Oh right, you're a boy too. I guess you can.
If you were cuter, then I'd probably feel bad about beating you. But I don't!
All men are good for is serving me tea and biscuits. No wonder you lost.
Who lost? Oh, this guy... Of course.
Good job! You're helping me win, after all.
It doesn't seem like you're very good at this. Instead, why don't you go pick up a fight with another man for no reason? That's what you guys do.
If you have trouble remembering what the letters on the cards mean, just focus on the numbers.
Don't feel bad for losing. Maybe this game is too complex for a pea-brain man.
Oh, a man lost! I'm swooning with... female emotions, and stuff. Horohorohoro, as if!
I hope one day I can meet a man who's good at things other than fighting. But it won't be today.
Hmmm, I think you should give up on this game and become better at other things... Like sewing, or cooking. Who cares if you're a guy?
Oh, you lost? Let me think of something supportive to say to you... Ummm... Sorry, I can't.
What the hell?! This is ridiculous! An outrage! Oh, wait... He lost, not me. Never mind.
Did you lose because you were looking at my underwear? No, of course not...
~Name~, do you at least find my thigh highs cute? I'd like to know they are even a little appealing to men.
Maybe you show more promise as a servant than ~player~, ~name~. Yeah... I'm considering replacing you, ~player~. Are you jealous?
What a gentleman! Now I don't have to show my body. Thanks.
My hero! Saving me from embarrassing myself. Perhaps you're not so bad after all.
You're good at losing, eh? I'm not mocking you, it's helping me!
Maybe you wouldn't have lost if you weren't staring at my nether regions. Why do you even do that? It's not like you like me...
Oh, thank you, ~name~! I'm sorry if I was rude to you earlier. I now think you're a nice guy, and a bad poker player.
You lost! I should probably look away... But you've been looking at my body, so I don't think I will.
Were you distracted by my cuteness, ~name~? That was my plan all along, horohorohoro! ...it wasn't.
You really like men and women, ~player~? Are you sure you just haven't made up your mind yet? I'm the same way when it comes to ice cream, but still...
You can't like men and women the same amount, ~player~. You gotta prefer one over the other, right? For example I like both cats and squirrels, but I prefer... Gaah! It's hard to choose!
Y-You like other women, ~player~? I hope you don't get any hopes of getting close to me... I'd understand if you did, but...
I-I see... So you like women, ~player~... I was hoping we could take baths together, but maybe it's not a good idea if it'll give you the wrong impression. I guess I could wear a swimsuit...
It's so rare finding such a tall woman! I like it, you remind me of a giraffe. Giraffes are tall, graceful and cute.
If I have a tall servant like you, you could also be a good bodyguard for me, ~player~. People will be intimidated when you tower over them... Though you don't look scary at all.
Are you shorter than me, ~player~? Hmmm, now I'm worried that people will make fun of us if neither of us is very tall... They'll call us "the pipsqueaks", or something...

Could you be really shorter than me, ~player~? Normally, I like to be the short one. It makes me feel special... But perhaps this will be good. I always wondered what it would be like to have someone to throw around.
Oh, hello there... You're a cute, if notoriously plain looking young lady. I think you could become my new maid, if you wish to apply. And why shouldn't you...?
Hello. What's your name...? Oh, ~player~. Hmmm, with a cuter, more feminine outfit you would make a fine maid for me. I'll assess you better.
Hi... Oh, your name is ~player~. Have you ever worked tending to all the needs of another woman? I have a feeling you could what I'm looking for: my new maid!
Ah, it's ~player~'s turn! Is this a good moment for our maid interview? I think so too! So... what's your favorite type of dress?
~Player~! Now is as good a time as ever to conduct our interview for the maid position. So... what's your favorite animal?
Oh, you lost again, ~player~. Well, don't worry. It's not a requirement for the maid position to be good at playing games. Though I still want someone to play with.
~Player~ again, huh? I don't mind if you're bad at playing games. I'm more interested in how good you look wearing different outfits.
Are you worried about how you keep losing? I don't mean to be blunt, but if you're gonna be my maid, I think I should see you naked first. This is a perfect opportunity.
Don't worry about losing, ~player~. My future maid would not be embarrassed in front of her mistress. Plus I'll see you naked all the time after you start working for me.
~Player~, you seem like a fine lady... But do you harbor any secret perverted inclinations? Last thing I'd want is an indecent maid working for me.
Now let me ask you, ~player~... Have you ever done any perverted stuff unbecoming of a proper woman? I want my maid to be refined and decent.
Umm, are you okay? You've lost a lot of times. If this keeps going, you'll have to do terrible things. I don't know if I want a maid who does that sort of stuff.
How are you doing, ~player~? If you keep going like this, you'll be out of the game. And then you'll have to do things I wouldn't want to see my maid do.
You're a quiet woman, ~player~. I like that, as long as you're good at following orders.
I don't think I've heard you talk much, ~player~. Is it because you don't think you have a cute voice? Well, I'll be the judge of that. Why don't you sing a little?
You know... when my ghost went through you I felt a bit of... whatever you are. I don't wanna feel that ever again. I won't bother you anymore.
I think I understand a little more what you are. I felt some of it when my ghost went through you. I'll stop antagonizing you.
So, ~marker.nickname~, what did you ask Santa for this year? A new wardrobe, I hope! Horohorohoro...!
~marker.nickname~, what did you ask Santa to get you for Christmas? Though you're too naughty to get presents, horohorohoro...!
Just a normal schoolgirl who likes to scream... Unless you're secretly a werewolf, or some kind of monster, you already lost me.
Nothing but a human schoolgirl... Sigh... I miss the times when I'd see some kind of strange monster wherever I looked. Like a werewolf...
Okay, you're giving me my treasure back one way or another! Last warning, vixen!
Lowly thief, give me back my treasure! Or else...
You're staying, huh? Don't expect me to feel sorry for you. But maybe I do a little...
