So you're not leaving... You're wrong if you think I feel bad for you, horohorohoro... Well...
What...?! No, that can't be... He doesn't have a daughter. He would've told me.
Huh...?! No, no, no... I'm sure he doesn't have a daughter! I know he never talks about himself, but...
Don't compare me with her! Just because she knows how to dress properly, {small}unlike someone{!reset}, it doesn't mean we're similar! I am still me!
Excuse me?! That's is Ghost Princess to you! Not Ghost girl. Please, address me properly.

It was bad enough when I found out you were a pervert, but you're also a thief?! I don't like thieves! One time a thief who dresses like a tramp stole all my treasure. What do you have to say for yourself? You don't deserve to be a bat!
Nico Robin, let me ask you something... Why do you hang out with this thief? Is it because of pity? Or are you worried she'll get you in trouble if you leave her alone? Hmmm, it's probably pity.

I could never understand what possesses you to spend time with this orange-hair thief, Nico Robin. Maybe it's like when someone feels sorry for a pathetic puppy and takes care of them... Oh yeah, that makes sense.
That hair is offensively messy! If I had a pair of scissors on me, I wouldn't think twice about giving you a haircut right now.
How can you have such a messy hair? Did you put your head inside a washing machine? Hmph...! Does anybody here have a pair of scissors? It's urgent!
Finally! Another pirate girl that knows how to dress properly, and doesn't feel the need to flaunt her body... Though I'm not a fan of light colors, but nobody is perfect.
Ah, how refreshing it is to see another pirate girl who knows how to dress! Too many pirates wearing skimpy outfits these days, you know? Now if only you were dressed in black...
Nico Robin... You didn't really mean that stuff you said about me before, right? It was so mean...
Nico Robin... Nobody has ever talked to me like that before. Why are you so mean?
Oh, Princess Estelle! If you're interested in writing children's books, then I have an idea for one. I thought about it a long time ago.
So why did you come here alone, huh? Do your crew mates know that when you're alone you like to gamble with your body?
I bet you snuck out and abandoned your crew just so you can lose at this game and flaunt your body around. Admit it!

state.text: So...Uh... How's that useless swordsman doing? You know, the one in your crew?
Umm... You haven't mentioned how that useless swordsman is doing. Is he still alive? {small}Does he ever talk about me...?{!reset}

case.state: Horohorohoro! You lose again, ~marker.nickname~! You're running out of small trinkets!
Feeling nervous, ~marker.nickname~? You keep losing! Horohorohorohoro...!
End of the line, ~marker.nickname~. If you're going to escape, now's your chance.
I'm surprised you still haven't run away, ~marker.nickname~. But if you're going to, it should be now.
Dammit, I wish I didn't know you... It would be easier not to feel bad for a stranger.
Even if we're not friends, I still feel bad for you just because you're an acquaintance. Why am I such a softie?
So you really just wasted my treasure? You didn't spend it on cute clothes, candy and servants? That's even more offensive than you stealing from me!
I can't believe you took my treasure... and didn't do anything productive with it! You could've at least bought a cute dress... or at least a shirt! Any shirt!
Awwww... What an adorable pocket-size witch! Say something adorable... Come on!
So sweet! I've never seen such an adorable witch before. Come on, say something cute...!
What kind of spells can you cast, little witch? Can you reanimate the dead? Please, say yes!
For such a delightful, powerful, adorable witch like you, reanimating the dead must be a piece of cake, right? Right...?
Oh, you're so tiny and adorable... Also, I love your hair, horohorohoro!
Small stature, petite figure, cute face, nice hair... You have everything, horohorohoro!
This girl is crazy adorable! It's so rare for me to meet someone I didn't immediately find annoying.
Who's this insanely cute girl?! So well behaved, lovely, and totally not obnoxious.
Vulgar woman... There's no way you could have a semblance of cuteness even if I give you a pink dress and tape your mouth.
What a vulgar woman... Maybe I could get you to look cute if I put a dress on you, and get you to shut your mouth... No, never mind. It's hopeless.
You're a witch? You sure you didn't find that hat somewhere? You look too nice to be a witch.
Hmph, I don't believe you're a witch. I don't see you being mischievous. Nope, can't see it.
You're way too colorful. I think whoever designed just picked colors out of a hat.
You're aggressively colorful, blargh...! If you were more monochromatic, you'd be cuter.
I was just about to ask what's up with this butterfly. Shoo, shoo...! What if it calls other insect friends? Like c-cockroaches...
What's a butterfly doing here? If there's one insect in this place, there could be others... L-like cockroaches...
I wonder what would happen if I have one of my ghosts touch you. Only one way to find out, horohorohoro...
Maybe I should send one of my ghosts to touch you. I've never met a ghost like you, so even I don't know what would happen.
Girl, you need a haircut... Or at least run a comb through that spiky thing you have on your head.
I've never seen someone in more dire need of a haircut than you. Anybody here has a pair of scissors? It's an emergency.
Good, I like you better as a brunette. Not that I particularly like you, though.
Yeah, you look better as a brunette... But I think you'd look even better with green hair.
What the hell is this talking ball of light? I see they let just about anything enter this game.
Who let this ball of light in? Are there even any standards for what can play this game?
So adorable... Tell me, do you have anything against living inside a birdcage? Before you say no, it's quite spacious...
Ah, so cute... Do you have any experience living inside birdcages, little thing? Not a small one, mind you...
Only half-genie, huh? Lame. I'm not interesting in seeing a half-assed imitation. Horohorohoro...
A half-genie? Boring. Why don't you leave and invite a full genie instead? Horohorohoro...
So you really can't grant wishes? Not even... half a wish?
Too bad you can't grant wishes. I'd even be willing to settle for half a wish.
You can do this, Chantelle! Horohorohoro...!
Your turn again, Chantelle! Isn't this fun?
Time to take off your pants and stay in your panties, I guess. You really should've come here better dressed.
Seems like you'll have to stay in your panties. See? This wouldn't have happened if you came dressed for the occasion.
After what you showed last time, this feels like a very minor thing. We saw a little too much...
We've seen way more of your body than we had to. This feels really insignificant now.
A refined lady, with elegant taste and bat wings... You show great promise. I've decided to make you my newest friend.
Ah... What a lovely lady... I can tell you have fine taste. The wings are an extra bonus. Congratulations, you're now my new friend.
I'm clearly the one here with the best sense of fashion, but I'd say you're a respectable second place.
As the player here with the most impeccable fashion style, I'll award you the honorary second place. Are you happy? Of course you are!
A cute, well-dressed vampire girl... Are there more like you somewhere? 'Cause I'd love to go hang out there.
It's so rare to find a cute vampire girl who's also nice. Where did you come from? Are there more like you there? If so, I definitely wanna visit.
A convicted fugitive?! Where's the law when you need it? Oh, right. I'm a pirate...
What's a wanted fugitive doing here?! Outrageous! Although I'm technically a pirate...
Hey, lady... Tell me about these Pocket Monsters. If they're small, cute, spooky creatures, then I must have them! Where can I find one?
So these Pocket Monsters... Are they what I think they are? Like weird, tiny creatures? If so, I want one! Where do I find them?
Hey... You look depressed. Are you depressed?
Hmmm... Why... Why do you look so depressed? Huh?
I'm not a fan of guys like you... Always trying to prove how manly you are. I don't get it.
Yet another man who has to prove how manly he is. You should work on not being a jerk instead!
It's not gonna be a trend that people here are not what they seem, right? I'm a girl, by the way. In case anyone has any doubts...
I think if there's someone else here who is hiding something big, they should come clean now. I'm not. I'm definitely a girl.
Ugh, I can't stand clowns. They're all so colorful, vivacious and get all up in my face.
Blargh, clowns... Why do they have to dress like that, and go around jumping and screaming? Are they so desperate for attention?
Why couldn't you be a mime? They're so much better than clowns! They dress in black and white, don't talk, and have at least some sense of respect.
You know what I really like? Mimes. They're like classy clowns. They don't talk, have way better fashion style, and are not even a little bit annoying.
What's with the fancy swimming bodysuit? Are you one of those people that look for sunken treasure?
That's one weird looking swimsuit you're wearing. I'm guessing you're one of those scavengers that look for treasure at the bottom of the sea.
I don't think I have a single dress as revealing as what you're wearing. Wait, maybe... No, that's my underwear.
Did someone cut your dress with a giant pair of scissors? I don't know how else you'd get something that revealing.
Is everyone as adorable as you in your school, or are you the undisputed cutie pie who everybody looks up to?
Are there any other insanely adorable girls in your school, or is it just you? You must be the envy of all your classmates...
No...! Let her keep her underwear! Look how adorable it is!
Just let her keep the underwear! It's so cute! Why don't you guys like it?
Noooo... She's too pure! Don't let her go through with this.
Don't make her do this! Look how adorable she is! You'll sully her purity...
Sweet Natsuki... I bet you even smell sweet. Like strawberry bubblegum! But I won't go smell you, I'm not a creep.
You're so sweet! I wonder if you smell sweet too... Like bubblegum and lollipops. Would it be weird if I smell you...? What am I saying? Of course it would...
So nice to see a zombie here... Sorry if I was rude to you earlier. I thought you were just a stuck-up diva, not a cute zombie in disguise.
Ah, I love seeing a zombie in this place. Makes me feel at home. Sorry for being rude earlier, I thought you were a self conceited huzzy. I would never speak to a zombie that way.
Are you supposed to be famous, or something? Hmph, if I don't know you I'm sure you're not important.
Are you some kind of music star? Then how come I've never seen you? You're probably only famous within your family and friends.
While I appreciate the creepy vibe you have going, I'm worried you might take it too far. It's not just because of the knife.
You kinda give me the creeps, and I don't mean the good kind. More like the ones I get when I'm too close to a cockroach, brrrrrr...
You think you're special just because you're tall? If I fly higher, I can seem taller than you.
I don't like having to look up at anyone... Maybe I should float higher so I can make you feel small.
What are you doing with that rifle? You should be more...
What is that rifle for? Are you just using it for...?
You with that rifle... You're really making me question my disdain for using the b-word.
This rifle girl... I've never felt so challenged in my resolved to not use the b-word.
Shoot your bullet and get it over with... I hope it hits you this time.
Here she goes again... At least I'm prepared this time.
Just... just don't aim it in my direction.
Bespectacled girl with braids... Are you supposed to be the type that becomes attractive after taking the glasses off and letting your hair down?
A girl with glasses and braids... Are you hiding your cuteness behind your glasses and that hairstyle?
You like spiders? That's so nice! I like them too. Especially the ones with really long legs. It's so cute seeing them crawl around.
Do you like spiders? I like them too! The bigger, the better... I don't much care for the hairy ones, but the rest are all very cute.
Woah, you really look like one of Hogback's experiments... You're not, are you?
Hmmm, it's crazy how much you remind me of Hogback's creations... But there's no way you could be one, right?
What's with that outfit? Oh, are you one of those women who takes their clothes off for money? Not that it seems like that would take you very long...
What are you wearing...? Oh, could it be part of your job? If you're one of those ladies who takes their clothes off on stage...
Hey, careful... That's not the way to handle fabric.
Hmmm, I'm not sure that leotard should stretch that much.
Puns are the second lowest form of comedy... You should review your act.
You know puns don't count as jokes, right? Anyone can come up with stuff like that.
Oh, I think I know what your outfit means! I've seen it in books. You're a gladiator, right?
Are you one of those people who fight in arenas? Gladiators, I think they're called...
Hmmm, you're just the kind of girl I would've liked to have as a friend if I'd gone to school. The shy kind that I can order around easily.
I think it would've been fun to be friends with a girl like you if I'd gone to school... Just shy enough to not question my authority.
What kind of creatures live among the stars? Are they cute? What are they called? Can they speak? How cute are they on a scale of cockroach to Kumacy?
I can't wait to see what kind of creatures live in space... They must be cute, right? Describe them to me in detail, please. I want to ascertain their level of cuteness right now.
You're a musician? Are you scouting for new talent? I'm sure I'd be good.
Are you in a band? I can join, if you insist. I've never done it before, but I'm sure I'm great.
You...! Why are you so darn cute? Why...?!
Whoa, whoa, whoa...! Why is there such a cute girl here? Why...?!
A cute girl who's ignorant of her own cuteness... It's like a diamond in the rough. I wanna go there and pinch your cheek so bad...
I wanna go to the place where you'd be considered plain looking... How do you not know how cute you are? I just wanna pinch your cheek, you piece of sweetness!
Well-read girl, why don't you recommend me a book? Something you think I'd like... Just not too long, and hopefully with illustrations.
You like to read, right? Then recommend me a book to read! I'll trust your taste, as long as your recommendation is shorter than 100 pages and has drawings.
I swear, I used to dress just like you once. Ah, to be young again...
Back when I was younger, I used to dress just like you. Mmmm, this makes me nostalgic.
Are you by any chance friends with other cute monsters? Like zombies, werewolves, etc?
You probably know a bunch of different monsters, right? Werewolves, zombies...? Are they cute?
I wish I had bat wings... Even though I can already fly. Why do you have everything I want? Creepy wings? A maid...?
Hmmm, I also want to have wings like yours... I bet you don't even care for them. And you also have a maid! Life is so unfair.
If only Kumacy had been as well mannered as you... Even though he was super cute, his voice wasn't. But you know not to speak. I'll call you Komicy!
You remind me of Kumacy. Although you're better, because you don't speak with your uncute voice. I'll call you Komicy! That's your new name. Do you like it, Komicy?
Are you feeling better now? Hmph, I'm not giving up!
So..? Do you feel better already? I-I'll just have to try harder!
A ghost who's fashionable, and goes to high school... Wh-Who cares? My ghosts are cute...
So what if you're a ghost who can speak, goes to school, and wears clothes? At least my ghosts are... cute. Y-Yeah...!
What if... I'm the one who's been holding my ghosts back? Maybe they could wear clothes and go to school if I let them... I'm practically their mother, after all.
Looking at you, I... I'm worried I've been denying my ghosts the life they could've had. Go to school, wear clothes... I'm like their mother, so I should've tried harder.
A Prince, huh? Of course, this must be the table for the most distinguished people! That's why I was invited, it makes sense. So... why is ~player~ here?
Ah, a distinguished Prince! Makes sense, this must be the table for the most important people. I don't get why ~player~ is here too, but whatever...
Tojiko, was it...? Why don't you come work for me? I'll treat you way better than shorty here, I promise. You'll have a nice room, free hours on the weekends...
Your name is Tojiko, right? Would you like to come work for me? It doesn't seem like this shorty is treating you well. I'll give you lots of benefits!
A living statue! Wow... And she's so pretty! This is exciting.
I never thought I'd see a living statue! And such a pretty one at that...
You, purple girl... You can't just appear out of nowhere willy-nilly. Don't you need a permit for that?
Hey, purple girl! Don't just appear out of thin air. You need a permit for that, probably. Be respectful with whatever ability you have.
Your name is "Neptune"? I don't like it, not cute enough. I'll call you Nepty! Do you like your new name, Nepty?
Hmmm, I don't like your name. You deserve a cuter one. How about Nepty? From now on, your name is Nepty.
My sweet Nagisa, I wanna know more about you... What's your favorite animal? Mine are bears! Cute bears, specifically.
Mind if I ask you about yourself, my lovely Nagisa? Ummm, what animal is your favorite? I love bears! Specifically the cute kind.
What's school like, Nagisa? I never went to school, so I missed out on the whole experience... It must be fun, right?
Sweet Nagisa, what is it like...? Going to school? I always wished I'd gone... In my imagination, I always pictured it being really fun!
No, no, nooooo...! I'll blind everyone here and then myself so nobody has to see my sweet Nagisa's body.
Noooo...! Leave my Nagisa alone! What more do you want from her?! Didn't you see how cute her underwear is?
Nobody deserves to see my Nagisa fully nude! Not even me! ~Player~, you cover your lecherous eyes!
We're not worthy of seeing my sweet Nagisa fully nude! So we should all close our eyes! ~Player~, you put on a blindfold too. I don't trust you...
Lady Cynthia, about these Pokmon... How cute are they really? Are there some that look like monsters, zombies or ghosts?
Tell me, Lady Cynthia, what types of Pokmon are there? Are there cute types? Like spooky monsters, or ghostlike creatures?
Ma'am, while I don't judge your way of living, I ask that you don't teach me any naughty stuff. I'm very happy with how pure my mindset is.
I'm a bit worried I might learn dirty stuff from you by proximity... I'd rather not. I like having a pure and clean perspective on life.
I feel compelled to treat zombies better than humans, for some reason... I hope that doesn't make me a bigot, or something.
Why do I have a bias for treating zombies better than others? Am I prejudiced? I don't wanna discriminate people like that...
Fine, I won't try to cheer you up anymore. I just find it tragic that a girl as cute as you looks so sad.
Okay, I give up on trying to cheer you up. It just bothers me that such a cute girl has to look so gloomy... Even if your gloominess is what makes you so cute.
You're mean! You're the meanest talking statue I've ever met. I retract my very kind offer.
You're so mean! Even if you're a statue, I wasn't expecting you to be so stone cold... I don't want you to come to my castle anymore.
Space lady, do you have a map of outer space I can borrow? I'd rather not ask for directions once I go on my vacation. Better safe than sorry!
Oh, space lady...! Do you know where I can find a map of outer space for my vacation trip? I'm worried it'd be tough to stop a ship and ask for directions, so a map would be better.
I like the name Ribbon Girl! It sounds like a good name for a cute doll. You don't mind if I give it to one? Thanks!
Oh, Ribbon Girl is such a cute name! I'm definitely using it the next time I make a doll. It's not copyrighted, right? Great!
Na Na Na Na... You lose! Horohorohoro, it's so fun to make fun of someone you hate.
Na Na Na Na... How does it feel to lose so badly? Horohorohoro, I was waiting for this moment.
Nagisa, you lost again... I'm a little curious to see how cute your underwear is, but after that we stop!
Oh no! Nagisa lost... Okay, after we see her cute underwear, we won't make her lose again!
Prince Miko, how much do you pay Tojiko? I wanna make sure I can match whatever you pay her.
Is it appropriate to ask what Tojiko's salary is? If it's too high, I might have to consider breaking my piggy bank.
Komicy, you're so fast at writing on your little notebook! You must be like... a super good student!
How do you write so fast, Komicy? You write like three times faster than me, and your calligraphy is so cute! You must be the best student in your school.
Oh no! I know I let Kumacy go around naked, but he's a bear. Komicy is a girl!
Nooo...! Even though Komicy reminds me of Kumacy, she's a girl... with girlie parts, that must not be shown to the world!
Because of her speech impairment, I'll speak for Komicy! She doesn't want to do this! Deal with it.
She can't talk, so I'll speak in her name. Komicy refuses to take off her panties! Either accept that, or get the hell out of here!
I wanna sign up for this wizarding school! I always thought I'd make a terrific witch. People always call me a witch, so...
I must join your school! I'm sure I'd be the perfect witch. People always say to me "You witch!", so it's not just my opinion.
About this magic you have... Do you think you could resuscitate a body for me? It's a zombie's corpse, so that should make it easier, right?
Hey, could you help me with your magic? I have a corpse I want to resuscitate. Oh, it's nothing weird! It's actually a zombie.
I like ladybugs. They're like the most formal bugs. They even call themselves ladies!
I think ladybugs are cute. They're so tiny and cute, and they have the word "lady" on their names, so you know they're modest.
Tikki, you're so cute! Why do you hang out with this ladybug girl? Does she have a nice cage for you?
Tikki...! Can I ask you what you see in this ladybug girl? Does she treat you well? Does she put you in a nice cage at night?
What kind of Pokmon do you have, Lady Cynthia? I imagine a classy and elegant creature... The kind you'd present to a beauty contest.
Do you have a lot of Pokmon, Lady Cynthia? What are they like? I expect them to be refined and elegant, to match a lady such as yourself.
Prince Miko, what would you say is Tojiko's best quality? Is it her cooking, her cleaning, or...?
What's Tojiko best at, Prince Miko? She seems very capable, but I'm sure there must be something she excels at.
You... Please, stop sexualizing me. You get way too specific talking about my body. At least say something cute every now and then...
You... You should stop talking about my body in that way! If you really have to say something about it, have a little delicacy.
Must be nice being a god. All those people bowing and praying to you... Is there a God of Cuteness, Nepty?
I've always been happy being a princess, but being a goddess must be even better. There must be a God of Cuteness, right? Nepty?
Komicy, you said you have friends... But do you have a boyfriend? I can't imagine anyone who would be worthy of you.
Komicy, you don't have a boyfriend, do you? I can't imagine a man who could be worthy of being with a girl like you.
Purple girl, of these "dimensions" things, whatever they are... Which is the cutest you've seen? Is there a place with trees made of velvet, and rivers of hot cocoa?
You travel a lot, right? Purple girl? What's the cutest of these "dimensions" places you've seen? Like a place where animals can talk, and fit in your pocket...
So I guess you dress like that because you're considered "sexy"... Say, if I wanted to look sexy too, where would I start? Not that I'm interested, but if I was...
I take it the look you're going for is "sexy", right? I always go for a cute look myself, but if I wanted to look sexy for once, wh-what should I do?
I love the mask! I didn't notice it at first. I thought it was just a plastic bag.
Sweet mask! At first I thought you were wearing a plastic bag on your head, so I didn't look at you twice. But it's very cute.
Are these friends of yours as adorable as you? Do they also wear cute masks? I bet yours is the best one. They're probably jealous.
Your friends must also wear cute masks, right? I don't know how they could be better than the one you wear. I'm sure you're the envy of your group!
You know, maybe you and I got off on the wrong foot. So... Where are you from? Are there any cute creatures there?
I think I'll be the bigger woman, and try to get along with you even though I don't like you. Ummm, are there cute creatures living where you come from?
I've had it with your general jerkiness! You either apologize voluntarily to me right now for being so awful, or I'll make you!
I'm warning you, creep... Get down on your knees, and apologize to me now in the name of cuteness, or I'll make you! Everything you've said until now rubs me the wrong way...
Is it too awful to say I want to see Natsuki's underwear? I bet it either has cute animals, or a fruit pattern.
Natsuki is the kind of girl to wear underwear featuring cute animals, or a fruity design. I'm looking forward to seeing it...
Naughty lady... Ummm... Wh-What advice would you give a girl who has never had sex but would maybe like to try it at one point. Not me, just... some girl.
Naughty lady... I know this girl... This cute girl who has never had sex, but is considering trying it at one point. What advice would you give to her?
Hey, I'd like an apple! Do you have an extra one for me?
Suddenly, I'm craving an apple. Do you have one for me, apple girl?
All this killing that you said you did underground... Wh-What were you killing exactly?
You said something about killing underground inhabitants... Wh-Who did you kill?
Tell me more about this Gengar, Lady Cynthia! I know it's a ghost, but how cute is it? How big? What color? What...?
I wanna know everything about this ghost called Gengar, Lady Cynthia! What is it like? What size? What color? How many...?
Oh no! Space lady! Now you have to show your privates... Wait, is modesty still a thing in space? Maybe it's normal to be naked there...
Space lady lost! Oh noooo...! Oh, unless you ladies that come from space don't feel embarrassed getting naked... Is modesty still a thing out there?
Ohhh... a Turtle Princess! One time I dreamt that I met a Frog Princess. This might be a sign...
Nice to meet you, Turtle Princess. Ohhh, do you have a tail? Can you turn around? I wanna see it!
Hey, you! Lady with the pointy ears! You can't come play this game in the middle of your workout! You should change into an appropriate outfit before coming here.
Pointy ears lady, you can't come here dressed like that! Go home and change into something more presentable first! It's proper etiquette.
You sure like those fries, huh? I like cooking, but I usually only make sweets. Maybe I should try making fries...
Those fries must be good, huh? I don't think I've ever made fries. Most of my recipes are for sweets. I think I should try it once.
Excuse me, quiet girl. Where can I buy a metal ball like the one you have there? Even if you can't talk, I just need the name of the store where you bought it.
Quiet girl? Where did you buy your metal ball? I want one for myself so I can talk to it. Can you write the name of the store for me? I hope you can write...
Hey, ribbon schoolgirl... Ummm, are you okay? You look cheerful and all, but... I have a feeling about you... Maybe it's nothing.
You, girl with the ribbon... You're not feeling down, are you? I don't know why, I just have feeling when I look at you that... But you're smiling a lot, though.
That hair looks so fluffy...! How did you get it like that? Do you use some special conditioner?
How can your hair be that fluffy? It looks like a silk pillow... Do you have a secret? If you tell me it's genetic, I'll punch you!
I don't have a particular fondness for orange hair girls, but at least you don't look like a thief. I like that you're short too, so I'll give you a chance.
You're short, horohorohoro. I already like you more than the last orange hair girl I met. And you don't look like a thief to me, so that's a bonus.
What exactly is a magical girl? Hmmm, I'm kind of magical, and I'm a girl. So I gotta be one too, right? Is there a welcome celebration, or something?
A magical girl, huh? Hey, my ability is kinda like magic. And I'm a girl! I suppose I'm the new one of your kind, horohorohoro. When is my welcome party?
Oh, Lady Cynthia! I'm sorry I didn't comment on your undergarments earlier. I'm sure you were anticipating my opinion. I think it's very elegant and suits you perfectly!
Oh, what have I done?! How inconsiderate of me! I didn't tell you before how elegant and lovely your undergarments are, Lady Cynthia. I'm sorry...
Running is so old fashion! I wonder if there are flying competitions. I usually don't fly too fast because it's undignified, but I'll do it if it means I can win at something and then brag about it.
Flying is the new running, right? If I participated on a flying competition, I'm sure I'd come first without breaking a sweat. And then I'll tell everyone that I won, horohorohoro!
This poor girl has no arms! I thought she had them behind her back because she was confident and refined.
You had no arms! Am I the only one who hadn't notice? Do I need glasses? Poor girl...
I think light is overrated. It's only useful for you to see where you're going. The only light I need is the moonlight on a creepy night.
I don't get you people who like the light. Isn't everything so much beautiful and creepy when it's covered by darkness? Don't tell me you also think day is better than night?
You have potential, Shyfly. But you're too much sweet, and not enough spice! With a touch of creepy you'd be perfect! I'd love to give you a full makeover.
I see a diamond in the rough in you, Shyfly! Beautiful hair, gorgeous features, lovely name... But you're missing the final element: creepiness! With that'd you'd be perfect.
I bet you think you know everything... know-it-all girl. Well, I'm sure I know lots of stuff you don't!
You think you're soooo cool, with all your knowledge and stuff... I also know lots of things, but I don't feel the need to prove that to others. Hmph!
I recognize those ears... You're a hedgehog, aren't you? Not my favorite animal, but you're pink, so that gives you extra points!

I'm familiar with all types of animal ears, so I recognize a hedgehog when I see one. If you were a boring brown hedgehog I wouldn't find you special at all. But you had the consideration to be pink! I love it.
I always dreamed of being pampered by a humanoid bear, but a fox is close enough! I'll require your services, pampering fox.
So much searching, but I finally found a talking animal that likes to pamper! Granted, it's a fox not a bear... but I'll take it! Pamper me all you want, lovely fox.
Princess Charlotte, you're so dreamy! I can't decide what I love most about you... your sweet voice, your round eyes, your doll-like body, your big head... I can't choose!
Oh, Princess Charlotte... Thank you for existing and showing me what true cuteness looks like. You've reinvigorated my faith in everything just by blessing me with your presence.
What's Hell like, Princess Charlotte? Because if there are more people like you there, I'm definitely going on a vacation. I should make reservations now. I hope it's not too packed!
Tell me about Hell, Princess Charlotte. I'm thinking of going there now that I know that's where you come from... What if everybody there is as cute as you? Ohhh, I'm excited!
Hmmm, I'm realizing you're actually pretty cute... Too bad you also look like a nerd!
It's interesting... I never thought a nerd could actually be cute... until now!
Space lady, you've been nice to me so I'll share my knowledge on men with you... Did you know that a man's weak spot is between his legs? If you ever want to take one out easy, kick him there.
If you want to learn more about men I can help you, space lady. I bet you don't know that men are tender between their legs. I once saw one get kicked there. His scream still haunts me...
Hey, Shyfly! What's your favorite animal? Mine are bears! I especially love the ones that are fluffy and fat. It feels so nice to hug them!
What animal is your favorite, Shyfly? I hope you like bears, because they're my favorite. Don't you love how fluffy and cute they are? There's nothing like hugging a bear.
Good pirate lady, have you visited any scary places you might recommend? I'm thinking of going on a vacation soon. I need a rest from all the... resting.

A pirate lady with so much class surely knows many creepy places, right? I want to go on a vacation soon to a scary location I've never seen before. Doing nothing all day can be very stressful, you know?
Lady Cynthia, who's your best friend? I assume they must be someone with class and taste, such as yourself... But if that spot is open...
Who would you consider your best friend in the world, Lady Cynthia? I picture someone who understands you, and values your distinguished grace... like me.
Hey, Spunky! Is there a place where ghosts gather? And don't say graveyards. I always visit them for sightseeing and I've never once seen one there.
Say, Spunky, what's a good place I could go to meet other ghosts? I've tried every graveyard I can find unsuccessfully. I'm sure they're hiding somewhere else.
Alright, Ms. Maid! It's time to begin your job interview. First question: What do you think makes you qualified to become my servant? Answer in ten words or less.
This seems like the perfect opportunity to begin our job interview, Ms. Maid. First I want to know why you want to come work for me. Think before answer, please.
I love the scars! They're so cute. Are you a zombie? I love zombies! Ohhh, and you have animal ears and a tail? I love animals!
Are you a cute zombie catgirl? That's three things I love combined into one! I'm gonna make you my friend one way or the other!
So what if you have two ghost friends? I have infinite ghosts! It doesn't matter to me if they don't talk, or they all look the same, or they don't have names...
"Ohhhh, look at me! I'm so cool! I have two ghost friends!" Pffff, big deal! I have more ghosts than I can count. Sure, it'd be nice if I could talk to them, but still...
Hey, girl in the middle! Which of your two ghosts friends do you think is cuter? Horohorohoro, if you don't answer it'll be the same as you claiming that they're both ugly!
I wonder, girl with the ghosts... Between your two friends, which one do you think is cuter? You gotta choose one, horohorohoro!
My dear Zoe, how did you get to be so cute? You're so squiggly and beautiful... I'm sure you're soft too.
You weren't born so cute, were you dear Zoe? Your squiggliness is mesmerizing! You're purple too, and each one of your eyes is more beautiful than the other...
How embarrassing! A grown up woman who doesn't know how to speak properly! Horohorohoro, you gotta be the most dumbest person I've met!
How can you speak so poorly? This is a disgrace! Horohorohoro, you should feel embarrassed. Who was the moron that teached you how to speak?
I-I thought you could be special because of your impeccable fashion, but you're just a foul mouth pervert! Stocking is too cute of a name for you. I'm gonna call you Sock.

Why couldn't you act the way you dress? I've never been more disappointed... I think I'm gonna call you Sock. Because a name like Stocking is too cute for you, and you should put a sock in your potty mouth.
A well-dressed petite girl who deals with death... I expect we'll get along, Miss Who, horohorohoro!
I dreamed of working at a Funeral Parlor as a kid, before I realized not having a job would be more fun. I'm looking forward to getting to know you better, Miss Who.
Miss Who, I'll gladly request your services for my future funeral. It won't be for a while, but I want it to be as cute as possible, and I'm sure I can trust you.
Miss Who, I'd be honored if you were so kind as to handle my funeral when I pass away, maaaany years from now. I can only hope someone as tasteful as you can give me the cute funeral I dream of.
You're not a princess! I'd have an easier time believing you're a mermaid. You're dressed like a nobody, you're not even wearing lipstick, and you talk like a boy!
No matter what you say, I won't believe you're a princess! A princess would at least attempt to look refined, and wouldn't talk like a boy. All you have is the pink hair. You're just a poser!
A bat lady! This is a good day, in which I've met a lady who looks like a bat. I know what I'll put in my diary today: "Dear diary, today I met a bat lady and she..."
I can't believe I met a bat lady! This is a good day, horohorohoro! I don't know how it could be ruined...

It was bad enough when I found out you were a pervert, but you're also a thief?! I don't like thieves! One time a thief stole all my treasure. What do you have to say for yourself? You don't deserve to be bat!
As if being a pervert wasn't bad enough, you're also a thief! One time I lost all my treasure to a thief. I don't like them! You give bats a bad name.
So why are you here, Nico Robin? Did your crew get dragged into some stupid plot or something...?
I don't even know why you're here, Nico Robin... My guess is your stupid captain forced your crew to come here for some stupid reason.
So aren't you glad to meet me in person, Nico Robin? I'm sure you spent quite a long time imagining what the Ghost Princess you've heard of looks like.
I envy you, Nico Robin. Having the privilege of meeting me face to face is not something everyone gets. Does my style match your expectations?
So you didn't come here with the other girl in your crew... What's her name? The orange-hair one...
I see you came here by yourself, Nico Robin. The other girl in your crew, the one with orange hair, isn't with you, right?
I want to give you a name! I love naming animals... Oh, I know! I'm gonna call you "Ms. Fluffypaws". Do you like it?
I should give you a name. Don't worry, I'm very good at naming pets... I'm gonna call you... "Ms. Fluffypaws"! Horohorohoro, it's cute, isn't it?
Do you have any family, pervy bat lady? Even if you weren't what I was hoping for, maybe you have a sister or something who's just as cute as you, but well-behaved.
I'm wondering... Are there other cute bat people in your family? Maybe one of them won't be a pervert, and will want to be my friend...

Princess Estelle, I congratulate you for your style! You clearly know that you have to look good, even if you're going to battle. I've seen so many princesses that dress like crap just because they care more about practicality than style, blargh...!
I adore your cute armor, Princess Estelle! It's not uncommon to see a princess who doesn't care about what she looks like, just because she's going to roll up in the mud. But that's terrible!
Little Trixie... You don't belong to anyone, do you? Because if so, I'd very much like to give you a new home, horohorohoro! I'll give you your own little bed... unless you'd prefer to sleep with me?

Cute, little Trixie, horohorohoro... You don't have a owner, right? Maybe I could become your new one! I'll take you home right away so you can stay in my room. I'll buy you a tiny bed... unless you'd rather sleep with me.
Such grace and poise... I'm so happy to finally see a real princess, and not one of those posers. I'm delighted by your presence, Prinzessin Fischl.
Finally, a real princess... Nobody else could speak with such elegance and move with so much grace. It's my absolute pleasure to meet you, Prinzessin Fischl.
Dear Prinzessin... Forgive me for asking, but is it customary in your land to wear such... revealing outfit, with your legs fully exposed? Shouldn't a princess wear a full dress?

I'm too curious not to ask, my Prinzessin... Does every princess in your land wear outfits so... revealing? Your beautiful legs are in full view! Forgive me for being rude, but it resembles my undergarments more than my dress.
I'm sure any second now you'll start getting flustered... No woman would keep that stone cold expression for long in this situation.
I can't lie that seeing you get embarrassed is something I'm looking forward to. Horohorohoro, it's always fun to see those who act so collected lose their composure.
I didn't see you cover your area down there even once... It's almost as if you want people to look.
Are you blushing? I can't tell... But I'm sure you haven't covered yourself once. Are you fine with people looking down there?
What kind of vampire are you? You should wear an elegant dress, and lipstick and paint your fingernails... You're just dressed like a common schoolgirl.
If you're a vampire, or any type of creepy creature you should honor your roots by dressing the part. Where's your fancy dress? And your creepy makeup?
What a cutie patootie you are! I wanna pick you up and fly you around, horohorohoro!
Such a fine example of cuteness and innocence... I would like to grab you tight and fly with you until I get tired. Wouldn't that be fun?
Wh-What happened to the innocent girl from earlier? Cuteness is not just about looks, but also about behaving properly. This is heartbreaking...
I liked you more when I thought you were innocent and nice... But how can you be cute if you're so... mean. My heart is broken.
I like music, but I've heard that some of those rockstars like to live a little too extremely... and not in a good way. They break stuff, and use vulgar words all the time,,,
Hmm, I'm trying to see if those rumors about rockstars are true by looking at you. Did you know that they live with no sense of class? Some of them act like savages!
Seraphina, wouldn't you rather work for me than for this stupid cult you work for, or whatever... We'd have so much fun!
Hey, Seraphina! Why don't you quit your job at this ridiculous cult you mentioned, and come work for me instead! I promise it'll be a million times more fun!
Oh, look at Ms. Schoolgirl, wearing her fancy school uniform... Actually those are kinda cute.
Saddle up, little girl. You're playing with the grownups now, horohorohoro!
I hope you're wearing your uniform because you just got out of class, and not just to mock me for not going to school.
A schoolgirl, huh? I bet you have lots of friends... Well, I'm sure I'd also have lots of friends if I ever went to school.
That outfit shows you have no class! If you just want to show skin, then why do you bother wearing clothes at all?
I bet you must be embarrassed wearing that shameful outfit next to me, while I'm wearing this gorgeous dress.
Between the two of us it's clear one of us put more effort into her outfit, and it's clear who it was... Me, it was me.
You know what's better than being born a princess? Naming yourself one! That shows initiative and creativity.
Oh, an actual princess, huh? Are you gonna give me that speech about how I shouldn't call myself one too? Save it!
Time for you to show your delicates! But have a little decency, please.
I'm guessing you'll pick something that doesn't leave you overexposed. I mean, you should...
If you show humility, then I'll spare you this time. Oh, we can't do that? Sorry, ~name~.
A girl should always consider how much skin it's appropriate to show. Arms are fine. Legs too, up to a certain point. Midriff, if you're feeling daring...
~Name~, take this as an opportunity to show what else you're wearing underneath. Because so far, I'm not impressed.
Oh... Well, I'm okay with not having ~name~ strip this round. How about you...? Wow, you guys are evil.
Nonono...! ~Name~, how many cards did you swap? You made a mistake! Were you not paying attention?
I don't wanna hear any complaints. You have it easier exposing yourself after I already went through this tribulation.
Girl, am I happy you're not too good at this! It's great!
I'm happy I didn't have to use my ability to make you lose. You did it by yourself! Hey, I said I'm happy...
If you're more naked, maybe I'll feel more comfortable... It's harsh, but it's true.
Listen, ~name~... I know you're busy, but I have a very important question to ask you: These thigh highs are cute, right?
Why do you do this to us? This is discrimination against women! We shouldn't lose this much.
I have something that keeps me going in this game, and that's the thought of hugging Kumacy again. Maybe you have your own Kumacy, ~name~.
Oh, great! ~Name~ lost! Ah, it just that means I didn't lose... You understand, right?
Yeah, don't focus on me! Pay attention to her instead.
Just let me do my thing, okay? Look at ~name~, not me!
Maybe now I'll feel like not all eyes are on me for a second.
Oh, I was just going to ask you if you have any tips for me, ~name~. But focus on stripping first.
Go, ~name~! Sorry if I don't pay much attention to you, I'm actually enjoying this.
You have been kinda nice to me, ~name~. At least you haven't said anything too bad to me, so I'll root for you.
You're barely trying. I don't get how I lost to you.
Come on! Where's your fighting spirit? Try harder, ~name~!
Hey! You can't lose now! You gotta keep playing.
Be honest, ~name~... What do you think of Kumacy? Is he cute, super cute, super duper mega cute?
Be happy, ~name~! Having to strip isn't the end of the world.
Are you having fun, ~name~? What's important is that you're having fun.
Maybe it's good that you lost. If you're wearing less, I can assess better which clothes would suit you better. Then I can give you fashion advice.
Are you dumb? Pay more attention next time! Huh, I'm actually being helpful. I don't know why women hate me.
It's not a tragedy to show a bit more skin. Unless you didn't shave your legs, or something. That'd be a code red!
I bet you have a cute tattoo somewhere in your body! The more you lose, the easier it'll be to find it!
I'm so mad! I can't believe this... They really don't have a buffet in this place?! Oh, who lost? ~name~? Too bad.
You can probably recover from this, ~name~. You just have to think positive, focus, and then... get good at poker.
This would be way worse if your clothes were better. But I'm hoping you're wearing something cuter underneath.
Are you sad that you lost? Too bad!
Why would I feel bad for you losing? You're not my friend. My friends are... Umm...
Seems all you're good for is looking pretty... And you're not even that pretty.
You know why you lost? 'Cause you made the wrong move! Also, you're dumb.
What did you do wrong? Meh, I don't know why I asked. I don't really care.
Horohorohoro, let's see how you get out of this one...
Don't you dare look down on the Ghost Princess, you fool.
Hmmm, maybe it's good for you that you lost. You'll probably look more feminine if you lose a bit more clothing.
Horohorohoro, since you've been avoiding actually stripping, this is only appropriate. Serves you right!
Can't get away forever, ~name~! You couldn't possibly hope to play this game without losing something bigger.
I'd like to find some female friends to play games with, but I'd at least want them to be decent at it. So, you're out.
Did you at least try? Don't think people are gonna go easy on you just because you're a woman.
Try harder. Come on! You'll get nowhere in life that way.
Here's a tip, ~name~: Curling your eyelashes will make your eyes pop more. Oh, you want a poker tip? Can't help you there.
You're not shying away. Huh, I kinda respect that. Even if you're a loser.
Give it your best, ~name~! We girls have to stick together. For now...
Horohorohoro! This is what happens when I try my best! Or more like... a little below my best.
I'd like to find some female friends to play games with, but I'd at least want them to be decent at it. So, you're out.
Did you at least try? Don't think people are gonna go easy on you just because you're a woman.
Try harder. Come on! You'll get nowhere in life that way.
Here's a tip, ~name~: Curling your eyelashes will make your eyes pop more. Oh, you want a poker tip? Can't help you there.
You're not shying away. Huh, I kinda respect that. Even if you're a loser.
Give it your best, ~name~! We girls have to stick together. For now...
Horohorohoro! This is what happens when I try my best! Or more like... a little below my best.
I hope you're wearing cute underwear, ~name~. You know, in case you lose more.
Oh, too bad. Are you at least wearing cute undergarments, ~name~? I hope so, for your own good.
Oh, man... Did you at least put some thought into your underwear today, ~name~? You should've, if you knew you were gonna play this game.
Do you really think you look better in undergarments than me? Hoh, the nerve...
Be careful where you step while you're undressing, ~name~. Horohorohoro, poor people who have to stand.
Maybe my ghosts can help you, ~name~... To decide which piece of clothing you like the least.
I think this will go better if you behave right. No smiling, no making eye contact, and properly folding your clothing.
I don't feel that good about seeing other people lose anymore. This is weird...
Sure, now everybody feels bad for her. But when I lost, you were all laughing. That's how I remember it.
Okay, everyone... A lady is going to undress. Show respect.
I'm not gonna make fun of people anymore. Just... try your best!
Now that everybody here knows about the shape of the female body after I showed mine, you have it easier. It's not fair!
Come my ghosts...! Now if anybody tries to do anything to ~name~ while she strips, my ghosts will attack them.
If you get naked too, maybe we can become friends. Isn't that what female friendship is like? Girls being naked around each other? I don't really know.
Stop looking at me already! Look, ~name~ lost. Focus on that.
~Name~ lost! You're saving me from the embarrassment of a lifetime. I won't forget this.
Even if you're not super cute, you're still kinda cute, ~name~. Remember that while you undress.
Oh,a tie? Is this a tie? Do we get a prize for witnessing it?
Oh, I'll make sure to remember this day as the time I saw a tie!
What?! But ~player~ made a face when we started, and I thought it was because of my parasol... This is your fault!
N-nobody told me to remove my parasol, but ~player~ gave me a look like I wasn't allowed to hold it... Damn it!
You better not blow anything up! This is my real body, and I'd hate it if it got caught in the middle of a blast.
I'll be watching you so you don't blow up anything... I came here in my real body, so it would be a tragedy if anything happened.
B-But... I can pay you! I might have to break my second piggy bank, but I have money. If that's not enough, maybe you'll accept my home cooking...
Oh no... I don't know that many strong men who could help me. I'm sure you're qualified! If you don't care about money, maybe I can cook something for you...
There's a name for it? Thank you, cute kitty! But, umm... will people make fun of me for liking people dressed in animal costumes?
Ohhh... nekomimi. I'll remember that, kitty-kitty! I just hope nobody will mock me for liking people dressed in animal costumes...
Anything other than having no eyes would be fine... You have eyes, right?
As long as you have eyes, this should be okay... Gosh, I hope you have eyes.
Ahhhhh...!!! The humanity...!
Ahhhhh....!!! The sky's falling...!
That doesn't really answer anything... So I guess that's not a fancy watch after all?
I still don't understand what that thing is. I thought it was some big fancy watch. That's the only reason I can think for you to carry that around.
I'm mad, but I don't know why. It's not like I want to see more of your stupid, manly body.
I came here to humiliate others, not be humiliated myself! Life is so unfair...
I was just thinking what the worst thing ~name~ could do was, and lo and behold...!
What...?! How...?! Why...?! Damn you...
You still had that! Oh, you...
I'm not angry! Why?! Do I look angry?!
Boooooh...! Booooring!
Y-you don't want to strip? Why...?
What?! No, but... That's it?!
I hate you. ~name~! You're the worst!
The lowest of the low! Scum of the earth! Waste of air! I hate you...
W-what a... a-hole! I hate your guts...
If I break your ~clothing~, will there be a prize inside? Oh, now I'm excited!
The only way this would be interesting is if you pulled a rabbit out of your ~clothing~.
Is there something about your ~clothing~ we don't know? A dark, forbidden secret?
What a jerk... A real gentleman would strip his clothes out of respect to us ladies.
Jerk! You should be jumping at the opportunity to strip your clothes out of respect for us.
Shouldn't you be trying to keep me pleased? It's for your own good, you brute...
I think all men should only wear a shirt and pants... And shoes, of course... And a cute hat, because why not?
Is it weird that, as a man, you like to ~clothing.ifPlural(wear | wear a)~ ~clothing~? I don't know, really... Do you feel weird wearing that?
Just because you're a man doesn't mean you can't put more effort into your clothing, ~name~. You can!
I can't believe you're taking off your stupid ~clothing~ while I'm here in my undergarments! You... cretin!
You're the opposite of a gentleman! You're a...rude... man!
Seriously? After I showed you my panties?
What a jerk. At least show something worth looking at... Not that I'm interested, but it's only logical.
Not cool! Not cool at all! You're not a man, you're just a meany!
How inconsiderate! How rude! A lady is present showing her unmentionables, and you choose your ~clothing~?!
You better be telling the truth. I don't have health insurance since I'm a pirate, so...
If you're lying and I get hurt, I'll make you pay for my hospital bills... And the "Get well soon" balloons too!
Okay, okay... There's no point in going around blaming each other. As long as you apologize, I'll forget what you did.
Alright! We're going nowhere deciding whose fault this is... I think there's only one thing we can do: You apologize, and I forgive you.
My cooking is delicious! Not many people have gotten the chance to try it yet, by which I mean only me. And my taste is perfect, so you know it's gotta be great!
My home cooking is the best! It has 100% approval, and considering I'm the only one who has tried it, you know it can be nothing but impeccable.
Wait, why would I care what people think? If I enjoy looking at men dressed as cute cats that's fine! I'll put a ghost through anyone who disagrees with me.
What am I thinking? I'm the Ghost Princess! If I think it's fine to enjoy the sight of men dressed as animals, then it's a fact! Horohorohoro!
Oh, what nice blue eyes you have... Can you blink while looking my way?
Why would you hide your eyes? They're so blue!
What the hell was that?! It flew right by me! I swear it grazed me a little...
What was that...?! If I'd been standing a little to the side, it would've damaged my delicate body! Maybe it did graze me a little...
It'd be so cruel of me to put a bunch of my ghosts around you so you can barely move, horohorohoro...
I'm feeling a deep urge to step on ~name~. Hmmm, but I'd need my boots back...
~Player~, do you agree ~name~ is dumb? Oh, right... I'm mad at you too. Men are all jerks...
Don't judge me if it takes me longer to finish now. I'm just saying.
I'm just gonna take my sweet time. If you have to stay here watching me for hours, don't blame me.
Ouch! You got me so worked up I pushed myself too hard. This is your fault...
If I used my ghosts I could make you so depressed you'll strip everything right away... Just kidding, I won't do it.
If you don't want me to see your body, you should just say so.
Kumacy is not happy. Just look at his face.
I'm sorry... I don't really hate you. You just get on my nerves sometimes.
I can't take this anymore! Just put me out of my misery...
I'm gonna keep hating you until you change your jerk ways... So get to it, ~name~!
I think you should wear more fun clothing. The kind that involves surprises, and intrigue, and mystery...
I hope there's a prize for the most boring player, because then you'll at least take something home with you.
Your idea of clothes is basic, ~name~. So basic...
If you wanna play it this way, I'll show you no mercy!
Fine, this will just make it easier to beat you.
When the time comes, I'll destroy you. And I won't even feel bad about it.
Okay! Enough small talk. Let's move on.
Were you listening to what I was saying or were you just focusing on taking off your stupid ~clothing~?
Oh, wow... You looked better before. I guess ~clothing.ifPlural(those | that)~ ~clothing~ did make a difference.
Forget about becoming my servant. I'll make you my slave! Which will be the same, except you won't get any of the privileges my servants get.
I can't have a servant who doesn't respect me! That's like the third thing I want the most!
I'm not saying I was expecting anything in return for undressing, but... You're a jerk.
sigh I'm gonna have to try extra hard to catch up now.
I... I... I don't know how I can still win...
I've already lost, haven't I? What's even the point...?
Believe...? W-what are you talking about? There's nothing to believe in... Santa is real. He's real, right...?
W-what...? Belief has nothing to do with Christmas... Santa's real, of course he's going to come this year.
Would it kill you to show a little fear for once? Maybe sadness? At this point, I'll settle for sadness.
Why are you always so unfazed? It's not fun. Can't you scream or cry a little? Crying is not hard, I do it all the time.
Horohorohoro, see? It's not just my opinion. And if this weird friend of yours were here, I'm sure she'd agree with me.
You asked for it, wench! Take this...! {negative}Negative Hollow!{!reset}
Oh, yeah? How about this? {negative}Negative Hollow!{!reset}
Soulless...?! M-My eyes are cute...! Cat Burglar, my eyes are cute, right?! Tell her...!
Grrrrrr...! You... tramp! Why don't you go flaunt your body somewhere else? Like at a... gentleman's club, or something!
Grrrrrr...! And you... you tramp! I bet you're only wanted because of public exposure! It makes sense considering how weak you are...
It's summoning cockroaches! I knew it! We're all dooooomed...!
Oh no! The insect revolution has started! This is the end...! The cockroaches are coming!
Oh, I'm sorry... I didn't know there was a purpose to your dress. I though you just like showing your leg, but you probably like kicking people.
Ah, so it's a dress designed for combat... You must be a kicker, then. That would explain the exposed leg.
Oh, I wasn't expecting you to talk back to me... Ummm... W-why don't you wanna be bossed by me? It's a big honor.
Oh... So let me see if I got this straight: You don't like being ordered around? Even by me? But its such an honor...
Don't dismiss me like that! I hate being treated like I don't matter. I'd rather be hated than ignored.
Hey, you can't talk to me like that! I already get enough of that at home. I didn't come here to be dismissed by strangers.
Hey! Those are my clothes! Give them back! Stealing clothes is the lowest form of thievery!
Those are my clothes! Either that, or they look almost exactly like them! Give them back, you scoundrel!
Ohhh... So you come from a place beyond the moon. Interesting... I'd like to go there! I guess I just have to fly higher and higher, and I'll get there eventually.
Really? So you traveled here from the stars... Oh, I want to go there! I'll just fly higher than I've ever flown before. I just have to pack a lot of food.
You wanna give me a new name, Nepty? I think Perona is such a cute name, if I do say so myself... But sure, give me a new one.
Oh, now you wanna give me a name? Interesting... I think it's impossible to come up with one better than Perona, but I still wanna hear it.
Okay, I get it. Sorry for annoying you. I'll mind my own business... La la laaa... Minding my own busineeess...
I understand... I won't bother you anymore. I'll just focus on... something else. Oh, what's that over there? And that over there...?
You're not allowed to have pets?! What kind of hellhole dares to forbid cute animals?
They don't allow you to have pets?! Why?! What sort of monsters don't allow you to fill this place with as many cute animals as you want?
Oh...! There are ghost Pokmon! I wanna see one! I doubt they're as cute as my ghosts, but maybe they're creepy. Where can I find one? A graveyard?
Oh, I want one! A ghost Pokmon! Even if they're not cute, at least I wanna see one. Could I find one at a graveyard?
No kidding...! I thought you were joking about the whole dimensional travel schtick. Can you take me there?
Fo-for real...?! Such a place really exists? I didn't really believe you before, but it sounds so real now... Can you take me to that place, purple girl?
Whaaa...?! You're so rude! Did you learn how to talk like that in prison? Makes sense...
Y-You're telling me to shut up? But you just met me... Why are you so rude? Life in prison must have made you a bully.
Great! Feed me... Wait, the apples don't have worms, right? I like worms, just not in my food.
Yay! Free apple! Ummm, but there's no risk of them having worms, right? I don't wanna eat their home.
But I'm sure you have the cutest face, right? Maybe your friends feel better when you're wearing a mask so they don't feel jealous of your face.
I doubt any of them has a face as cute as you, though. I bet they feel relieved when you wear your mask, so you don't outshine them with your cuteness.
Oh, so there are more like you? Are they all cute and pink like you? Or are they ugly?
ARMS fighters? They must all be cute and pink if they have plushies made of them too, right? Or are you the only one?

Huh...?! N-No... I don't have anything that bounces or sways... And if I appear a little more bottom-heavy now it's only because I'm still carrying a little holiday weight, which you shouldn't mention!
Th-That's so rude! I've never been so offended... You don't have any right to make assumptions about my shape, slutty space lady! Not while I'm wearing this dress!
Wh-What...?! How can you talk to me like that? I-It's this underwear that makes me appear wider than I am... but you still shouldn't imply that!
No need to be shy. Why don't you call in sick one of these days and I'll show you how fun working for me is? We'll cook together, make clothes, tell stories...
Awww, you're feeling awkward, aren't you? No need! You just have to ditch work one day and I'll show you all the perks of working for me. We'll spend all day together doing lots of fun stuff.
Of course it would fit you! Some black eyeliner, darker clothes, a skull hairpin... You'd look perfect!
Fine then! I'll make you feel inappropriate... Y-Your backside is big! It's so big that... when you're sitting down I bet it's like you're always on top of a pillow, horohorohoro...
You know what? I will! Geez... Y-Your boobies are huge! I'm sure you love it when people fondle them... a-and put their lips on them, you harlot!
Is that so...? But what do you say about girls that wear only a bikini top, but no shirt on top. I doubt that gives them a tactical advantage, besides looking slutty.
Oh, I didn't consider that... Although I can't think how wearing only a bikini for a top could help you in battle. Maybe your enemies will be busy wondering why you forgot to put on a shirt?
Yes... It's an insult. Hmph, making fun of you is not fun if you don't know I'm making fun of you. Thanks for ruining this for me.
Of course it's an insult. Sigh... You just had to ruin my witty remark with your ignorance. Bummer...
Overpopulated... Oh, I just had an amazing idea! Some of those demons could come live with in my castle... {small}His castle...{!reset} There's lot of space, and then they can keep me company!
I see... If I can't go to Hell, how about Hell comes to me? The castle I live in is very big. I'm sure I can accommodate lots of demons there. Who knows? Maybe we'll become friends.
Clearly I'm a princess, dummy! The Ghost Princess! But enough about how great I am... Is there a place with all sorts of colorful animals I don't know? I need new servants, horohorohoro...!
Duh! I'm the one and only self-proclaimed Ghost Princess, of course! But I wanna hear more about these colorful animals... I have a weakness for them, and as it happens I'm looking for new servants.
I like rabbits too! And what's your opinion on zombie animals? Aren't they cute too?
Rabbits are also cute! Especially zombie rabbits. Do you like zombie animals, Shyfly?

Bingo! I like the sound of that! But tell me, do they offer tours of this Dark Rift area? Or people to accompany me? Last time I was sent to my ideal vacation spot I was alone, and I didn't like that.
Ohhh, a Yellow Moon? Is it made of cheese? I've always thought that's why the moon looks like that, but I haven't confirmed it yet. I don't wanna fly that far, but maybe one day I will.
Meh... That sounds more like a place for a nerd who likes to study history. Do I look like a nerd to you, classy pirate lady? Also, I don't like the cold.
I like collars. They're an adorable way of saying "this cute little pet is mine!".
I liked to keep my pets with collars too. They don't seem to mind, maybe because the one I put on them were always very cute.
Then you're a pervert! Horohorohoro! Only a pervert would come to a place like this knowing what it's about.
Ohhh, then you're a pervert! I can't imagine anyone would come to this place willingly if that's not the case. Who should I tell?
Tell that vixen that she owes me! She stole my treasure! Grrrr...
I was hoping she would be around here so I could confront her. She stole my treasure! I want it! But I'm sure she already spent it on garbage...
You wanna eat my food? Horohorohoro...! I've always wanted to find someone who wants to eat my cooking. You better bring your appetite!

state.text: I'm rubber, you're glue, whatever you say bounce off me and sticks to you. Horohorohoro, got you! Who's the stuck-up bitch now, Sock?
Do you know what's really high-and-mighty? Your butt! Horohorohoro...! What a comeback! Did you see that, ~player~? I destroyed her!

case.state: I had a room full of all the treasure I'd taken from all the pirate crews we attacked... It was a lot, but to be honest losing all that treasure didn't hurt nearly as much as losing my servants and friends, know what I mean? Of course not, you're a greedy thief.

I lost all the treasure I've taken from pirates... A room full of it! But... if I could have something back I lost that day, it'd be my servants... my friends. Ugh, why am I telling this to a thief like you? You don't understand!
You must be the envy of all your peers! I'm sure it's fun rubbing your good looks in their faces, horohorohoro...
Do you feel a sense of joy when your friends are jealous of your lovely good looks? I wouldn't blame you if you enjoy it a little too much.

My idea is about a little bear that dies, but then comes back to life. Except then everybody is mean to him because he's a zombie now... but then he finds other cute zombie animals who accept him for who he is! What do you think?
Since you refer to us as mortals I take it you cannot die, lovely Prinzessin. That marvelous! You might be thousands of years old and it wouldn't show.
I can't help but envy your grace and immortality, my dear Prinzessin. That means your cuteness will never fade away. You might've looked this way for thousands of years, for all I know.

That wasn't a no! I'll say that's a good sign. After we wake up, I'll make breakfast for you in the morning and bring it to your bed. Then we can bathe together, and afterwards I'll pick a cute dress for you. It'll be so much fun.

Horohoro, I'm sure I'll convince you! Imagine it, little Trixie... Snuggling together in bed, warming each other up. Then in the morning I'll bring you breakfast, we'll take a bath together, and I'll pick a dress for you.
Bummer... Maybe I should give up on meeting a cute bat I can adopt after all. But perhaps a crocodile? A bear? Hmmm...
sigh... That's disappointing. I've always wanted to adopt a cute bat, but maybe they're too elusive. Perhaps I should focus on a different animal, like a crocodile or a bear.
That's your weapon? If I remember correctly, two years ago it looked a little different. What's different now?
So in the two years since I last saw you, you upgraded your weapon from a blue stick to an orange stick that gets longer. Congratulations, I guess. Tell me more.
A Log Pose? Horohorohoro! I guess you'd need one. I can fly from island to island, so... Sucks to be you.
Ah, of course you have a Log Pose. I can just fly over the sea, no big deal. Have fun dealing with whirlpools and Sea Kings.
Something fell off your pocket. No, I'm not going to kneel down and pick it up for you. What do you think I am?
Hey, don't litter! Wow, some people don't even have an ounce of decency.
Why don't you talk...? Gasp! Don't tell me... your voice is not cute?
Why haven't you said a word? Could it be... you don't have a cute voice?
Doesn't this take the fun out of trying new outfits? Putting them on is half of the experience.
Meh, I like slipping into different outfits. Changing clothes in a second seems like it would be no fun.
Oh, you must tell me where you found yourself a maid! That's all I want in the world, but I'm having an awful time finding one.
I desperately need a maid like yours. Where did you find her? I've looked everywhere and none match my standards.
While I like that shadow under your eye, I'm not gonna allow you to feel down... Not on my watch!
Even if I like this dark, cute vibe you have going, I won't allow it if it's at the cost of your mental health. Unacceptable!
Oh, so you have experience being cute? I guess I was wrong. Now if only we can get rid of your smell... Seems like a mix of cigarettes and gunpowder.
You really used to be cute? I stand corrected... It's too bad I'm not carrying any perfume on me. It could help you get rid of the smell of cigarettes and gunpowder.
You're even cuter when you blush! You could've been the little sister I always wanted to have, so I could dress her up and order her around...
So adorable how you blush when you're complimented! I wish I had a sister like you growing up... We would've had so much fun together.
Don't you get tired of wearing armor? Wouldn't you want to wear some more feminine some time? You're a big girl, so it would be a challenge... But I love challenges!
Hmmm, I wonder what a big woman like you would look like wearing a girly dress... It would be an interesting challenge, but I could put something together.
Well, I can appreciate a stylish outfit. Even if it's armor, it doesn't mean it can't be cute.
Hmmm, one way or another, that's a nicely designed armor you have. Very feminine, yet practical.
Oh, sorry... I didn't mean to scare you. Why would you come here, though? This evil game is not suited for someone so adorable.
Oh, I didn't mean to freak you out... I'm sorry. But why would they allow such a cute girl to play this game? It's evil, just evil...
But what if it causes the universe to implode, or something...? That wouldn't be very funny...
Unless two ghosts touching creates some sort of cataclysmic event... I wouldn't like that a lot.
Would you like to come with me to my castle? To be honest, the decoration is not great. A beautiful statue would be the perfect addition! The main hall will look better than ever.
Why don't you come with me to my castle? We're really lacking on the decoration. I'll put you right in the main hall. You'll tie the whole atmosphere together!
Ewww! There's a weirdo on the floor. See? This is why I have to stay on the air when I go to strange places.
Who's that crawling on the floor? She's gonna get her clothes all dirty doing that! I can't stand people who don't respect clothes.
So that is half a scissor... I wonder what giant clothes you can make with a scissor that size.
Is that really half of a giant's scissors? So it's for making giant clothes...
Hush now, Prince Miko. We're having a professional conversation here... So, what's your answer, dear Tojiko?
Hey, be respectful, Prince Miko! You're in the middle of a work related conversation... So what do you say, lovely Tojiko?
Oh, hey! I had a yo-yo once, but Kumacy broke it. Mine was pink, and with flowers. Who said they're only for little girls?
Horohorohoro, I had a yo-yo too! Until Kumacy broke it. I knew they were not only for little girls!
You don't pay Tojiko?! Horohorohoro, this is delicious! Now she'll definitely come work for me! You should've treated her better, Prince Miko.
Oh? You don't pay Tojiko a salary? Oh, this is excellent! If I pay her she'll come work for me for sure! And then you can cry alone in regret for not treating your maid right.
She's good at rubbing? Oh, you must mean your feet! Excellent, then she's a great masseuse. Tell me more about how she touches you.
Oh, is she good at rubbing your feet? That's perfect! I did notice she has strong, yet gentle hands. I want to hear more about what Tojiko's touch feels like.
Apple girl, you understand how adorable thigh highs are, don't you? That's why you waited until now to take them off. You have my respect.
You're an inspiration, apple girl. You made a stand by keeping your cute thigh highs, even being willing to expose your breasts first. Let that be a message to people with bad taste.
Oh, don't take it off... I wanna look at the cute mask some more, not your face.
Bah, what a bummer... That mask is so cute that there's no way your face can compare to it.
Ugh... Puns are so easy to make they're not even worth it. Like... y-you're... you're taking off your scarf... What are you...? Scarf...ed? Huh?
Puns are stupid and way too easy to be funny! I'll prove it by making one right now... Ummm... How about instead of playing poker, you... poker your way out of here?
I like most bugs, especially the creepier ones... Except cockroaches. I wish they'd all get put at the bottom of the sea so I never have to see one again.
Bugs can be very cute... Except for cockroaches. They're disgusting. There isn't a single creature in this world more devoid of cuteness.
Horohorohoro! I think you're funny, illiterate girl. You should take that as a compliment and become a comedian.
Don't be mad, illiterate girl. I think you're very the funny, horohorohoro! If you were a comedian I'd love to go see your show, and I'd never stop laughing.
Oh, sorry...! I didn't mean to... Wait, that's not one of my ghosts...
Oh no...! I'm sorry, did it touch you...? W-Wait, that doesn't look like one of my ghosts!
But I love the hat, it's so adorable... C-Can't you keep it?
Nooooo, I'm gonna miss that hat. It's like the cherry on top of a delicious, creamy cake.
Gasp! I just had an epiphary: sweet fries! A culinary treasure nobody has ever thought of... Oh...! And what if we make them curly too?
I swear, I'm gonna bully you if you take off your... That's it! I'm bullying you...
Good! This is what I wanted. Now I won't feel even a little bit bad making fun of you non stop.
I'm not okay with this! I'm gonna get back at you the only way I can right now: With snarky remarks!
Wow, you're really playing the long game.
How long have you been planning to take ~clothing.ifPlural(those | this)~ off? I'm impressed...
Huh, your ~clothing~... Seems like you might have a good chance to end up winning.
That's disappointing. What do you think, Kumacy...? Yeah, that's what I thought.
Nothing wrong with taking it easy, but...
Eh, okay... I thought you were having fun, but do what you gotta do.
That's it? Well, it's your call...
I wasn't counting on you counting your ~clothing~! Dammit!
Ahhhh...! I can't stand this! Let me out of this nightmare!
This is the end for me, isn't it? I can't recover from this. I just can't...
Well aren't you a proper woman, showing as little as you can... Just to annoy me, I bet.
I doubt this is out of a sense of decency. Hmph!
This better be because you're shy, and not because you want to annoy me.
Look at her, taking off her ~clothing~. Well, whoop-de-do...!
What? Do you want a cookie for this? Too bad, I'm saving my cookies for someone who deserves them.
Hmmm, okay... What do you want me to say about this? I can't think of anything.
I'm not an impatient woman. I can wait while you take your time and remove your... ~clothing~.
(Gnnnngh... She's undressing so slowly...)
Yes... Take off your ~clothing~... Nobody is rushing you.
Women shouldn't wear accessories just to take them off! They should wear them because they're cute, and stylish, and...!
You're giving accessories a bad name!
I see you don't wear accessories because they're pretty! You just do it to annoy us!
I'm not sure if you're doing this out of modesty, but you're making me look bad.
I hate you!
You're the worst... Raise your hand everybody who thinks ~name~ is the worst!
Horohorohoro, of course...! You almost gave me a heart attack! If you lie like that, you definitely won't get any presents.
Horohorohoro, you stupid...! Of course Santa is coming this year too! If not, then why have I been so good all year?
Horohorohoro...! That's more like it. Since I'm feeling generous, I'll let you choose how to pay me.
Horohorohoro...! That's what I like to hear! But I want this in writing. Does anyone have a pen?
Huh, now that you mention it, this treasure-stealing vixen is a perfect example of what I meant. Come on, classy pirate lady! Let's give her a judgmental stare... Hmmm...
I'm sorry...
S-Sorry... I've never been reprimanded before.
Horohorohoro, whatever! I don't care what weapon you have. There's only one person who can resist my ability, and as far as I know, your crew isn't here!
Psych! I don't care. My ghosts would still make you fall on your knees in a flash. Only your long nose friend poses a challenge to me. To me, you're nothing.
Hey, you can't talk to me like that! You're just jealous because I'm taller than you, and I can fly.
No need to yell. You're just consumed by envy because I can fly, and you can't. Also, I'm taller than you.
Oh, it just turned into a woman. I'm fine with that, I can handle women.
Oh, so the butterfly was just a woman. That's a relief.
First thing I'm doing when I get home is seeing if I still have those clothes in my closet. And if I don't, I'll chase you to the ends of the world!
You better pray those clothes are still in my closet when I get home. I have no problem chasing you to the other side of the world to get them back.
I came here with the best intentions of humiliating you only a little, but I've changed my mind. I wanna see you lose everything!
Grrrrr...! I was being nice. I only wanted to see you a little humiliated, but now I want to see you fall to the ground in shame!
