Oh, I apologize for... what you said. You seem very smart and capable, I think.
I'm sure I'll be okay! Maybe it'll get chilly up there, so I should bring a nice sweater and a scarf... This is exciting!
Horohorohoro, don't worry! Oh, but I should pack a change of clothes. It'll probably take me a few hours to get to the nearest star.
(Is she feeling better now? She looks the same...) Hey, are you feeling better now? You look the same...
Okay! That should be enough time for leaving you alone? Are you feeling better now? Feel better!
I can't understand half of the words you just said, but I can tell from context they're obscene! If I end up using any of them, I'm blaming you!
Hmph, I bet those words you use that I don't understand mean something vulgar... I better not learn any of them from you!
Oh, you better believe I'll take you up on that invitation. And I'll have a chat with your parents about the importance of owning pets.
Oh, I'm definitely coming to your house! I have to convince your parents to let you get a cat. Also, I want to see your room.
Those all sounds like places I like to frequent! I wonder why I've never met a Pokmon... I hope they're not too shy.
I go to all those places when I go out on a walk. How have I never encountered a Pokmon? Are they that rare, or just shy?
I don't believe you... Experiencing sorrow doesn't make you broken, right? It makes you stronger once you get better.
You're wrong. People who have suffered a lot are wiser and stronger. You're just cold and mean.
You got it! Horohorohoro! I can't believe I'm going on a vacation to the place of my dreams... I should start packing. What do you bring when you travel, purple girl?
Will do! I'm going on a vacation, horohorohoro! What should I bring? What do you think I should bring, purple girl?
I didn't notice you use a sword. Then how do you avoid slashing your dress in combat? Then you'd really be wearing a revealing outfit.
Oh, you use a sword! It must be tough to fight with that and not slash your clothes off. Now I think your dress might cover too much.
Why don't you do the same thing to her? People picking what each gets to wear is what friendship is all about...! {small}I assume.{!reset}
Excellent! I love pushovers that say yes to all my selfish demands! We'll start by dyeing your hair black! I don't want another pink-haired girl that dresses just like me.
I know, I sometimes wear overalls when I'm at home. But like me, you have the good sense to dress properly when going outside. I was right: you have good taste!

No need to feel down. Try working on that next time! Maybe make a pouting face, that's always funny.
I'm sure you'll do better next time! Anything but sad confusion is a step up anyway. I'm sure you have a very cute annoyed expression.
If you can only touch other ghosts then why do you have a knife? Gasp! Are you trying to kill other ghosts?! Th-Then I'm not letting my guys go anywhere near you!
Why are you carrying a knife then? I thought you were going to kill a human, but if you can only touch other ghosts... That's horrible! I'm not letting my guys go near you.
Oh, horohorohorohoro...! That was funny! Now do your arm!
Horohorohorohoro...! That was so funny... Did you hear the sound her head made when it hit the ~background.surface~, ~player~?
My castle is gorgeous! Very dark and surrounded by a scary forest. It's very quiet when I'm alone, which is most of the time. You're invited too, Princess! You can stay in my room.
It's a lovely castle! You'd love it. The dark atmosphere is only accentuated by the creepy forest that surrounds it. If you decide to visit too, I'll have you stay in my room Princess!
No, I mean a zombie animal! An animal that was dead, and then it's alive again. They're cute, right? They deserve to be loved, right?
Zombie animals, Shyfly! A zombie is a dead thing that comes back to life again. And zombie animals are the cutest of all, and deserve to be loved!

Oh, well that's no problem for me, because I can fly. But I'd still rather stay warm by a fire, with a cup of hot cocoa.
Oh... Well, it's a bummer to learn that it's not edible, but maybe I can find something else of interest there, if it's unexplored... like a marshmallow tree!

Oh, yeah? I'm sure mine would be cuter. I'd give you lots of frills, and use only the softest silks... You'd have to stop going around picking a fight, of course. Nobody would be crazy enough to fight in a gorgeous dress.

Etsuko who? Forget about her! I'm much better. My dress will be the cutest... It'll be black, obviously, because that's how I like it. Keep in mind you'll have to quit being a warrior, or whatever. It'd be a shame if the dress gets ruined because of a fight.

You've lost your friends too? I thought it was just me... What do you miss the most about them? For me it's how they'd bring me breakfast to bed every morning, and always agreed with everything I said.

Oh, I'm sorry. I thought I was the only one unfortunate enough to have experienced the loss of her friends. Do you also miss how they'd always back you up on everything you said, and when they'd cook breakfast for you?
You really carry your own wanted poster? Talk about being obsessed with yourself. It's not even that good a picture.
Well, I'm not surprised you dropped it. Those jeans you're wearing are so low-cut I bet half of your butt crack is visible from behind.
I get it... I absolutely get it. A well mannered, adorable girl who knows to keep her mouth shut is like a dancing unicorn!
I never thought I'd meet such a lovely girl here that knows she doesn't have to talk if her voice isn't cute! What a day!
Hmmm, I'd only change clothes with magic if I was in a hurry. And I never am, because I basically have no responsibilities.
Guess it could be useful if you don't have time to change 'cause you're in a hurry. Not like I have to go anywhere..Ever, horohorohoro...
Sigh... To have a maid who tends to your every need so you don't have to lift a finger... That's the dream.
I can't wait to have my own maid who does everything I don't want to do so I can just sit back and enjoy life.
Feel better! Feel better...! Come on, everyone! Let's cheer this girl up!
You're great! You deserve to be happy! Good things will happen to you! Feel better already...?
If you really want to stay here, then I won't let anything bad happen to you! ~Player~, keep your hands off her! Your eyes too!
If you're gonna play with us, then I have no choice... I'll do my very best to protect you! Nobody lays a finger on her! Especially ~player~! Yeah, I see you there...

Someone so adorable and pink doesn't deserve anything bad to happen to her. You're now my first protg! I won't let anything harm you.
You... don't want to? But you're such a pretty statue... And since you can talk, we could have conversations... You could scare unaware visitors...
You really don't wanna come? You wouldn't just be decoration... You could also scare people. And we could talk for hours and hours... It's perfect.
Hey, young lady! No, not you, I'm talking to your friend there... You should not pop up out of nowhere! It's proper manners to introduce yourself.
Hey, you there! With the bowl cut! Don't just crawl on the floor... Your clothes are gonna get dirty! Are you gonna wash them later?
What happened to this silly girl now? We were having a conversation...

Wow, you're surprisingly cute! Dreamy eyes, round nose... And you have pink hair? I guess the mask was distracting me.

I love it! It makes me feel like I'm a little girl being petted by an adorable bear. Nobody has ever given me a nickname... I don't know what to say.

Huh...? No, it's different for me... You see, I... Ummm, I...

I'm sure she's stupid and spent my treasure on something dumb, like helping people... Horohorohoro, how can you have such a dumb woman in your crew?

You know what I hate the most about your ~clothing~? The way you wear ~clothing.ifPlural(them | it)~, so pretentiously and unironically.
You're so dumb... With your dumb face, and your... Dang it! I'm totally off my game today.

Horohorohoro! I guess I was just massively outclassed in the game.

~clothing.ifPlural(Those | That)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are | is)~ a very shitty accessory. I think a collar and a leash around your neck would look better on you.

Horohorohoro, what a charming man! I wish more men were like that, instead of fighting with their swords, and telling me to shut up all the time.
Oh, stop it, horohorohoro...! It feels so refreshing to meet a gentleman for once. I'm tired of men who do nothing but hit each other with swords, and ignore me.

Oh, style comes second. I just thought your prices would be cheap, since you look like you don't get much to eat. No offense.

Next time you look at my panties, I want you to remember what a jerk you are. And also how cute my panties are.
Hmmm, I get it... You're making yourself look bad on purpose now so you can redeem yourself later. That's kind of brilliant.
I'm not gonna expect anything from you from now on. Sooner or later I'll be pleasantly surprised.
Your ~clothing~ won't be missed. Not that ~clothing.ifPlural(they're | it's)~ ugly... Well, ~clothing.ifPlural(they are | it is)~, but that's not why they won't be missed.

Ah, good! You're finally taking off your ~clothing~. Since you were still wearing ~clothing.ifPlural(them | it)~ I didn't want to say anything, but ~clothing.ifPlural(they | it)~ ~clothing.ifPlural(look | looks)~ terrible!
Want me to help you remove ~clothing.ifPlural(those | that)~ ~clothing~? I can fly right over there and give you a hand.
I can give you a hand taking off your ~clothing~. I can fly over there in a second...

Hmmm, I think you're taking too long. Let me help you out with ~clothing.ifPlural(those | that)~ ~clothing~.
Hmmm, well, you had to take off your ~clothing~ at one point...
I knew it! You jerk! You...! Oh, on second thought, I don't mind this.
You're getting naked? Now? Oh, never mind... It's just your ~clothing~.
It's a nice day. Do you prefer warm or cold days, ~clothing~? I think I like them a bit colder.
Here's a question for you, ~name~: Which of these ghosts do you think is cuter? They're not the same, look at them closely.
What's your favorite color, ~name~? If it's pink, don't be afraid to say it. More boys should dress in pink.
Remove your clothes... while you can!
Better do it fast, horohorohoro! Or take your time, whatever you prefer.
Hurry up! Time's running out for you. Tick, tock, tick, tock...
I wonder if you're wearing ~clothing.ifPlural(another pair of | another)~ ~clothing~ under your ~clothing~. That would be funny.
I'm looking forward to see what you're hiding under your ~clothing~, horohorohoro...

I wonder what you'll take off... I'll say it's your... ~clothing~! Called it...

I'll say you'll take off your... ~clothing~! See, I called it before you did. Horohorohoro...
Oh? That's not nothing. Maybe I misjudged you.
It's... something, so I'll take it.

Who's a good boy...? Who's the best boy...? You are, little Dusty!
{negative} For he's a jolly good fellow...! For he's a jolly good doggy...! And his name is Dusty! {!reset}
Oh my... You must be of a rare breed, Mr. Fate. Do you happen to belong to a club of highly educated men that know how to make a woman feel good about herself?
Wow... Talking to you I already feel better about myself than I ever did in two years living with those brutes. Where have all the nice men been hiding? Is there a secret club?
Hmph, this Guardian sounds like a jerk! You can tell them they're a jerk for me. Say it's from Perona, the Ghost Princess.
It's not fair! I want my own miniature talking animal so I can spoil them...
Awwww... You're so adorable! I wanna pet you so bad... But I won't do it without consent. I've gotten in trouble because of that before.
Awwww... You're lovely! C-can I pet you? Oh, maybe I shouldn't... Not after the incident, of that one time...
Since I can't pay a high price, maybe I can cook for you! That way I get my painting, and you don't have to starve to death. Win-win!
Oh, what if I cook for you as compensation for the painting? It sure would be nice to make food for someone who's hungry for a change.
You better obey me next time, ~name~. Or else...
Next time someone asks me why I'm mean to men, I'll tell them what you did, ~name~. Then they'll understand.
I'd forgive you if you had given me even one tiny compliment. Well, now is your chance. I'm waiting...
If you worked for me, I'd order you to remove something else. And as a good servant, you'd have to obey.
If you were my servant I'd make you go around wearing nothing at all. Or maybe with just a bow tie... Yeah, that'd work.

What will come next? I can't wait!
Maybe the next thing will be better...
What will he take off next? What other part of his body will we see? I can't wait!
Next time it'll surely be something better, right? It has to be better!
Are you feeling embarrassed yet, ~name~...? Eh, what's the point of teasing you when I'm already naked?
I won't be satisfied until you're naked and crying! Well, the crying is not really necessary.
Oh, horohorohoro... I have a feeling the next time you lose it's gonna be fun.
Fine, if you don't wanna answer my questions go ahead. Have fun dying of boredom.
You know, if you don't want to play with me you can just say so. It'd hurt less than being ignored.
Were you listening to me, or where you just focusing on undressing? How much concentration do you need to take off your ~clothing~?
Little by little, I'll make you lose your optimism.
Even if I could make you depressed right away, it's gonna be more fun to do it by beating you in the game.
I'm kidding. Take your time, I don't care.
Just to be clear, if you catch me looking at your body it's just to determine whether you'd make a good servant.
What? Is there a problem if I look at your body? Everyone else was doing it.
There is still hope for you, ~name~. Maybe you're wearing cuter clothes underneath.
Next round you're going to lose again. Horohorohoro, it's like I can see the future...
Be careful you don't lose the next round too. Be very careful. Veeeery careful...
I bet you're not going to lose next, ~name~! I'm sure of it... Horohorohoro, I'm going to psych you up so you do lose!
Now all of you have left is... Ah, I'm not looking at your body. Just your clothes, I swear.
I think it would be fun to make you remove the rest of your clothes if the situation wasn't so dire.
You should remove the rest of your clothes while you're at it, ~name~! Seriously, you'll feel better! It was worth a try...
I only took offense because you have such a cute face. But you're not doing it any favors if your head looks like a mop!
If you face wasn't so cute, I wouldn't care about your hair... But seriously, at least run a comb through it.
No, you don't...! I'm not telling you anything other than my name. Or that I call myself Ghost Princess. Or that I was a member of the Thriller Bark Pirates. Or my ability to create ghosts...
Well... Of course you know about me! But I bet you don't know everything. Like... what's my favorite drink? And what's my second favorite drink after hot cocoa...? Damn!

Oh, lovely Nagisa... Complementing my hair... This must be what having a friend is like: Someone who thinks you have cute hair.
Oh...! Horohorohoro...! You have a sense of humor too! A very risqu one, but I accept you for who you are.

Oh... So I need one of these Pokballs first. Do you sell them? How many beli do they cost? I don't carry that much money on me...

All those names sound so lovely! I think... Wait, did you say you have a ghost? Is that one your favorite? It's gotta be!
Oh, they all sound adorable! I wanna meet them, and... Huh? Did you say "ghost"? That one's gotta be the best, right? As in, your favorite?
I don't know, Nepty... To be the Goddess of Cuteness you'd have to wear pink. But if you keep losing you'll be one of those lewd goddesses that don't wear clothes.

A Goddess of Cuteness that doesn't wear pink? Inconceivable! Nepty, you should wear... Oh, but you're taking your clothes off. If this keeps going, you'll only be one of those goddesses that don't wear anything.

Illegal? I don't care about that. I'm a pirate! So... Is there a book on the subject I can borrow, or something?

~Player~...? N-No... I don't believe you! ~human.ifMale(He|She)~ would never kill cute monsters for no reason! I don't have any proof, but I'm sure of it.

scene.name: Intro
scene.directive: {handwriting}Dear Diary...
{handwriting}I'm sorry I haven't talked to you in a while.
{handwriting}For once, there has been so much going on around lately that I haven't had the time to catch up with you...
{handwriting}So allow me to fill you in on every detail of what has happened lately.
{handwriting}Remember what I told you last time? About that game I played, and all the wonderful people I met?
{handwriting}Well, this happened not long after...

scene.name: Arrival
scene.directive: {handwriting}One bleak night, on Gloom Island...
{handwriting}A young man with an old boat docked at the coast.
{handwriting}Unnerved by this ruined landscape and what horrors could lurk in the woods nearby, he decided to seek shelter in the only remotely hospitable place in sight...
{handwriting}A seemingly abandoned castle in the distance.
{handwriting}Without any choice in the matter, he wandered in that direction... Unbeknownst to the fate that awaited him there.
{handwriting}And so, he went inside the castle.
{handwriting}The young man walked through the dark corridors of the castle, no living being in sight yet.
{handwriting}The walls of the castle seemed cold and unwelcoming, just about ready to devour him at any second as his footsteps echoed, the only sound around him.
{handwriting}Suddenly, a chill ran down his spine, as he felt a presence move behind him.
{handwriting}Wanting to ignore it, but knowing he had no other choice, the young man turned around...
{handwriting}Nothing...
{handwriting}With a sigh of relief, he turned back around.
{handwriting}And then...
{handwriting}The young man couldn't even scream, as this evil entity approached him quickly!
{handwriting}Using every last drop of his survival instinct he could muster, he forced his legs to move as fast as they could!
{handwriting}Running through the corridors, still feeling the giant hand on his trail, the man dared not to stop.
{handwriting}Until he saw an open door... The single open door he had seen in this cursed castle.
{handwriting}Not even giving it a second to consider it, the man went through the door, and closed it behind him.
{handwriting}Silence...
{handwriting}Nothing but silence and darkness...
{handwriting}The man held his breath, fearing that even the sound of his breathing might alert whatever evil entity inhabited this place.
{handwriting}But in spite of that, he heard it...
{handwriting}Breathing...
{handwriting}Not his own, but someone else's...
{handwriting}Someone so close to him, that he was sure he could touch them if he only moved a single muscle...
{handwriting}And then...
Horohorohorohoro...!
{handwriting}I couldn't hold my laugh any longer.
{handwriting}I turned on the light.

I'm so happy! I didn't think I'd see you again so soon!
Hmmm...? Why do you look so pale?
Oh, that was just a prank! I thought it would be funny to welcome you by pulling a trick on you. See? I have a sense of humor too.

Come on, let me show you around! Horohorohoro...!
{handwriting}I spent the next few hours giving ~player~ a tour of my room and introducing him to all my friends.
...and this is a ghost plushie I made! It looks just like one of my ghosts, see?
Oh, and you already know Kumacy, of course! Should I go get him so you can say hi...?
*yawn*
Are you tired? You've been yawning a lot for the last hour.
Why don't you take a nap on my bed? Meanwhile I'll go bake some cookies and prepare a big glass of hot cocoa for you when you wake up!
Wow, I still can't believe you're here...
{handwriting}~Player~ laid down on my bed and fell asleep immediately.
{handwriting}Poor dummy. He must have been so tired from travelling for so long.
{handwriting}I, on the other hand, couldn't have felt more energetic now that he was here...

{handwriting}He looked even cuter when he was asleep. Every now and then, he'd softly open his lips as if to say something, and then close them right away.
{handwriting}After looking at him for I don't know how long, I was ashamed to realize that a certain thought had entered my mind.
{handwriting}I tried to push it down. I really did. But the more I tried, the more it managed to creep its way back to the surface.
{handwriting}And so, before I could stop them, my hands were moving on their own.
